K01vinv172u:0: fol. 513ff. first ed. in MSV IV 213ff.
K01vinv172u:3: kauṇḍinyo nandīpālaś ca modakā udakaṃ pibet /
K01vinv172u:5: karakaḥ kalabhuś caiva viśvabhug vanarathena ca /
K01vinv172u:7: yadā āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam ( iti)
K01vinv172u:9: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:10: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā kauṇḍinyena karma kṛtam yena bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ?
K01vinv172u:12: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv172u:13: kauṇḍinyenaiva karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
K01vinv172u:14: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K01vinv172u:18: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K01vinv172u:19: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv172u:20: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
K01vinv172u:22: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe varṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
K01vinv172u:23: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
K01vinv172u:24: *sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati karakacchedake parvate;
K01vinv172u:25: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya,
K01vinv172u:28: adrākśus te goṣṭhikās taṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ dvātriṃśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṅkṛtam,
K01vinv172u:33: sahadarśanāc ca prasādajātāḥ sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ:
K01vinv172u:35: teṣām evaṃ kṛtasaṅketānāṃ kecin mahāsamudram avatīrṇāh;
K01vinv172u:40: cchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya sakāśe pravrajitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:42: yāvad apareṇa samayena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ sakalaṃ buddhakāryaṃ kṛtvā indhanakṣayād ivāgniḥ ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve nirupadhiśeṣe nirvāṇadhātau
K01vinv172u:48: pañca sahaśravaṇād eva karakacchedakāt parvatād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭāḥ;
K01vinv172u:49: ṣaḍbhis tenaiva saṃvegena vīryam avalambya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
K01vinv172u:50: pañca paścād avatīrya vārāṇasīṃ praveṣṭum (SBV II 3)
K01vinv172u:55: sa ca śākaṭikas tasya śakaṭasārthasyāgrato yāyī;
K01vinv172u:62: mamāgrato gacchato na śakyam anena śakaṭasārthena sārdhaṃ gantum;
K01vinv172u:66: bhavantaḥ kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe parinirvṛte vayaṃ vilambitā ity anenāsmākam eṣā codanā kṛtā;
K01vinv172u:69: yady apy antarhito dharmaḥ kāśyapasya mahāmuneḥ /
K01vinv172u:71: parikṣayaṃ na yāsyanti yady apy asmākam āsrāvāḥ /
K01vinv172u:73: te vārāṇasīṃ praviśya piṇḍapātaṃ caritvā punar api karakacchedakaṃ parvataṃ gatvā dhyānādhyayanayogenāvasthitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:77: ayam eva sa karakacchedakaḥ parvato yatra mayā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ paryupāsitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:81: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritam;
K01vinv172u:83: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
K01vinv172u:84: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgataḥ arhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:85: tasyāhaṃ śāsane pravrajya tatprathamataḥ sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
K01vinv172u:86: māṃ ca bhagavān śākyamuniḥ saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agraṃ nirdiśed iti.
K01vinv172u:88: yo 'sau tena kālena samayena bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya viṃśatibhikṣusaharāṇām (SBV II 4)
K01vinv172u:92: tatpraṇidhānvaśād etarhi bhagavatā saṅghāṭīdhvajadhāriṇām agratāyāṃ nirdiṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:93: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ,
K01vinv172u:96: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca,
K01vinv172u:99: yadā bhagavatā āyuṣmataḥ kauṇḍinyasya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
K01vinv172u:104: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayachettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:105: kiṃ bhadanta ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yenāsya bhagavatā ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ,
K01vinv172u:111: kauṇḍinyenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
K01vinv172u:114: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
K01vinv172u:115: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:116: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:117: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:118: aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:121: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
K01vinv172u:124: deva ācaritaṃ madhyadeśe yo 'bhirūpo bhavati prāsādikaḥ sa sundara ity ucyate;
K01vinv172u:125: ayaṃ ca dārakaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādikaḥ,
K01vinv172u:133: dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam.
K01vinv172u:134: bhūyo 'pi rājñaḥ krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:135: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:137: yasminn eva divase vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir utpannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:141: deva asya janmani vārāṇasyāṃ paurajānapadānāṃ mahān kalir abhūt;
K01vinv172u:142: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalibhūr iti nāmeti;
K01vinv172u:144: kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ paśyati pitaraṃ dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantam;
K01vinv172u:146: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
K01vinv172u:147: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi;
K01vinv172u:148: yannv aham agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajeyam iti;
K01vinv172u:160: varaṃ vane valkalacīravāsasā phalāśinā vyāḍamṛgaiḥ sahoṣitam /
K01vinv172u:161: na rājyahetor vadhabandhatāḍanaṃ budhena kartuṃ paralokabhīruṇā // iti;
K01vinv172u:163: yat khalu kumāra jānīyās tvam asmākam ekaputraḥ priyo manāpaḥ kṣānto 'pratikūlaḥ;
K01vinv172u:171: tatra kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ ekam api bhaktacchedam akārṣīd,
K01vinv172u:175: atha rāja brahmadattaḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram idam avocat: (SBV II 6)
K01vinv172u:176: yat khalu tāta kumāra jānīyā duścaraṃ brahmacaryam,
K01vinv172u:184: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv172u:185: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv172u:186: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
K01vinv172u:188: dānāni ca dehi puṇyāni ca kuru;
K01vinv172u:190: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ antaḥpuram amātyān paurohitāṃś codyojayati;
K01vinv172u:192: evaṃ devety antaḥpurāmātyapaurohitā yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:193: upasaṃkramya kāśisundaraṃ kumāraṃ idam avocan: yat khalu (A 426b)
K01vinv172u:205: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv172u:206: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhya āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv172u:207: ehi tvaṃ tāta kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
K01vinv172u:213: atha rājā brahmadattaḥ kāśisunadrasya kumārasya pāṃsukrīḍanakāmātyaputrān paurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca kumārāṇ udyojayati;
K01vinv172u:214: aṅga tāvad kumārakāḥ kāśisundaraṃ kumāram utthāpayata;
K01vinv172u:215: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca rājño brahmadattasya pratiśrutya,
K01vinv172u:218: yat khalu somya kumāra jānīyās tvaṃ hi sukumāraḥ sukhaiṣī;
K01vinv172u:229: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣakebhyaḥ kāmebhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv172u:230: yāvajjīvaṃ te mānuṣikābhyo ratikrīḍābhyaḥ āvaraṇaṃ kartavyam;
K01vinv172u:231: ehi tvaṃ somya kumāra ihaiva sthito yauvarājyaṃ kāraya;
K01vinv172u:237: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ ca yena rājā brahmadattas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:251: athāmātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāḥ kumārāś ca yena kāśisundaraḥ kumāras tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:256: atha kāśisundaraḥ kumāraḥ maṇḍānupūrvīṃ kṛtvā kāyasya sthāma ca balaṃ ca vīryaṃ ca sañjanya vārāṇasyāḥ ca niṣkramya ṛṣīṇāṃ madhye pravrajitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:261: tasyaitayā matryā vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvāsam āpadyante;
K01vinv172u:279: gatvā śāntavihārasamanveṣaṇayā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramann anupūrveṇa pituḥ santakam udyānaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:280: tena tasmin paryaṭatā śāntaḥ pradeśo dṛṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:282: yāvad apareṇa samayena kalabhū rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu
K01vinv172u:284: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya khedam āpanno middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:285: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmas tasminn udyāne itaś ca amutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:286: yāvat paśyanti kṣāntivādinam ṛṣim ekānte śānteryāpathe niṣaṇṇam;
K01vinv172u:287: dṛṣṭvā ca punar gauravāpyāyitacittasantatyaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ praṇāmaṃ kṛtvā parivāryāvasthitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:288: kṣāntivādī ṛṣis tās striyo śāntatareṇeryāpathena dharmaṃ deśayitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:289: yāvat kalabhū rājā nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya prabuddho na paśyaty antaḥpurajanam;
K01vinv172u:290: sa khaḍgam ādāya yuvatijanaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:291: yāvat paśyati kṣāntivādinaṃ riṣiṃ parivārya avasthitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:292: dṛṣṭvā ca punar īrṣyājanitakrodhaparyākulīkṛtātmabhāvaḥ tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:293: mātṛgrāmo rājñaḥ sakāśam avasthānaṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto vidrutaḥ;
K01vinv172u:300: idānīṃ kṣāntivādī vā bhavān na veti tena tasya hastau chinnau;
K01vinv172u:307: yadi tilaśatam api kṛtvā kṣepsyase kāyam urvyām
K01vinv172u:309: yasya mama śubhā maitrī cetasi paribhāvitā sadā kṣāntim
K01vinv172u:310: tāṃ notsahe vihantuṃ sutam iva sutavatsalā jananī //
K01vinv172u:311: sa evaṃ gāthābhir gītena rujaṃ vinodya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:312: yathaiṣa rājā kleśābhiniviṣṭabuddhir mamākāryākārya aṅgapratyaṅgāni chinatti;
K01vinv172u:314: kuśalamūlena kleśagaṇam ātmīyam abhinirjitya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau abhisaṃbuddhaḥ syām;
K01vinv172u:315: tataḥ prajñāśastreṇasya ākāryākārya tatprathamataḥ kleśān pramlāyeyam iti.
K01vinv172u:316: atha yā devatā kṣāntivādiny abhiprasannā sā saṃlakṣayati:
K01vinv172u:317: anena kalirājena ayam ṛṣir adūṣy anapakārī karacaraṇaśūnyo vyavasthāpitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:322: kṛtsnaṃ ca jīvalokam ājñāpaya nāśayiṣyāmi // iti;
K01vinv172u:324: karacaraṇanāśavikalaṃ kṛtaṃ mama śarīram ākulaṃ yena /
K01vinv172u:325: tasyāpi pāpam aṇv api necchāmi kutaḥ punar adūṣino jagataḥ //
K01vinv172u:326: tasyāpi yā devatā vārāṇasyām ītis tata itaḥ sṛṣṭā;
K01vinv172u:337: yā devatā kṣāntivādino ṛṣer abhiprasannā sā kupitā;
K01vinv172u:343: balimālyopahāraṃ kṛtvā kṣamāpayitavyā sa ca ṛṣir iti;
K01vinv172u:351: tad yuṣmābhir ītivyupaśamārthaṃ śvo balimālyopahārasametair udyānaṃ gatvā tasyāḥ pūjā saṃvidhātavyā iti. (SBV II 10)
K01vinv172u:352: janakāyas tām eva rātriṃ balimālyopahāraṃ samudānīya tad udyānaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:354: tato janakāyena śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavanīpakebhyo dānāni datvā devatāsthāne ca mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā sā devatā kṣamitā;
K01vinv172u:355: tato rājā ṛṣeḥ kṣāntivādinaḥ sakāśaṃ gatvā pādayor nipatya kṣamayitum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:356: kṣamasva me maharṣe yan mayā viṣayādhyavasitena krodhaparyākulīkṛtamatinā tavāparāddham iti;
K01vinv172u:361: gātreṣu vahasi śastraṃ maitrī me sarvasatveṣu /
K01vinv172u:362: yadi saṃśayo 'tra bhavatāṃ paśyata rudhiraṃ prasannaṃ me // iti;
K01vinv172u:364: pāpakarmakārī sa rājā prātihāryasandarśanenāpi na śraddhatte;
K01vinv172u:369: tato bodhisatvaḥ chinnāny aṅgapratyaṅgāni yathāsve sthāne sthāpayitvā satyopayācanayā gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K01vinv172u:370: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu tvayā rājan yathā na me /
K01vinv172u:371: āghāto 'sti susūkṣmo 'pi syān me kāyas tathā purā // iti;
K01vinv172u:374: aho vratam idaṃ siddham aho dharmas svanuṣṭhitaḥ /
K01vinv172u:375: chidyamāneṣu gātreṣu yasya te nāsti vikriyā //
K01vinv172u:376: rājā kalabhūḥ sāntaḥpurāmātyapauranajānapadaḥ tasya ṛṣeḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā prakrāntaḥ.
K01vinv172u:380: yo 'sau kalibhū rājā eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyabhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:381: yan mayā tasyāntike maitracittam utpādya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam,
K01vinv172u:382: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlenāsya ākāryākārya kleśān chedayeyam iti; (SBV II 11)
K01vinv172u:383: tatpraṇidhānavaśād etarhi tathāgatena asya ākāryākārya dharmo deśitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:385: pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:386: yadā bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:387: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi dharmarasena saṃgṛhya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
K01vinv172u:389: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani mayaitāni aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣeṇa saṃgṛhya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
K01vinv172u:391: The story of the two merchants
K01vinv172u:392: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau abhūvatāṃ viśvabhuk suyātraś ca;
K01vinv172u:396: tenaikākinā vīryam āsthāya anācāryeṇānupādhyāyakena saptatriṃśadbodhipakṣyān dharmān saṃmukhīkṛtya pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣākṛtā;
K01vinv172u:397: tasya te sārthikā sārthavāham apaśyantaḥ itaś cāmutaḥ ca samanveṣitum ārabdhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:398: yadā sarvathā nārāgayantas tadānīṃ viśvabhujaḥ sārthavāho 'navalokya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:404: tato viśvabhuk sārthavāha aśītyā vaṇiksahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ suyātraṃ sārthavāhaṃ samanveṣitum ārabdhaḥ udyānāvasathatapovaneṣu;
K01vinv172u:406: kasmāt tvaṃ sārtham apahāya pravrajita iti;
K01vinv172u:407: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
K01vinv172u:409: tena tāny aśītir vaṇiksahasrāṇi āmiṣopasaṃhāropasaṃhṛtāny uktāni:
K01vinv172u:411: asmai kārāḥ kṛtā niyataṃ phaladāyakā bhavanti;
K01vinv172u:413: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo' sāv viśvabhuk sārthavāha aham eva (SBV II 12)
K01vinv172u:415: yāni vaṇiksahasrāṇy etāny eva tāny aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi;
K01vinv172u:416: tadāpy etāni mayāmiṣeṇopasaṃhṛtya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
K01vinv172u:417: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasenopasaṃhṛtya satyeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāni;
K01vinv172u:418: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmāṇāṃ vyatimiśraḥ yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:419: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ,
K01vinv172u:422: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya saddharmarasena saṃtarpitā iti;
K01vinv172u:425: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
K01vinv172u:426: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
K01vinv172u:428: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
K01vinv172u:429: sārthavāhabhūtena paṃcakaiḥ kāntāramārge kṛcchrasaṃkaṭasaṃbādhaprāptāḥ salilaṃ vinā
K01vinv172u:430: prāṇair viyujyamānā devatāyācanaṃ kṛtvā māhendrā salilavarṣeṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:432: The story of the thirsty caravan
K01vinv172u:433: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ viśvabhuṅ nāma sārthavāhaḥ paṃcavaṇikśataiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃvyavaharann alpasalilakāntāramārgaṃ pratipannaḥ anupūrveṇa vindhyāṭavīṃ
K01vinv172u:436: paṃca tu vaṇijaḥ salilam alabhamānā atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtāḥ;
K01vinv172u:437: viśvabhuk sārthavāhas tān tathāvidhān dṛṣṭvā kāruṇyād ākaṃpitahṛdayo ūrdhvamukho devatāyācanaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:438: śṛṇvantu bhavantaḥ śivavaruṇakuberavāsavādyā devā yena satyena satyavacanena mama sarveṣu samapravṛttā dayā anena satyena satyavacanena māhendro devo varṣatu;
K01vinv172u:444: tena tathāvidhaṃ māhendraṃ varṣam utsṛṣṭaṃ enāsau vaṇiksārthaḥ saṃtarpitaḥ kāntāramārgaṃ samatikrāntaḥ. (SBV II 13)
K01vinv172u:446: yo 'sau viśvabhuk sārthavāhaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:447: ye te paṃca vaṇijaḥ salilavirahād atyarthaṃ kāhalībhūtā eta eva te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ;
K01vinv172u:448: tadāpy ete mayā salilena saṃtarpya kāntāramārgād uttāritāḥ;
K01vinv172u:449: etarhy api mayā ete saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāritāḥ.
K01vinv172u:450: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ,
K01vinv172u:451: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:452: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
K01vinv172u:455: āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena parimuktena jātijarāvyādhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
K01vinv172u:456: sarvajñena sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saṃsārakāntārād
K01vinv172u:459: yat tu mayāpi atīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
K01vinv172u:460: sārthavāhabhūtena ete svajīvitaparityāgena mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
K01vinv172u:462: The story of the merchant Dhanaratha
K01vinv172u:467: te tasya sārthavāhasya anyonyakathālāpasaumukhyā anyonyakṛtapraṇayā saṃvṛttāḥ;
K01vinv172u:468: yāvad anupūrveṇa samudratīram anuprāptaiḥ pratyekaṃ vahanāni sajjīkṛtāni;
K01vinv172u:470: sārthavāha vayaṃ tvayā vinā dhṛtiṃ na labhāmahe;
K01vinv172u:472: yady evam ihaivābhiruhataḥ vahanāni mucyantām iti;
K01vinv172u:477: yadā vahanaṃ vināśam upaiti tadā mama kaṇṭhe lageta,
K01vinv172u:491: yo 'sau dhanaratho nāma sārthavāha aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:492: ye te paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ tadāpy ete mayā mahāsamudrād uttārya ratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ;
K01vinv172u:493: etarhy apy mayā saṃsārakāntārād uttārya indriyabalabodhyaṅgaratnaiḥ saṃvibhaktāḥ.
K01vinv172u:496: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:497: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ājñātakauṇḍinyena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdati?
K01vinv172u:499: kauṇḍinyena bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām.
K01vinv172u:503: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ saṃdhano nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasaty āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito
K01vinv172u:504: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:509: tad yeṣāṃ yuṣmākaṃ dvādaśavarṣikam annapānam asti tair madviṣaye vastavyam;
K01vinv172u:514: bhoḥ puruṣa asti koṣṭhāgāre dvādaśavārṣikam annapānam iti;
K01vinv172u:519: mahad durbhikṣaṃ prādurbhūtaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāraḥ durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
K01vinv172u:520: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loke utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakā prāntāśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
K01vinv172u:521: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre anyatamasminn āśramapade paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni prativasanti;
K01vinv172u:522: yadā durbhikṣakālamṛtyubhayabhīto janakāyaḥ samantād vidrutaḥ tadā teṣāṃ piṇḍakā samucchinnāḥ;
K01vinv172u:523: te sarva eva saṃbhūya saṃdhanasya gṛhapates sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāḥ kathayanti: gṛhapate,
K01vinv172u:524: asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānām piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
K01vinv172u:528: asti bhoḥ puruṣa asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānam yad asmākaṃ syād eṣāṃ ca paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
K01vinv172u:530: saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍaka upanibaddha iti;
K01vinv172u:531: śrutvā aparāṇi paṃca pratyekabuddhaśatāni saṃdhānasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntāni;
K01vinv172u:533: gṛhapate asmākaṃ paṃcānāṃ pravrajitaśatānāṃ piṇḍakena yogodvahanaṃ kuruṣva iti;
K01vinv172u:535: āryakā dattam eva yuṣmākaṃ kiṃ bhūyaḥ prārthayata iti;
K01vinv172u:536: te kathayanti gṛhapate anye te vayam anye iti;
K01vinv172u:538: yady evaṃ koṣṭhāgārikaṃ tāvad avalokayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:540: bhoḥ puruṣa asti asmākaṃ koṣṭhāgāre annapānaṃ yad asmākaṃ syād asya ca pravrajitasahasrasya dvādaśavarṣāṇi iti;
K01vinv172u:548: tataḥ saṃdhānena gṛhapatinā dānaśālā māpitā dānādhisthāyikaḥ puruṣaḥ sthāpitaḥ kālārocakaś ca;
K01vinv172u:550: tasya pratyekabuddhasahasrasya yaḥ saṃghasthaviraḥ so 'tīva prāsādikaḥ chatrākāraśirās tāṃ parṣadaṃ chatrīkṛtyāvatiṣṭhate;
K01vinv172u:551: saṃdhānasya gṛhapater duhitā tasya saṃghasthavirasya (SBV II 16)
K01vinv172u:553: yāvad apareṇa samayena bhaktakāle devo varṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:554: tataḥ tayā dārikayā saṃghasthavirasya mūrdhni chatraṃ dhāritam;
K01vinv172u:555: bhuktasya ca pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
K01vinv172u:556: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ yādṛśo 'yam āryaḥ yathā cāyaṃ chatrīkṛtya parṣadi niṣaṇṇaḥ evam aham api chatrīkṛtya parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti.
K01vinv172u:558: yāsau saṃdhānasdya gṛhapater duhitā eṣa evāsau (A 431a)
K01vinv172u:560: yad anena kumārikābhūtena pratyekabuddhasaṃghasthavirasya chatraṃ vidhārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ evaṃvidhānāṃ guṇānāṃ lābhī syāṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadaṃ niṣīdeyam iti,
K01vinv172u:561: tad etarhi sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ chatrīkṛtya ca parṣadam avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:562: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:563: yadā bhagavatā ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:564: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmantam ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
K01vinv172u:566: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
K01vinv172u:568: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena ājñātakauṇḍinyam āgamya aśītir devatāsahasrāṇi
K01vinv172u:570: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ
K01vinv172u:571: vinipatitaśarīreṇa tiryagyonāv upapannena aśitikīṭasahasrāṇi kauṇḍinyaṃ kīṭikībhūtam
K01vinv172u:578: aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo mahāsamudre kacchapeṣūpapannas teṣām adhipatir babhūva;
K01vinv172u:579: yāvat paṃcavaṇikśatāni mahāsamudrayānapātraṃ pratipadya mahāsamudram (SBV II 17)
K01vinv172u:582: yāvad vahanaṃ makareṇa matsyajātenānayena vyasanam āpāditam;
K01vinv172u:586: alaṃ bhavatāṃ viṣādena mama pṛṣṭham abhiruheta ahaṃ vas tārayiṣyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:590: sa śrāntakāyaḥ teṣu saṃkīrṇeṣu grīvām abhiprasārya suptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:592: tasmād ekā kīṭikā paribhramantī gandhaṃ ghrātvā tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntā;
K01vinv172u:593: tatas taṃ mahatpramāṇākāravikāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritagatipracārikī kīṭikānagaram abhigatā;
K01vinv172u:594: svasvasaṃjñayā kīṭikāḥ prabodhya aśītiḥ kīṭikāsahasrāṇy ādāya kacchapasakāśaṃ gatā;
K01vinv172u:595: tataḥ taṃ suotaṃ mṛtam iva niśceṣṭaprāṇaṃ bhakṣayitum ārabdhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:596: yadāsya sthūlaṃ māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti śramanaparikhinno gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdho na cetayate;
K01vinv172u:597: yadā tu marmasthāneṣu māṃsaṃ bhakṣayanti tadā prabuddhaḥ paśyati kīṭikābhiḥ sarvaṃ śarīram ākīrṇam;
K01vinv172u:600: vā saṃparivartayiṣye vā niyatam etāḥ praghātayiṣyāmi;
K01vinv172u:602: iti viditvā chidyamāneṣu marmasu mucyamāneṣu saṃdhiṣu praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:603: yathā mayā etāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
K01vinv172u:604: tāny evam aham anāgate 'dhvani anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya saddharmarasena saṃtarpayeyam iti.
K01vinv172u:606: yo 'sau kīṭikānāṃ mārgoddeśika eṣa evāsau kauṇḍinyo bhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:607: yāni tāni aśītir kīṭikāsahasrāṇi tam āgamya māṃsarudhireṇa saṃtarpitāni,
K01vinv172u:610: etarhy apy etāni mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāni;
K01vinv172u:611: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:612: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā (SBV II 18)
K01vinv172u:613: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:614: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:616: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa vigatadveṣeṇa vigatamohena
K01vinv172u:618: sarvākārajñena sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya
K01vinv172u:620: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa sadveṣeṇa samohenāparimuktena jātijārāvyadhimaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsair
K01vinv172u:621: ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:623: The story of the king Vajrabāhu
K01vinv172u:624: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ vajrabāhur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:625: sa rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca mahati tyāge vartate;
K01vinv172u:630: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu dānaśālā māpayitvā śramaṇabrāhmaṇakṛpaṇavaṇīpakādhvagayācanakebhyo yo yenārthī tasmai tad anuprayacchata
K01vinv172u:631: evaṃ deva ity amātyā rajño vajrabāhor pratiśutya vārāṇasyāṃ caturṣu nagaradvāreṣu
K01vinv172u:635: samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca yakṣā ojohārā nirvāsitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:636: itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramanto vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
K01vinv172u:637: te gopālakān paśupālakān tṛṇahārakān kāṣṭhahārakān pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
K01vinv172u:638: bhavanto na yūyam asmān bibhīta? (SBV II 19)
K01vinv172u:639: iti; bhavantaḥ kimarthaṃ bibhīmaḥ yeṣām asmākaṃ rājā maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatvahitādhyāśayena trir divasasya maitrīṃ samāpadyate?
K01vinv172u:640: iti; tataḥ te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya vārāṇasyām caturṣu dvāreṣu dānaśālāṃ
K01vinv172u:641: pratyavekṣya vajrabāhuṃ rājānaṃ maitryā vyutthitaṃ jñātvā vinītaveṣadhāriṇo rajñaḥ
K01vinv172u:643: upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca rājānaṃ vardhayitvā ūcuḥ:
K01vinv172u:644: deva bubhukṣitāḥ smāhāreṇa anugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
K01vinv172u:646: bhavanta etān brāhmaṇān praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpayata iti;
K01vinv172u:651: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vīthyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ rudhiraṃ prayacchata iti;
K01vinv172u:656: kutaḥ sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasya pīḍām akṛtvā?
K01vinv172u:657: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
K01vinv172u:662: na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:663: kuśalāḥ bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
K01vinv172u:664: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śastranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:665: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtvā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣāḥ paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
K01vinv172u:667: yo 'sau vajrabāhur nāma rājā aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:668: ye amī paṃca yakṣā ojohārās te evāmī paṃca bhikṣavaḥ;
K01vinv172u:669: tadāpy ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ) ;
K01vinv172u:670: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
K01vinv172u:671: yadā bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe
K01vinv172u:672: yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitās tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ
K01vinv172u:674: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena (SBV II 20)
K01vinv172u:675: saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:677: kim atra bhikṣava āścaryaṃ yad idānīṃ mayā vigatarāgeṇa yāvat sarvajñānajñeyavaśiprāptena
K01vinv172u:678: paṃcakā bhikṣavaḥ saddharmarasena saṃtarpya saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme
K01vinv172u:680: yat tu mayātīte 'dhvani sarāgeṇa pūrvavat duḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsaiḥ ete svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:683: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ maitrabalo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad bahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:685: yāvad apareṇa samayena vaiśravaṇena rājñā aḍakavattāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ paṃca ojohārā yakṣāḥ kasmiṇcid eva aparādhe pravāsitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:686: te taṃ janapadam anvāhiṇḍya vārāṇasīm anuprāptāḥ;
K01vinv172u:691: deva vārāṇasyām atīva janakāyo mṛta iti;
K01vinv172u:696: tad yuṣmābhir api sarvasatvānugatā maitrī manasi kartavyā;
K01vinv172u:698: te sarvasatvānugatāṃ maitrīṃ manasi kartum ārabdhā;
K01vinv172u:701: te praveśam alabhamānā gopālakāṃ paśupālakān tṛṇahārakāṃ kāṣṭhahārakāṃ pathājīvān utpathājīvāṃś ca manuṣyān dṛṣṭvā kathayanti:
K01vinv172u:706: vayaṃ hi yad rājā maitrabalaś cintayati tac cintayāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:710: idam atra kāraṇaṃ yena vayam idānīm avatāraṃ na labhāmaha iti;
K01vinv172u:714: yāvad apareṇa samayena maitrabalo rājā bahir udyānāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:715: tatas te brāhmaṇaveṣam ātmānam abhinirmāya śānteryāpathena rājānam upasaṃkramya jayenāyuṣā ca vardhayitvocuḥ:
K01vinv172u:724: saṃbhavo 'sti rudhirasya vā vithyā dharmanyāyalabdhaṃ māṃsaṃ rudhiraṃ ca prayacchata iti;
K01vinv172u:725: deva sadyohatarudhiramāṃsabhakṣā vayaṃ sadyohatena māṃsenānugrahaṃ kuruṣva iti;
K01vinv172u:727: kutas sadyohatasya māṃsarudhirasya saṃbhavaḥ parasyapīḍām akṛtvā;
K01vinv172u:728: yanv aham ebhyaḥ svarudhiram anuprayaccheyam iti;
K01vinv172u:730: bhavanto mama sarvāṅgikaṃ śirāvedhaṃ kuruta iti yācanakajanaṃ saṃtarpayiṣyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:732: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣāṇām arthāya devasya śarīre śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:733: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
K01vinv172u:734: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śāstranipātaḥ kṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:735: tataḥ svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya teṣāṃ tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā te yakṣā paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ.
K01vinv172u:737: yo 'sau maitrabalo nāma rājā 'bhūd aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:740: tadāpy ete mayā svarudhireṇa saṃtarpya paṃcasu vratapadeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:741: etarhy apy ete mayā saddharmarasena saṃtarpitāḥ saṃsārakāntārād uttāryātyantaniṣṭhe yogakṣeme nirvāṇe pratiṣṭhāpitā.
K01vinv172u:747: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:748: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritam;
K01vinv172u:750: tathāgatenaivaitāni bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām. (SBV II
K01vinv172u:751: The story of Nandapāla the Potter (= Ghaṭīkarasutta, MN 81, cf. MV I 319ff.)
K01vinv172u:752: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vaibhiḍiṅgī nāma grāmanigamo 'bhūd ṛddhaś ca sphītaś ca bahujanamanuṣyaś ca;
K01vinv172u:753: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nyagrodho nāma brāhmaṇamahāśālaḥ prativasati,
K01vinv172u:755: vaibhiḍiṅgīṃ paribhuṃkte sotsadāṃ satṛṇakāṣṭhodakāṃ kṛkinā rājñā brahmadeyāṃ dattām;
K01vinv172u:756: nyagrodhasya khalu bhikṣavo brāhmaṇamahaśālasya uttaro nāmo māṇavo 'ntevāsī upeto
K01vinv172u:757: mātṛtaḥ pitṛtaḥ saṃśuddho gṛhiṇyām anākṣipto jātivādena gotravādena ca yāvad āsaptamaṃ
K01vinv172u:759: adhyāpako mantradharo trayāṇāṃ vedānāṃ pāraṃgataḥ sanighaṇṭukaiṭabhānāṃ sākṣaraprabhedānām itihāsapaṃcamānāṃ sādṛśo vyākarakaḥ,
K01vinv172u:761: nyagrodhasya brāhmaṇamahaśālasya paṃcamātrāṇi māṇavakaśatāni brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayanti;
K01vinv172u:762: vaibhiḍiṅgyāṃ bhikṣavo grāmanigame nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:764: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:766: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:767: duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatya āgataphalābhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalo na svahastaṃ pṛthivīṃ khanati na khānayati; nānyatra,
K01vinv172u:768: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvā ekāntam upanikṣipya evam āha:
K01vinv172u:769: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu
K01vinv172u:773: uttarasya māṇavasya mitraṃ suhṛd vayasyako ca nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:774: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:776: nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
K01vinv172u:777: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
K01vinv172u:778: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā utthāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:779: tena khalu samayena uttaro māṇavaḥ sarvaśvetaṃ vaḍavāratham abhiruhya sauvarṇena daṇḍakamaṇḍalunā dhāryamānena māṇavakagaṇaparivṛto māṇavakagaṇapuraskṛto vaibhiḍiṅgyān niryāti;
K01vinv172u:780: bahir vaibhiḍiṅgyāḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān vācayitukāmaḥ adrākṣīd uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ dūrād eva;
K01vinv172u:782: kutas tvaṃ somya nandīpāla etarhy āgacchasi?
K01vinv172u:783: ito 'haṃ somya uttara etarhy āgacchāmi kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paryupāsya;
K01vinv172u:786: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭenālaṃ paryupāsitena;
K01vinv172u:790: mā tvaṃ somya uttara evaṃ vada:
K01vinv172u:795: dvir api trir api nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ uttaraṃ māṇavakam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:798: dvir api trir api uttaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avoat:
K01vinv172u:799: alaṃ somya nandīpāla kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena dṛṣṭena alaṃ paryupāsitena;
K01vinv172u:803: mā tvaṃ somyottara evaṃ vada kutas tasmin muṇḍake śramaṇake bodhiḥ;
K01vinv172u:807: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkara uttarasya māṇavasya ratham abhiruhya uttaraṃ māṇavam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:813: yatredaṇīṃ nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro dīrgharātram acaṇḍo 'rabhaso 'karkaśa 'sāhasikaḥ keśagrahaṇam apy agamad iti viditvā nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam
K01vinv172u:823: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaś ca ghaṭīkaraḥ ratham abhiruhya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
K01vinv172u:824: tayor yāvatī yānasya bhūmis tāvad yānena gatvā yānād avatīrya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntau;
K01vinv172u:825: upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
K01vinv172u:826: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:828: māṇavo na buddhe 'bhiprasanno na dharme na saṃghe 'bhiprasannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:829: sādhv asya bhagavān tathā dharmaṃ deśayed yathā uttaro māṇavo buddhe 'bhiprasīded dharme saṃghe 'bhiprasīded iti;
K01vinv172u:830: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddha uttaraṃ māṇavaṃ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
K01vinv172u:831: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
K01vinv172u:832: athottaro māṇavo nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaram idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:835: svākhyātaṃ dharmavinayaṃ śrutvā na pravrajasi samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anāgārikām?
K01vinv172u:838: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena ca kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayāmi;
K01vinv172u:839: pravraja tvaṃ somya nandīpāla mā vā;
K01vinv172u:841: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:842: ayaṃ bhadanta uttaro māṇava ākāṃkṣati svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvam;
K01vinv172u:843: taṃ bhagavān pravrājayatūpasaṃpādayatu anukaṃpām upādāya iti;
K01vinv172u:846: atha nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt
K01vinv172u:847: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaś aciraprakrāntaṃ nandīpālaṃ ghaṭīkaraṃ viditvā uttaraṃ
K01vinv172u:848: māṇavaṃ pravrājya upasaṃpādya yathābhiramyaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgyāṃ vihṛtya yena vārāṇasī
K01vinv172u:852: aśrauṣīt kṛkī rājā kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kāśiṣu janapade cārikāṃ caran vārāṇasīm anuprāpto vārāṇasyāṃ viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve iti;
K01vinv172u:853: śrutvā ca punar vārāṇasyāḥ niṣkramya yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:854: upasaṃkramya upasaṃkramya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
K01vinv172u:855: ekāntaniṣaṇṇaṃ kṛkiṃ rājānaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddho dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
K01vinv172u:856: anekaparyāyeṇa dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśya samādāpya samuttejya saṃpraharṣya tūṣṇīm;
K01vinv172u:857: atha kṛkī rājā utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṃgaṃ kṛtvā yena kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ tenāñjaliṃ praṇamya kāśyapam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:858: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena iti;
K01vinv172u:859: adhivāsayati kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkino rājñas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
K01vinv172u:860: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā kāsyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvotthāyāsanāt
K01vinv172u:861: atha kṛkī rājā tām eva rātriṃ śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ samudānīya kālyam evotthāyāsanakāni prajñapya udakamaṇiṃ pratiṣṭhāpya (A 434b)
K01vinv172u:863: samayo bhadanta sajjaṃ bhaktaṃ yasyedānīṃ bhagavān kālaṃ manyate iti;
K01vinv172u:864: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto yena kṛkeḥ rājño bhaktābhisāras
K01vinv172u:865: upasaṃkramya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:866: atha kṛkī rājā sukhopaniṣaṇṇaṃ buddhapramukhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ viditvā śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpayati saṃpravārayati;
K01vinv172u:867: anekaparyāyeṇa śucinā praṇītena khādanīyabhojanīyena svahastaṃ saṃtarpya saṃpravārya
K01vinv172u:868: kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ bhuktavantaṃ viditvā dhautahastam apanītapātraṃ sauvarṇaṃ
K01vinv172u:871: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
K01vinv172u:874: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:875: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
K01vinv172u:876: dvir api trir api kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:877: adhivāsayatu me bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ bhikṣusaṃghena;
K01vinv172u:880: anena caivaṃrūpena parṇopagūḍhena śālinā bhagavantaṃ upasthāsyāmi bhikṣusaṃghaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:881: dvir api trir api kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ kṛkiṃ rājānam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:882: alaṃ mahārājā kṛtam etāvad yāvad eva cittam abhiprasannam;
K01vinv172u:883: atha kṛkī rājā kāśyapaṃ saṃyaksaṃbuddham idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:884: asti kaścid bhagavan yo 'py evaṃrūpa upasthāyakaḥ tadyathā aham etarhy?
K01vinv172u:885: asti mahārāja tavaiva vijite vaibhiḍiṃgī nāma grāmanigamaḥ;
K01vinv172u:888: buddhaṃ śaraṇaṃ gato dhammaṃ saṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:890: buddhe niṣkāṃkṣo nirvicikitso dharme saṃghe duḥkhe samudaye nirodhe mārge niṣkāṃkṣo
K01vinv172u:891: nirvicikitso dṛṣṭasatye āgataphalo 'bhisamitavāṃ nikṣiptaparṇamusalaḥ sa na svahastaṃ
K01vinv172u:893: yat tad bhavati dakaprarugnaṃ vā mūṣikotkirā vā tataḥ kāyena mṛttikāṃ saṃhṛtya niṣprāṇakenodakena tīmayitvā bhājanāni kṛtvaikāntam upanikṣipyaivam
K01vinv172u:894: eta āryā eta bhadramukhā tilān vā taṇḍulān vā mudgaprabhṛtīn vā māṣaprabhṛtīn vā ekānta upanikṣipya yo vā yena bhājanenārthī bhavati sa tad ādāya prakrāmatu;
K01vinv172u:896: māṃ ca kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādayati; (SBV II 27)
K01vinv172u:897: ekam ahaṃ mahārāja samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya viharāmi;
K01vinv172u:898: so 'haṃ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣam; (A 435a)
K01vinv172u:899: sāvādānaṃ vaibhiḍaṃgīṃ piṇḍāya caran yena ghaṭīkarasya niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:901: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ bahir nirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
K01vinv172u:904: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
K01vinv172u:908: praviśatu āryaḥ praviśatu bhadramukha ete kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikam;
K01vinv172u:911: so 'haṃ mahārāja uttarakauravaṃ samayam adhiṣṭhāya svayam eva kuṇḍalikāyāḥ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikaṃ gṛhītvā bhuktavān;
K01vinv172u:913: adrākṣīn nandīpālo ghaṭīkaraḥ kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣān piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktam;
K01vinv172u:914: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:915: amba tāta kenaite kuṇḍalikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ
K01vinv172u:918: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasyāśrauṣva argaḍakasyākoṭanaśabdam;
K01vinv172u:920: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukhaḥ śanair mandamandam argaḍam ākoṭayati?
K01vinv172u:921: sa evam āha: ahaṃ kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ piṇḍakenārthī;
K01vinv172u:927: tena te kuṇḍālikāyāṃ kulmāṣāḥ piṭhirikāyāṃ ca sūpikaṃ paribhuktaṃ bhaviṣyati;
K01vinv172u:929: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam
K01vinv172u:930: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ
K01vinv172u:931: cāsya satatasahagatā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na vijahāti;
K01vinv172u:933: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ yathā kuṇḍālikāyāḥ kulmāṣam. piṭhirikāyaś ca sūpikam evaṃ kuṇḍikāyā odanaṃ piṭhirikāyāś ca sūpikam;
K01vinv172u:935: samayaṃ vaibhiḍiṃgīṃ grāmanigamam upaniśritya ahaṃ varṣā upagataḥ;
K01vinv172u:937: tena khalu samayena nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālā navatṛṇapraticchannā 'bhūt;
K01vinv172u:939: gacchata yūyaṃ bhikṣavo nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasyāveśanaśālāṃ navatṛṇapraticchannām avacchādya mama vihāraṃ chādayata;
K01vinv172u:940: te mama om iti pratiśrutya nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayanti;
K01vinv172u:941: tena khalu samayena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro bahirnirgato 'bhūt kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
K01vinv172u:945: ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
K01vinv172u:946: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
K01vinv172u:947: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
K01vinv172u:948: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkārasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:949: tāv evam āhatuḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
K01vinv172u:950: tais tām avacchādya mama vihāraḥ praticchāditaḥ;
K01vinv172u:951: paścād āgato nandīpālo ghaṭīkaro 'drākṣīn navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchāditāṃ;
K01vinv172u:952: dṛṣṭvā ca punar andhau mātāpitarāv idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:953: amba tāta kenaiṣā navatṛṇapraticchannā āveśanaśālā avacchāditā;
K01vinv172u:955: iha te somya nandīpāla aciranirgatasya aśrauṣva navatṛṇapraticchannāyā āveśanaśālāyā avacchādanaśabdam;
K01vinv172u:956: śrutvā ca punar evaṃ vadāvaḥ ka eṣa āryaḥ ka eṣa bhadramukho navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādayati?
K01vinv172u:957: te evam āhur vayaṃ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasyopasthāyikāḥ;
K01vinv172u:958: kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya tatprathamavarṣiṇā devena vihāro vṛṣyate;
K01vinv172u:959: te vayaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannām āveśanaśālām avacchādya kāśyapasya samyaksaṃbuddhasya vihāraṃ praticchādayāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:960: tān āvām evaṃ vadāvaḥ harata āryā harata bhadramukhā bahirnirgato vaḥ upasthāyakaḥ;
K01vinv172u:963: lābhā me sulabdhā yasya me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam (SBV II 29)
K01vinv172u:964: āpannaḥ iti viditvā tenaiva prītiprāmodyena saptāham ekaparyaṃkenātināmayati ardhamāsaṃ cāsya satatasamitā smṛtiḥ kāyaṃ na jahāti;
K01vinv172u:966: saptāhaṃ mātāpitroḥ taṃ khalu varṣāvāsaṃ nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasyāveśanaśālā ekavāribindunāpi nābhivṛṣṭā;
K01vinv172u:967: yathāpitad buddhasya buddhānubhāvena devatānāṃ ca devatānubhāvena.
K01vinv172u:968: syāt khalu te mahārāja cetaso 'nyathātvam nādhivāsayati me kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhas traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkārān?
K01vinv172u:969: na tv eva nandīpālasya ghaṭīkarasya navatṛṇapraticchannāyām āveśanaśālāyām avacchāditāyāṃ cetaso 'nyathātvaṃ;
K01vinv172u:970: lābhā bhadanta nandīpālena ghaṭīkareṇa sulabdhā yasyāsya bhagavān kule 'tyarthaṃ viśvasto viśvāsam āpannaḥ.
K01vinv172u:971: atha kāsyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkeḥ rājñas taddānam anayābhyanumodanayābhyanumodate;
K01vinv172u:973: rājā mukhaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ sāgaro mukham //
K01vinv172u:974: nakṣatrāṇāṃ mukhaṃ candra ādityas tapatāṃ mukham /
K01vinv172u:975: ūrdhvaṃ tiryag adhaś cāpi yāvatī jagato gatiḥ /
K01vinv172u:977: atha kāśyapaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ kṛkiṇaṃ rājānaṃ dharmyayā kathayā (A 436a)
K01vinv172u:979: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yatrotsadanadharmakaṃ tat sarvaṃ visarjanadharmakam iti kṛtvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:980: atha kṛkī rājā kāsyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ yāvat tāvat pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhya
K01vinv172u:981: kāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ trir pradakṣiṇīkṛtya tata eva pratinivṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:982: atha kṛkī rājā aciraprakrāntaṃ kāśyapaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ viditvā anyatamaṃ puruṣam āmantrayate:
K01vinv172u:983: ehi tvaṃ bhoḥ puruṣa parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālo ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāma;
K01vinv172u:986: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni parṇopagūḍhasya śāler anupreṣitāni;
K01vinv172u:987: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
K01vinv172u:988: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
K01vinv172u:989: evaṃ deva iti sa puruṣaḥ kṛke rajñaḥ pratiśrutya parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pūrayitvā yena nandīpālp ghaṭīkaras tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:991: imāni te somya nandīpāla kṛkiṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāny anupreṣitāni;
K01vinv172u:992: atas tvam ātmānaṃ samyak sukhena prīṇaya andhaṃ ca mātāpitaram;
K01vinv172u:993: kāśyapaṃ ca samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ kālena kālaṃ piṇḍakena pratipādaya;
K01vinv172u:994: bhoḥ puruṣa rājā bahukṛtyo bahukaraṇīya ity uktvā nādhivāsayati.
K01vinv172u:996: yo 'sau uttaro māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:997: yan mayā kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe kharaṃ vākkarma niścaritaṃ:
K01vinv172u:1000: tasya karmaṇo vipākena etarhi mayā ṣaḍvarṣāṇi duṣkaraṃ caritaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1001: yadi punar bodhir apavaditābhaviṣyat punar api mayā triṇi kalpāsaṃkhyeyāni ātmabodhinimittaṃ parikhedito 'bhaviṣyam;
K01vinv172u:1002: iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1005: yam eva divasaṃ bodhisatvo nirgatas tam eva divasaṃ yaśodharā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:1006: yadā bodhisatvo duṣkarāṇi carati tadāntaḥpuram api duṣkaraṃ caritum ārabdhaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1008: yadā bhagavān niṣkiṃcanaṃ duṣkaram iti viditvā yathāsukham āśvasiti;
K01vinv172u:1011: sarpistailābhyāṃ gātrāṇi mrakṣayati sukhodakena ca kāyaṃ pariṣiṃcati;
K01vinv172u:1017: tadāsau garbhaḥ punar api puṣṭiṃ gataḥ tasyā (SBV II 31)
K01vinv172u:1020: tvaṃ bodhisatve tapovanaṃ gate vyabhicaritā iti;
K01vinv172u:1029: tam eva divasaṃ rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1034: asya janmani rāhuṇā candro gṛhītaḥ tad bhavatu dārakasya rāhula iti nāma iti;
K01vinv172u:1035: jāte kumāre bhūyasyā mātrayā śākyā vibruvate eva;
K01vinv172u:1036: tayāsau satyopayācanaṃ kṛtvā rāhulabhadro bodhisatvasya vyāyāmaśilāyāṃ sthāpayitvā krīḍāpuṣkariṇyām āplāvitaḥ:
K01vinv172u:1037: yady ayaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ plavatām iti;
K01vinv172u:1044: bhūyo 'pi bhavatāṃ pratyakṣīkariṣyāmi yathāyaṃ bodhisatvena jātaḥ,
K01vinv172u:1046: yadā bhagavān atikrāntaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇy abhisaṃbuddhaḥ kapilavastv anuprāptaḥ ekaṃ divasaṃ rājakule bhuṃkte,
K01vinv172u:1049: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenāhaṃ bhagavantam anvāvarteyam it;
K01vinv172u:1050: kapilavastuni cānyatamā parivrājikā vaśīkaraṇādikarmasv atyarthaṃ pravīṇā;
K01vinv172u:1052: ārye kārṣāpaṇair vaśīkaraṇaṃ kṛtvā preṣaya iti;
K01vinv172u:1054: yaśodharayā rāhulasya haste datta uktaś ca:
K01vinv172u:1055: putra yas tava pitā tasmai anuprayaccha iti;
K01vinv172u:1056: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1061: rāhulena sarvān buddhān pratyavekṣya bhagavato vṛddhānte sthitasya dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1065: rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhato 'nubaddhaḥ nirvartyamāno 'pi na nirvartate:
K01vinv172u:1068: na śakyam anena gṛhavāse vastum (SBV II 32)
K01vinv172u:1069: iti; rāhulena bhagavataḥ pratyabhijñātena kṛtena rājā śuddhodanaḥ sāntaḥpurajanaḥ śākyāś ca paraṃ vismayam upagatāḥ yaśodharāyāṃ cātyartham
K01vinv172u:1075: yadi rāhulabhadraḥ kumāro 'vaśyaṃ pravrājyate adyaikaṃ divasaṃ tiṣṭhatu yāvad aham asya pūjāṃ karomi iti;
K01vinv172u:1076: rājñā śuddhodanena rāhulasya mahān utsavaḥ kṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1081: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya rāhulabhadraḥ kumāraḥ pravrājitaḥ.
K01vinv172u:1082: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1083: paśya bhadantāyuṣmatā rāhulena bhagavān modakena mahājanakāyasya madhye vijñāta iti;
K01vinv172u:1085: na bhikṣava etarhyi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anena rāhulena mālayā vijñātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1087: The story of the great thief
K01vinv172u:1088: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatarasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:1090: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:1095: gacchāmi paṇyam ādāya mahāsamudram avatarāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1100: tatas tasya patnyā śokavinodanaṃ kṛtvā sa dārako hastabalena jñātibalena cāpyāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1103: sā tasya svaśilpād bhogasaṃpattiṃ dṛṣṭvā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:1105: tasmin gate anayena vyasanam āpadyante iti;
K01vinv172u:1107: bhrāta imam api bhāgineyaṃ kuvindakarma śikṣayeti;
K01vinv172u:1114: sa kuvindaḥ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkte;
K01vinv172u:1116: mātula tvam api tad eva karma karoṣi;
K01vinv172u:1118: atha kasmāt tvaṃ susnātaḥ suprāvṛtaḥ praṇītam āhāraṃ bhuṃkṣe;
K01vinv172u:1124: mātula yady evam aham api cauryaṃ karomi;
K01vinv172u:1130: tena tatra śaśakaḥ krītvā tasya dattaḥ bhāgineya sādhaya tāvad yad ahaṃ snātvāgacchāmi;
K01vinv172u:1132: tena taṃ laghu laghv eva sādhayitvā ekapādo bhakṣitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1139: sa kathayati bhāgineyāsya caturthaḥ pādaḥ kva gataḥ?
K01vinv172u:1146: sa tam ādāya tripādakaṃ ca śaśakaṃ pānāgāraṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
K01vinv172u:1158: śakyam anena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum iti;
K01vinv172u:1159: sa tena sārdhaṃ cauryaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1160: sa kuvindaḥ sandhau śiraḥ prakṣipati; tenocyate:
K01vinv172u:1161: mātula cauryam api na jñāyate tvayā kartuṃ;
K01vinv172u:1167: tataś coraś cora iti kolāhalo jāta iti padbhyāṃ gṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1170: sa śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1172: deva ekaś coraḥ sandhiṃ praviṣṭo gṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1173: tasya ko 'pi śiraś chitvā tad ādāya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1177: gacchata taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe tiṣṭhata;
K01vinv172u:1178: yas taṃ gṛhītvā roditi tenaikacoreṇa bhavitavyaṃ,
K01vinv172u:1180: tatas te rājapuruṣāḥ taṃ kabandhaṃ caturmahāpathe sthāpayitvā pratigupte pradeśe sthitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1182: na nāma mayā mātulaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā roditavyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1184: ātmānaṃ kṛtvā striyam api kaṇṭhe gṛhṇāti;
K01vinv172u:1185: puruṣam api vṛkṣam api aśvam api vṛṣabham api mahiṣam api chāgam api kukkuram api grahītum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1186: yadā lokena vijñāta unmattako 'yam iti tadā taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1188: deva unmattakas taṃ kabandhaṃ kaṇṭhe gṛhītvā yāvadāptaṃ ruditvā prakrānta iti;
K01vinv172u:1191: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1195: iti; sa śākaṭikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā kāṣṭhasya śakaṭaṃ pūrayitvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1196: tasyopari śakaṭaṃ kāṣṭhapūrṇaṃ sthāpayitvā balīvardān utsṛjya śakaṭe agniṃ datvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1203: bhavanto yo 'sau śākaṭikaḥ sa evāsāv ekacorikaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1204: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1207: na nāma mayā mātulasya śmaśāne pitṛkāryaṃ kṛtam iti;
K01vinv172u:1208: sa brahmaṇaveṣaṃ kṛtvā adhiṣṭhāne bhikṣām aṭitvā taya tāṃ bhikṣāṃ śmaśāne paktvā piṇḍān datvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1210: deva brāhmaṇenādhiṣṭhāne bhikṣām aṭitvā yasmin pradeśe sa kabandho dagdhaḥ tatra paṃca piṇḍān datvā prakrānta iti;
K01vinv172u:1213: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhīta iti;
K01vinv172u:1215: na nāma mayā mātulasyāsthīni gaṃgāyāṃ prakṣeptavyāni?
K01vinv172u:1216: iti; sa kāpālikaveṣaṃ kṛtvā taṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1217: sa tatra gātraṃ bhasmanā uddhūlayitvā asthīnāṃ bhasmanāṃ ca karparakaṃ pūrayitvā gaṃgāyāṃ prakṣipya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1221: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1226: rājño duhitā abhirūpā darśanīyā prāsādikā tasmin jalodyāne sthāpitā;
K01vinv172u:1227: uktā ca yadi tvāṃ kaścid gṛhṇāti rāvayiṣyasi iti:
K01vinv172u:1229: yadaiṣā rāvayati tadā yuṣmābhir jalodyānaṃ gantavyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1230: yadi kaścit tatra puruṣo bhavati sa gṛhītvā māṃ neyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1232: na nāma mayā rājaduhitryā sārdhaṃ paricārayitavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:1242: ārakṣakā riktapiṭharikā eta uhyante ity apy upekṣitā vyavasthitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1243: tato 'sāv ekacorikaḥ riktapiṭharikāyāṃ śiraḥ prakṣipya śrotasā uhyamānas taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1250: eṣa coro māṃ paricārya gacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:1257: na śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ yan na gṛhītaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1258: dārikā coreṇa sārdhaṃ paricārayitvā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:1259: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām (A 438a)
K01vinv172u:1264: na mayā putrasya janmani pramodaḥ kṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1265: sa kāṃcukīyam ātmānaṃ kṛtvā rājakulān nirgamya pauruṣeyān āmantrayate:
K01vinv172u:1266: bhavanto deva ājñāpayati pattanaṃ luṇṭhayata iti;
K01vinv172u:1277: rājyaṃ vā parityajāmi tasya vā nigrahaṃ karomi iti;
K01vinv172u:1280: ājñā dattā: bhavanta adhiṣṭhāne evaṃvidhaṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata;
K01vinv172u:1281: yāvanto puruṣāḥ prativasanti taiḥ sarvair niṣparihārair bhūtvā maṇḍalavāṭaṃ praveṣṭavyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1282: yo na praviśati tasya vadho daṇḍa iti;
K01vinv172u:1285: tato rājñā tasmai dārakāya mālāṃ datvā uktaṃ:
K01vinv172u:1286: yas tava pitā tasmai tāṃ mālām anuprayaccha iti;
K01vinv172u:1288: yasyāyaṃ dārako mālāṃ dadāti yuṣmābhir gṛhītvā matsakāśam upaneyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1289: tatas tāṃ puṣpamālāṃ gṛhītvā paribhramitum ārabdho janakāyān nirīkṣamāṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1301: tena tasmai sā duhitā sarvālaṃkāravibhūṣitā bhāryārthaṃ dattā;
K01vinv172u:1304: yo 'sāv ekacorika aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1305: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau rāhulas tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1307: etarhy apy aham anena modakena vijñātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1308: evaṃ hi vo bhikṣavo 'cintyaḥ satvānāṃ karmavipākaḥ iti karmaparāyaṇair bhavitavyaṃ.
K01vinv172u:1309: Yaśodharā seeks to bring the Buddha back to her
K01vinv172u:1311: yadi rāhulasya pitā antaḥpuraṃ praviśati tathāivānucaritavyo yathā na bhūyo nirgacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:1312: tata ātmānam ādau kṛtvā gopikāmṛgajāpramukhāni ṣaṣṭistrīsahasrāṇi nānāvidhālaṃkārair alaṃkṛtāni surabhimālyadhūpavastrair vibhūṣitāni;
K01vinv172u:1313: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛto bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛto vineyajanāpekṣā antaḥpuraṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1318: etāḥ striyāḥ kāmarāgābhibhūtāḥ satyānām abhājanabhūtā (SBV II 37)
K01vinv172u:1322: viditvā pūrvasyāṃ diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati;
K01vinv172u:1323: tadyathā caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati śayyāṃ kalpayati;
K01vinv172u:1325: tejodhātusamāpannasya buddhasya bhagavato vividhāny arcīṃṣi kāyān niścaranti;
K01vinv172u:1326: tadyathā nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni maṃjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
K01vinv172u:1332: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśy avaṃ dakṣiṇāyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidham
K01vinv172u:1333: ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśayan ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya purastād bhikṣusaṃghasya
K01vinv172u:1335: atha tāḥ striyo bhagavata ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā āvarjitā mūlanikṛntā iva drumā bhagavataḥ pādayor nipatya purastān niṣaṇṇāḥ dharmaśravaṇāya;
K01vinv172u:1336: tato bhagavatā tāsām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
K01vinv172u:1337: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā gopikāmṛgajāpramukhaiḥ ṣaṣṭistrīsahasraiḥ srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1338: yaśodharāyā atyarthaṃ kāmarāgābhibhūtāyā satyadarśanaṃ na kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1340: yannv ahaṃ bhagavantaṃ rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvarteyam iti;
K01vinv172u:1341: viditvā svayam eva bhagavato 'rthāya annapānaṃ sādhayitvā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:1344: yaśodharā bhadanta bhagavantaṃ svahastaṃ rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvartayitukāma iti;
K01vinv172u:1346: pūrvam ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sarāgaḥ sadveṣaḥ samohaḥ rasapratisaṃvedī rasarāgapratisaṃvedī ca;
K01vinv172u:1347: etarhy ahaṃ vigatarāgo vigatadveṣo vigatamoho rasapratisaṃvedī no tu rasarāgapratisaṃvedī;
K01vinv172u:1348: tat katham idānīṃ yaśodharā rasatṛṣṇayā anvāvartayati iti.
K01vinv172u:1349: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1352: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvani aham anayā modakenānvāvartitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1355: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo anyatamasmin grāmake 'raṇyāyatane puṣpaphalasalilakandasaṃpanne riṣiḥ (A 439a)
K01vinv172u:1359: tasya vyāḍamṛgā apy āśramapade viśvastavihāriṇo viharanti;
K01vinv172u:1367: prasavanakāle tam eva deśam āgamya prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:1369: sā gandhaṃ ghrātvā visabhāgaḥ satvaḥ iti saṃtrastā mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī chorayitvā prakrāntā;
K01vinv172u:1370: yāvad asau riṣis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1372: sa samanvāhartuṃ pravṛttaḥ kasyāyaṃ putraḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1374: tena svāśramapadaṃ nītvā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1375: tasyāpi vṛddhiṃ gacchataḥ śirasi mṛgaḍṛṅge prādurbhūte;
K01vinv172u:1376: tasya mṛgasya yādṛśe śṛṅge iti riṣyaśṛṇga iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:1380: yadā tasya maraṇāntikī vedanā prādurbhūtā na cireṇa kālaṃ kariṣyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1382: putra asminn āśramapade nānādeśanivāsinaḥ riṣayaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmanti;
K01vinv172u:1383: te tvayā matpriyatayā svāgatavādasamudācāreṇa saṃmodya āsanenopanimantrayitavyā yathāśaktitaś ca phalamūlaiḥ pratipādyāḥ ity uktvā
K01vinv172u:1389: so 'pareṇa samayena salilārthī ghaṭam ādāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1394: tena pānīyastokaṃ gṛhītvā kṣipatā śāpo dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1396: tasmāt tvayā idaṃ divasam upādāya dvādaśavarṣāṇi na varṣitavyam (SBV II 39)
K01vinv172u:1401: bhavantaḥ kasyānubhāvād devo na varṣati iti;
K01vinv172u:1403: deva riṣiprakopād yady ayaṃ riṣis tasmāt tapasaḥ cālayituṃ śakyeta,
K01vinv172u:1412: yady asau riṣis tasmāt tapasaś cālyate evaṃ devo varṣayati;
K01vinv172u:1415: kas taṃ śaknoti tasmāt tapaśaś cālayitum (A 439b)
K01vinv172u:1416: iti; tasya rājño duhitā śāntā nāma;
K01vinv172u:1419: ahaṃ tathā kariṣyāmi yathāsau riṣis tasmāt tapasaḥ calati iti;
K01vinv172u:1422: māṃ brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhaya anyāṃś ca kanyāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1423: nausaṃkrame ca āśramapadaṃ kāraya puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam iti;
K01vinv172u:1424: tena brāhamṇakān mantrān pāṭhitā anyāś ca kanyāḥ,
K01vinv172u:1426: tataḥ tayā tāni phalāni vaśīkaraṇadravyaiḥ madyena ca samāpūritāni;
K01vinv172u:1427: aparāṇi ca nānāvicitrāṇi ca phalāni kāritāni;
K01vinv172u:1430: sā tābhiḥ kanyābhiḥ brāhmaṇakān mantrān pāṭhayantī āśramapadaṃ gatā;
K01vinv172u:1431: riṣeḥ śiṣyair niveditam upādhyāya bahavas tavāśramapadaṃ riṣaya āgatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1435: vyāyāmahīnā ca gatiḥ salīlā mukhāni ca śmaśruvivarjitāni /
K01vinv172u:1436: urāṃsi caiṣāṃ viṣamonnatāni veṣo hy apūrvo 'yaṃ mahāriṣīnām* //
K01vinv172u:1437: iti; tena tā vicikitsāparyākulīkṛtamatināpi mūlaphalaiḥ pravāritāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1438: tābhis tāni phalāni paribhujya sa riṣir abhihito:
K01vinv172u:1440: asmākaṃ tv āśramo jalamadhye yatra phalāny amṛtaprakhyāni;
K01vinv172u:1441: api tu tvam asmābhir āśramapade upanimantrito bhava;
K01vinv172u:1445: tasya tatra madyapūrṇāni vaśīkaraṇadravyasaṃyuktāni nārikelaphalāni ca dattāni;
K01vinv172u:1446: sa madyamadākṣipto vaśīkaraṇadravyayogāt tayā sārdhaṃ vipratipannaḥ riddhiparihīṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1450: adyāpi tvam ātmānaṃ na jānīṣe ko 'ham iti;
K01vinv172u:1451: sa tayā rāgapāśapāśito rājñaḥ sakāsam unnītaḥ deva ayaṃ sa riṣiḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1454: rājñā sā tasyaiva riṣer bhāryārthaṃ saparivārā dattā;
K01vinv172u:1455: sa śāntāṃ pratyākhyāya tābhir anyābhiḥ sārdhaṃ paricārayitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1456: tatra śāntā īrṣyākulīkṛtahṛdayā tasyāsatkāraṃ kartum ārabdhā;
K01vinv172u:1458: sa tayā sopānatkena pādena śirasi parāhataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1460: yo 'haṃ meghasyāpi garjitaṃ na sahe sa idānīṃ rāgapāśitaḥ strīmātreṇaivaṃ khalīkṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1461: tena vīryam āsthāya punar api paṃcābhijñāḥ sākṣātkṛtāḥ.
K01vinv172u:1463: yo 'sāv ṛṣir aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1466: etarhy apy eṣā māṃ modakenānvāvartituṃ pravṛttā.
K01vinv172u:1468: yadā bhagavān antaḥpurān bhuktvā niṣkrāmati tadā yaśodharayā nairāśyam āpannayā bhartuḥ snehavaimukhyāc charaṇapṛṣṭham abhiruhya ātmā muktaḥ; (A 440a)
K01vinv172u:1471: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1472: paśya bhadanta yaśodharayā bhagavanto 'rthāya śaraṇapṛṣṭhād ātmā muktaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1474: na bhikṣava etarhi yathātīte 'py adhvany anayā mamārthāyātmā parityaktaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1476: The story of the Kinnara and the Kinnarī
K01vinv172u:1477: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā babhūva;
K01vinv172u:1480: tena tatra kinnaraḥ kinnarī ca dṛṣṭā;
K01vinv172u:1483: rajñā ākarṇaṃ dhanuḥ pūrayitvā kinnaraḥ śareṇa marmani tāḍitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1489: anujānīhi māṃ yāvad asya kinnarasya śarīrapūjāṃ kariṣyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1492: paśyāmi tāvat katham asya śarīrapūjāṃ karoti iti;
K01vinv172u:1494: tatas tayā taṃ kinnaraṃ kāṣṭhair avaṣṭabhya citāṃ prajvālyātmā prakṣiptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1496: anyathā cintito py artha anyathā parivartitaḥ /
K01vinv172u:1499: yo 'sau kinnara aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1502: etarhy apy anayā mamārthāyātmā śaraṇapṛṣṭhān muktaḥ iti.
K01vinv172u:1506: yad aham enāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttārayeyam iti viditvā tasya tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
K01vinv172u:1507: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā yaśodharayā viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
K01vinv172u:1509: sā samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajitā;
K01vinv172u:1511: svakulasaṃśānurūpatayā āryamārgapratilambhāc ca bhikṣuṇīnāṃ madhye samutpanneṣu kāryeṣv atyarthaṃ jihreti;
K01vinv172u:1513: eṣāgrā me bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇīnāṃ mama śrāvikānāṃ hrīmatīnāṃ yaduta yaśodharā rāhulamātā iti.
K01vinv172u:1514: punar api bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1516: kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaḍvarṣāṇi kukṣiṇā garbho dhāritaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1518: yaśodharayaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātīṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehinām.
K01vinv172u:1519: The story of the two Ābhīrīs
K01vinv172u:1520: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasmin gokule dvau ābhīryau prativasataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1522: te abhikṣṇaṃ mathitaghaṭam ādāya grāmāntaṃ gacchataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1530: evaṃ tayāsau mātā ṣaṭkroṣān mathitaghaṭaṃ vāhitā.
K01vinv172u:1532: yāsāv ābhīrīduhitā eṣā eva sā yaśodharā tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1533: yad anayā mātā śāṭhyasamudācāreṇa ṣaṭkroṣān mathitaghaṭaṃ vāhitā,
K01vinv172u:1534: tasya karmaṇo vipākenānayā rāhulaḥ ṣaḍvarṣāṇi kukṣiṇā ūḍhaḥ iti hi bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānām karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:1535: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1536: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā rāhulena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena mātuḥ kukṣau ṣaḍvarṣāṇy avasthitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1538: rāhulenaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv172u:1539: rāhulena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati;
K01vinv172u:1540: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni na bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K01vinv172u:1544: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K01vinv172u:1545: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv172u:1546: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām // (SBV II 43)
K01vinv172u:1548: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre puṣpaphalasaṃpannam āśramapadaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ viśvastamṛgapakṣiniṣevitam;
K01vinv172u:1549: tatra dvāv ṛṣī bhrātarau prativasataḥ phalamūlāmbubhakṣāv ajinavalkaladhāriṇau śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś ca;
K01vinv172u:1554: amuṣminn udyāne dvāv ṛṣī bhrātarau prativasataḥ śaṅkhaś ca likhitaś ca;
K01vinv172u:1555: tatra śaṅkha upādhyāyo likhitaś ca śiṣyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1556: yāvad apareṇa samayena śaṅkha udakasya kuṇḍikāṃ pūrayitvā mūlaphalānām arthe vanaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1557: likhitas tu sarātram evotthāya pūrvataraṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1561: sa tṛṣṇārtaḥ saṃlakṣayati upādhyāyasantakaṃ pānīyaṃ pibāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1563: yāvat śaṅkha riṣir mūlaphalāny ādāya tṛṣāparyākulīkṛtamukhaḥ āśramaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1576: upādhyāya na śaknomy aham etat kaukṛtyaṃ prativinodayituṃ;
K01vinv172u:1577: prayaccha me gurukaṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;
K01vinv172u:1581: yadi tvaṃ daṇḍenārthī rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gaccha iti;
K01vinv172u:1583: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā mṛgavadhāya saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1585: ahaṃ coro mahārāja yo 'syādattaṃ jalaṃ pibet /
K01vinv172u:1586: prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate //
K01vinv172u:1589: api tu kasya santakaṃ tvayā jalam apahṛtaṃ?
K01vinv172u:1595: sa kathayati deva na śaknomy ahaṃ kaukṛtyaṃ (SBV II 44)
K01vinv172u:1597: prayaccha me guruṃ daṇḍaṃ yaś corasya pradīyate iti;
K01vinv172u:1598: evam ukte rājā prakupitaḥ tīvreṇa paryavasthānena paryavasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1600: yady evam atraiva tiṣṭha na tāvat prayātavyaṃ yāvad ahaṃ pratinirvṛttaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1601: sa rājā mṛgavadhaṃ kṛtvā saṃcintyānyena dvāreṇa praviṣṭaḥ na bhūyo nirgacchati;
K01vinv172u:1603: deva tasya riṣer adya ṣaḍdivasā( n)
K01vinv172u:1604: tasminn eva pradeśe tiṣṭhataḥ ājñāṃ dātum arhasi iti;
K01vinv172u:1609: ṛṣe deva kathayati uddhṛtadaṇḍo 'sau gacchatv eṣa evāsya daṇḍaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1612: yo 'sau rājā brahmadatta eṣa eva sa rāhulaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1613: yad anena cittaṃ pradūṣya riṣir abhihitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1616: tasya karmaṇo vipākena mātuḥ kukṣau ṣaḍvarṣāṇy uṣitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1617: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:1618: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1619: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā bhadrikeṇa karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena pradhānapuruṣāṇāṃ rājā saṃvṛttaḥ?
K01vinv172u:1621: bhadrikeṇaiva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv172u:1623: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ( na)
K01vinv172u:1628: api tūpātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K01vinv172u:1629: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv172u:1630: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
K01vinv172u:1631: Story of the beggar (concerning a previous birth of King Bhadrika)
K01vinv172u:1632: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamaḥ koṭṭamallakaḥ janapadād vārāṇasīm āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1637: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ samprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpiteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukaśārikākokilajīvañjīvakonnādite vanaṣaṇḍe (A
K01vinv172u:1639: sa tatrāntaḥpureṇa sārdham udyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1640: puṣpaphalalolupo mātṛgrāmaḥ puṣpaphalāni samanveṣamāṇaḥ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1641: yāvad rājā brahmadattaḥ nidrālasyaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1643: yāvad anyatamā strī saṃbhrāntā muktāhāraṃ chorayitvā prakrāntā;
K01vinv172u:1644: yāvad asau koṭṭamallakas tasminn udyāne paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1648: sthānam etad vidyate yad arthāyānarthaṃ prāpayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1650: yasya santako bhaviṣyati sa grahīṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:1652: deva amukayā udyāne muktāhāro vismṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1663: bhoḥ puruṣa kenaiṣa muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthāpitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1667: rājā kathayati bhavantas taṃ koṭṭamallakaṃ śabdāpayata;
K01vinv172u:1670: rājñā pṛṣṭaḥ bhoḥ puruṣa kasmāt tvayā muktāhāro latāyāṃ baddhvāvasthapitaḥ,
K01vinv172u:1673: deva nāham asya bhāgī devasyaivārhati iti;
K01vinv172u:1676: vada kaṃ te varam anuprayacchāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1678: yadi devaḥ parituṣṭaḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā teṣāṃ pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya mām (SBV II 46)
K01vinv172u:1681: bhavanto yuṣmābhiḥ koṭṭamallakān bhojayitvā pratyekam ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādya etaṃ puruṣaṃ teṣām adhipatiṃ sthāpayata;
K01vinv172u:1683: devasamājñāpayati yāvantaḥ koṭṭamallakāḥ vārāṇasyāṃ sarvair amuṣminn udyāne saṃnipatitavyam;
K01vinv172u:1684: ahaṃ koṭṭamallakān bhojayāmi ekaikaṃ vastrayugenācchādayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1685: te sarve saṃnipatitāḥ āmatyaiḥ praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1690: te praṇītenāhāreṇa saṃtarpitāḥ vastrayugenācchāditāḥ prītamanasaḥ kathayanti yathā devaḥ samājñāpayati iti;
K01vinv172u:1692: prakṛtyaiva koṭṭamallakāḥ kṣutpipāsābhibhūtāḥ vīthyām annapānam ācchindanti;
K01vinv172u:1693: te rājñā satkṛtā iti bhūyasyā mātrayā ācchettum ārabdhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1699: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ pūpakān ādāya vīthīmadhyena gacchati;
K01vinv172u:1700: tena koṭṭamallakādhipatinā tasya sakāśāt pūpikā ācchinnāḥ;
K01vinv172u:1701: sa tān ādāya pratiguptaṃ pradeśaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1703: sa tair upadrūyamāno nadīṃ vārakām uttīrya anyatamasmin vṛkṣamūle 'vasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1704: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktā ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;
K01vinv172u:1705: yāvad anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho daivāt taṃ pradeśam āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1708: nūnaṃ mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārā na kṛtā yenāhaṃ mānuṣyam āsādya koṭṭamallako jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1709: yady ayaṃ mahātmā mamāntikāt pūpān pratigṛhṇīyād aham asmai dadyām iti;
K01vinv172u:1710: tatas tena pratyekabuddhena tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya parānugrahakāraṇāt pātram upanāmitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1712: kāyikī teṣāṃ mahātmanāṃ dharmadeśanā na vācikī;
K01vinv172u:1713: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1716: drumaḥ pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:1719: prativiśiṣṭataraṃ cātaḥ śāstāram ārāgayeyam eva na virāgayeyam iti;
K01vinv172u:1726: pratipādya kiṃ tvayā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam iti;
K01vinv172u:1730: vayam eva te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣāṃ tvaṃ rājā bhaviṣyasi iti;
K01vinv172u:1733: kiṃ tv asya riṣeḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kuruta iti;
K01vinv172u:1734: tais tasya pratyekabuddhasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ vayaṃ te pradhānapuruṣāḥ syāma yeṣām ayaṃ rājā bhaviṣyati iti.
K01vinv172u:1736: yo 'sau koṭṭamallakādhipatir eṣa eva sa bhadrikaḥ śākyarājaḥ iti tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1737: ye te koṭṭamallakā etāny eva tāni pañcaśākyaśatāni;
K01vinv172u:1739: tasya karmaṇo vipākena eṣāṃ pañcānāṃ śākyaśatānāṃ rājā saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1740: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:1743: tena khalu samayena saṃbahulāni pātrāṇy abhyavakāśa upari kṣiptāni;
K01vinv172u:1745: athānyatamo markataḥ śālavṛkṣād avatīrya yena pātrāṇi (A 442b)
K01vinv172u:1753: atha sa markaṭo yena bhagavataḥ pātraṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1754: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pātram ādāya taṃ śālāvṛkṣam abhiruhya kṣaudrasya madhuno 'neḍakasya pūrayitvā śanair mandamandaṃ śālavṛkṣād avatīrya bhagavata upanāmayati;
K01vinv172u:1755: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti saprāṇakam iti kṛtvā;
K01vinv172u:1756: atha sa markaṭa ekānte prakramya (SBV II 48)
K01vinv172u:1758: tasya bhagavān na pratigṛhṇāti akalpikam iti kṛtvā;
K01vinv172u:1759: atha sa markaṭa ekānte prakramya śītalena vāriṇā pariṣicya bhagavata upanāmayati;
K01vinv172u:1761: atha sa markaṭa pratigṛhītaṃ me bhagavatā madhupātram iti viditvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ
K01vinv172u:1762: udagraprītisaumanasyajātaḥ prāñjalīkṛtaḥ pratipuṭakaṃ pratyavasṛto nartamānaḥ bhagavantaṃ
K01vinv172u:1763: namasyamānaḥ bhagavati prasādajāto bhagavantaṃ nirīkṣamāṇaḥ pṛṣṭhato nāvalokayati;
K01vinv172u:1767: yam eva divasaṃ pratisandhir gṛhītas tam eva divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1771: yāvad asau brāhmaṇī aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:1773: yam eva divasaṃ jātas tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1774: tasya jñātayaḥ saṃgamya samāgamya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
K01vinv172u:1777: ayaṃ dārako yam eva divasaṃ mātuḥ kukṣim avakrāntas tam eva divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1778: yam api divasaṃ jātaḥ tam api divasaṃ madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1780: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya madhuvāsiṣṭha iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1782: yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā svyākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1783: tasya pravrajitasyāpi sataḥ dine dine trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
K01vinv172u:1787: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1788: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā madhuvāsiṣṭhena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākenāsya dine dine trīṇi pātrāṇi saṃpadyante iti;
K01vinv172u:1791: karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāni pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu dehināṃ;
K01vinv172u:1792: dṛṣṭo yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa markaṭaḥ yena tathāgatasya madhupātram upanāmitaṃ? (A 443a)
K01vinv172u:1794: yo 'sau markaṭa eṣa evāsau madhuvāsiṣṭhaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:1796: tasya karmaṇo vipākena ṣaṭkarmanirate brāhmaṇakule upapannaḥ pratisandhau cāsya jātau ca madhuvarṣaṃ patitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:1797: yāvad etarhy api divase divase trīṇi madhupātrāṇi saṃpadyante;
K01vinv172u:1798: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1800: yadi madhuvāsiṣṭho bhikṣuḥ pūrvaṃ mahāsamudraṃ madhv adhimucyate;
K01vinv172u:1802: evaṃ hi bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti.
K01vinv172u:1803: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1804: kiṃ bhadantāyuṣmatā upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena rājenāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1806: upālinaiva bhikṣavaḥ aprameyā tathāgatadakṣiṇā iti pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvad phalanti khalu
K01vinv172u:1807: The story of the royal barber
K01vinv172u:1823: kuśalamūlāvaropaṇam asya kartavyam iti viditvā tasyānukampārtham upari vihāyasam (SBV II 50)
K01vinv172u:1826: sa mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:1827: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yathā me mātulo rājanāpitaḥ evam aham api rājanāpitaḥ syām iti.
K01vinv172u:1829: yo' sau rājanāpitasya bhāgineya eṣa evāsāv upālir bhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:1830: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena rajanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1831: bhūyo 'pi yad anena praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tac chrūyatām.
K01vinv172u:1835: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:1836: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1837: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1838: bhūyo 'pi krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1844: mamātyayāt sarvaṃ svāpateyam aputrakam iti kṛtvā rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:1845: sa tena gṛhapatinā dṛṣṭa uktaś ca:
K01vinv172u:1847: kathayati: vayasya kathaṃ na cintāparo bhaviṣyāmi yasya me iyat dhanajātaṃ na putro na duhitā,
K01vinv172u:1848: mamātyayāt sarvam etad rājavidheyaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:1850: yady evam eṣa mama sarvakanīyān putraḥ:
K01vinv172u:1854: te tasya putrāḥ yadā kenacit sārdhaṃ kaliṃ kurvanti tadā tena paribhāṣyante:
K01vinv172u:1855: yūyam api kaliṃ kurutha yeṣāṃ bhrātā nāpitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1857: yat kiṃcid vayaṃ paribhūtāḥ sarvaṃ tad asya bhrātur doṣāt;
K01vinv172u:1861: amukasya gṛhapateḥ putrāṇāṃ na kenacit śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:1867: na kenacid eṣāṃ śmaśrukarma kartavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:1875: te daurmanasyajātāḥ lokāpavādabhayāt taṃ ghātayitum icchanti;
K01vinv172u:1882: kāmam eva pravrajatu mā taiḥ prāṇān viyokṣyata iti viditvā uktaḥ:
K01vinv172u:1884: yat kiṃcid guṇagaṇam adhigacchethās tadā mamārocayiṣyasi iti;
K01vinv172u:1888: mayā tasya pituḥ pratijñātam upadarśayiṣyāmi iti; gacchāmi,
K01vinv172u:1889: tām imāṃ pūrvikāṃ pratijñāṃ niryātayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:1890: sa tasya sakāśaṃ gatvā jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprātihāryaṃ yāvat mūlanikṛnta iva drumaḥ sa pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:1891: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye kārāḥ kṛtāḥ anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
K01vinv172u:1892: bhūyo 'pi anena pañcasu pratyekabuddhaśateṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam:
K01vinv172u:1894: punar api caturṣu samyaksaṃbuddheṣu kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena rājanāpitaḥ syām iti;
K01vinv172u:1895: tasya karmaṇo vipākena bahūn vārān rājanāpitaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ.
K01vinv172u:1896: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:1897: kiṃ bhadanta upālinā karma kṛtaṃ yena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:1900: Upāli is the foremost among those who master and know the Vinaya
K01vinv172u:1901: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi pūrvavad yāvat sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm (A 444a)
K01vinv172u:1905: bhikṣuḥ sa punaḥ kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1908: tad anena maraṇakālasamaye praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaṃ:
K01vinv172u:1909: yad mayā kāśyape bhagavati samyaksaṃbuddhe yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
K01vinv172u:1911: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro nāma māṇavo
K01vinv172u:1912: vyākṛto bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan
K01vinv172u:1914: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
K01vinv172u:1915: yathā ca me upādhyāyena bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena vinayadhārāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1916: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavāṃs śākyamunir vinayadharāṇām agraṃ nirdiṣed iti tatpraṇidhānavaśāt tathāgatena vinayadharāṇām agro nirdiṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1917: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ pūrvavad yāvad ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:1919: Untrue announcement of the death of the Buddha and the birth of Ānanda
K01vinv172u:1920: yadā bhagavatā ṣaṭtriṃśadbhūtakoṭiparivāraṃ māraṃ papīyaṃsam abhinirjitya anuttaraṃ jñānam adhigataṃ,
K01vinv172u:1926: na bhagavān kālagato 'pi tu bhagavatānuttaraṃ jñānam adhigatam iti;
K01vinv172u:1927: tato rājā śuddhodanaḥ param ānandam upāgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:1929: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ vistareṇa kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
K01vinv172u:1933: tad bhavatu dārakasyānanda iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitam;
K01vinv172u:1935: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ;
