K01vinv172u:2209: tadyathā agniḥ prajvalito durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yadutārcirantarikayā,
K01vinv172u:2210: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
K01vinv172u:2213: giriguhāgato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta daṃṣṭrāntarikayā,
K01vinv172u:2214: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
K01vinv172u:2215: tadyathā rājño nāgo matto mātaṅgaḥ kuñjaraḥ ṣaṣṭihāyana īṣādanto vyūḍhoraskaḥ saṃgrāmāvacaraḥ saṃgrāmamadhyagato durāsado bhavati duṣprasaho yaduta dantāntarikayā,
K01vinv172u:2216: evam eva durāsadā buddhā bhagavanto duṣprasahāḥ;
K01vinv172u:2217: nāhaṃ āyuṣman śāriputra utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ. (SBV II 62)
K01vinv172u:2218: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmantam ānandam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:2219: yat khalu āyuṣman jānīyaḥ bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
K01vinv172u:2222: tadyathā kūṭāgāre vā kūṭāgāraśālāyāṃ vā uttarāyatāyāṃ prācīnāyatāyāṃ pūrveṇa vātāyanena sūryaraśmayaḥ praviṣya paścimāṃ bhittiṃ niśritya tiṣṭheyuḥ;
K01vinv172u:2223: evam eva bhagavato mānasam āyuṣmaty ānande pratiṣṭhitam ānando me bhikṣur upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena,
K01vinv172u:2226: utsaha tvam āyuṣman ānanda bhagavantam upasthātuṃ,
K01vinv172u:2228: evam aham āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana utasahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ sacen me bhagavān trīn varān dadyāt,
K01vinv172u:2231: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
K01vinv172u:2232: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavān imān trīn varāṃ dadyāt,
K01vinv172u:2233: evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ, nānyathā.
K01vinv172u:2234: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyana āyuṣmān śāriputra āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ bhagavata upasthāyakam utsāhya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
K01vinv172u:2235: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvaikānte niṣaṇṇau;
K01vinv172u:2236: ekāntaniṣaṇṇo āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavantam idam avocat*:
K01vinv172u:2237: utsāhita āvābhyaṃ bhadanta bhikṣur bhagavata upasthāyako yadutāyuṣmān ānanda; sa evam āha:
K01vinv172u:2238: sacen me āyuṣman mahāmaudgalyāyana bhagavāṃs trīn varān dadyād evam aham utsahe bhagavantam upasthātuṃ;
K01vinv172u:2241: na ca me kaścid akālaḥ syād bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramituṃ paryupāsanāya;
K01vinv172u:2242: saced bhagavān imān trīn varān dadyāt,
K01vinv172u:2244: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:2250: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:2251: sa paśyaty anāgataṃ sabrahmacāriṇām antikād vādānuvādaṃ garhasthānīyaṃ dharmaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2254: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit*;
K01vinv172u:2255: sa kālaṃ jñāsyaty ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
K01vinv172u:2257: ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasya upāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
K01vinv172u:2259: amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
K01vinv172u:2262: maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ kālajñaḥ kālavit;
K01vinv172u:2263: sa kālaṃ jñāsyati ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
K01vinv172u:2265: ayaṃ kālo bhikṣusaṃghasya bhikṣuṇīsaṃghasyopāsakaparṣadaḥ upāsikāparṣadaḥ ayaṃ kālo 'nyatīrthikaparivrājakānāṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanayopasaṃkramitum,
K01vinv172u:2267: amī anyatīrthikaparivrājikā bhagavataḥ kathāprātibhānikā amī na kathāprātibhānikāḥ;
K01vinv172u:2270: ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2271: sādhu sādhu maudgalyāyana paṇḍita ānando bhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:2273: evaṃ saṃjñāsyati tathāgataṃ sāyāhne pratisaṃlayanād vyutthitaṃ nimittena vā parikathayā vā ādeṣṭum;
K01vinv172u:2274: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa bhagavān bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
K01vinv172u:2275: anena cānena ca sukhavihāreṇa sugato bahulaṃ vyāhārṣīd;
K01vinv172u:2276: yac ca yadā ādekṣyati tat sarvaṃ tathaiva bhaviṣyati,
K01vinv172u:2277: nānyathā; ayaṃ maudgalyāyana ānandasya bhikṣor āścaryādbhuto dharmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2281: yan maudgalyāyanānando bhikṣuḥ tathāgatam upasthāsyati manāpena nāmanāpena, (SBV II 64)
K01vinv172u:2285: yadāyuṣmadbhyāṃ śāriputramaudgalyāyanābhyām āyuṣmān ānando bhagavata upasthāyaka utsāhitaḥ,
K01vinv172u:2287: tadā bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:2288: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ,
K01vinv172u:2294: ānandenaiva bhikṣavaḥ bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
K01vinv172u:2295: The story of Bhānumān and Bhānumantaḥ
K01vinv172u:2297: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ bhānur nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:2298: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:2299: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2300: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate,
K01vinv172u:2304: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya bhānumān iti nāma;
K01vinv172u:2308: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2309: tasyāpi jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā bhānumanta iti nāma kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2311: sa pitaraṃ paśyati dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayantaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2313: aham api pitur atyayād rājā bhaviṣyāmi;
K01vinv172u:2314: aham api dharmādharmeṇa rājyaṃ kārayitvā narakaparāyaṇo bhaviṣyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:2315: sa pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:2318: putra yasyārthe yajñā ijyante homā hūyante tapāṃsi tapyante tat tava karatalagataṃ rājyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2324: bhānumatā ṛṣimadhye pravrajitena ekānte prakramya anācāryakeṇa anupādhyāyakena pratyekabodhiḥ sākṣātkṛtā;
K01vinv172u:2326: sa itaś cānutaś ca paribhraman vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2329: sa ceha iti; sa tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:2333: ahaṃ te sarvopakaraṇair vaighātaṃ karomi iti;
K01vinv172u:2335: rājñā tasya bhānumantaḥ kumāraḥ upasthāyako dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2353: sa pratyekabuddhaḥ svayam eva rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2356: pravrajyā śreyasi bhāno yasmāt saṃvarṇitā jinaiḥ // iti;
K01vinv172u:2364: anyathā cintitā hy arthā anyathā parivartitāḥ /
K01vinv172u:2365: alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ bhāno paraṃ saptāham eva tu //
K01vinv172u:2371: sa ātmanaḥ alpakaṃ jīvitaṃ jñātvā tīvreṇa prasādena tasyopasthānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2373: tasya pātraṃ karatale hṛhītvā bhuṃjānasya vāyunā hastaḥ kampate;
K01vinv172u:2374: tatas tena rājakumāreṇa kaṭakam avatārya pātrasya (A 449a)
K01vinv172u:2377: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā praṇidhānaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:2380: kuśalamūlena ye dharmasantāne praviśeyuḥ te niścalā avatiṣṭheyuḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:2381: sa tasya pūrvaṃ parimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati;
K01vinv172u:2383: tvaṃ pūrvam āgārikabhūtaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padair vyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayasi;
K01vinv172u:2389: ye te tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhāḥ te buddhā bhagavantaḥ parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayanti iti;
K01vinv172u:2391: yo 'sau buddho bhagavān parimaṇḍalaparimaṇḍalaiḥ padavyañjanair dharmaṃ deśayati,
K01vinv172u:2393: sa tena pratyekabuddhena pravrājitaḥ uktaś ca:
K01vinv172u:2394: vatsa etad eva te manasi kartavyaṃ mayā saptāhasyātyayāt martavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:2395: tena tena saptāhena na kiṃcid adhigataṃ;
K01vinv172u:2397: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena tasya bhagavatas tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya śāsane pravrajya bahuśrutaḥ syāṃ,
K01vinv172u:2400: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ pratyekabuddhasya bhrātā eṣa evāsāv ānando bhikṣuḥ;
K01vinv172u:2401: yad anena pratyekabuddhasya bhrātur upasthānaṃ kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavato bhrātā saṃvṛttaḥ upasthāyako bahuśrutaḥ śrutadharaḥ śrutasannicayaś ca.
K01vinv172u:2402: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:2403: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā ānandena karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavatā bahuśrutāṇāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayāṇām agro nirdiṣṭa iti;
K01vinv172u:2405: ānandenaiva bhikṣavo bhikṣuṇā karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehināṃ.
K01vinv172u:2406: Ānanda is the foremost among the learned monks
K01vinv172u:2407: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'sminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
K01vinv172u:2413: yasya sakāśe pravrajitaḥ bhagavatā kāśyapena bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agro vyākṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2415: yan mayā bhagavati kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe anuttare dakṣiṇīye yāvadāyur brahmacaryaṃ caritaṃ,
K01vinv172u:2417: anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena yo 'sau bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena uttaro māṇavo vyākṛtaḥ,
K01vinv172u:2418: bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava varṣaśatāyuṣi prajāyāṃ śākyamunir nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddha iti;
K01vinv172u:2419: tasyāhaṃ pravacane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkuryām;
K01vinv172u:2420: yathā ca me upādhyāyo bhagavatā kāśyapena samyaksaṃbuddhena bahudhārāṇām (A 449b)
K01vinv172u:2422: evaṃ mām api sa bhagavān śākyamunir śākyādhirāja bahuśrutānāṃ śrutadharāṇāṃ śrutasannicayānām agraṃ vyākuryād;
K01vinv172u:2423: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānām iti yāvad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam.
K01vinv172u:2425: ṛddhiḥ śāstā tṛkā vaktā caṇḍālenāyaṃ gayā /
K01vinv172u:2426: yasya caite parādhyanti satvaśrāṇāś ca kukkurāḥ // (SBV II 68)
K01vinv172u:2428: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'“,
K01vinv172u:2431: tena khalu samayena durbhikṣam abhūt kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
K01vinv172u:2432: tatra ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddher lābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā
K01vinv172u:2434: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2436: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2438: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2440: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2442: Devadatta strives to win magical power
K01vinv172u:2443: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'“,
K01vinv172u:2446: etarhi durbhikṣaṃ kṛcchraḥ kāntāro durlabhaḥ piṇḍako yācanakena;
K01vinv172u:2447: ye bhikṣavaḥ ṛddhilābhinas te yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2449: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2451: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2453: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2455: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2457: aham api yadi ṛddher lābhī syām aham api yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjīya;
K01vinv172u:2459: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2461: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2463: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2465: ye vā te janapadāḥ ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhuṃjate;
K01vinv172u:2467: atha ko nu me pratilabhaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti;
K01vinv172u:2469: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
K01vinv172u:2471: vyapadiśatu me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti;
K01vinv172u:2472: atha bhagavān devadattasya idam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannaṃ viditvā devadattam idam (SBV II 69)
K01vinv172u:2473: avocat: adhiśīle tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru,
K01vinv172u:2475: anyac ca; adhicitte adhiprajñe tvaṃ gautama yoniśo manasi kuru;
K01vinv172u:2478: na vyapadiśati me bhagavān ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2482: athāyuṣmān ājñātakauṇḍinyo bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:2483: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
K01vinv172u:2486: sthaviro 'pi me kauṇḍinyo na vyapadiśati ṛddher mārgam iti viditvā āyuṣmān aśvajid
K01vinv172u:2487: bhadriko bāṣpo mahānāmā pūrṇo vimalo gavaṃpatiḥ subāhur yena paṃca sthaviraśatāni tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2490: atha paṃca sthaviraśatāni bhagavato mānasaṃ vyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgataṃ viditvā devadattam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:2491: rūpaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
K01vinv172u:2493: anyac ca; vedanāsaṃjñāsaṃskārān vijñānaṃ tvaṃ devadatta yoniśo manasi kuru,
K01vinv172u:2496: paṃcāpi sthaviraśatāni ṛddher mārgaṃ na vyapadiśanti;
K01vinv172u:2497: kiṃ punar ebhir āyuṣmadbhir bhagavatā sārdhaṃ purvam eva saṅgītaṃ bhaviṣyati?
K01vinv172u:2498: tathā hi me na kaścid vyapadiśanti ṛddher mārgaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2500: atha ko nu me pratibalaḥ syād ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭuṃ?
K01vinv172u:2501: Daśabalakāśyapa teaches to Devadatta the way to obtain magical power
K01vinv172u:2502: cf. Matsuda, “A Vinaya Fragment of the MSV from 'Bendall's Puka'“,
K01vinv172u:2504: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapo rāhagṛhe viharati senikāguhāyaṃ (A 450b)
K01vinv172u:2506: ayaṃ sthaviro daśabalakāśyapo dīrgharātram aśaṭha amāyāvī;
K01vinv172u:2507: ṛjukaṛjukajātīyo bhrātṛsālohitasya ca me nandasya upādhyāyo bhavati;
K01vinv172u:2508: pratibalaś ca me sthaviro daśabalakāśyapaḥ ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadeṣṭum iti viditvā yenāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapas tena upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2510: āyuṣmato daśabalakāśyapasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
K01vinv172u:2511: ekāntasthito devadattaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ daśabalakāśyapam idam avocat*:
K01vinv172u:2513: athāyuṣmān daśabalakāśyapaḥ bhagavato mānasam avyavalokya sthavirasthavirāṇāṃ ca
K01vinv172u:2514: bhikṣūṇāṃ devadattasya cedam evaṃrūpaṃ pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam ity aviditvā ṛddher mārgaṃ vyapadiśati;
K01vinv172u:2515: tatra devadattena pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā;
K01vinv172u:2519: tiraḥkuḍyaṃ tiraḥśailaṃ tiraḥprākāram asajjamānena kāyena gacchati tadyathā ākāśe;
K01vinv172u:2522: ākāśe paryaṅkena krāmati tadyathā pakṣī śakunakaḥ imau vā sūryācandramasau evaṃmahardhikāv evaṃmahānubhāvau pāṇinā āmārṣṭi parimārṣṭi.
K01vinv172u:2524: kiṃ punar me yasyā jambvā nāmnā jambūdvīpaḥ prajñāyate tato varṇagandharasopetānāṃ jambūpeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
K01vinv172u:2526: yadvā punar asyās sāmantakena bilvavanaṃ kapitthavanam āmalakīvanaṃ tato varṇagandharasopetānām āmalakapeśīnāṃ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
K01vinv172u:2528: uttarakurudvīpaṃ gatvā akṛṣṭoptasya taṇḍulaphalaśāleḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
K01vinv172u:2530: cāturmahārājikān trayastriṃśān ca devān gatvā divyāyāḥ sudhāyāḥ pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
K01vinv172u:2532: ye vā te janapadā ṛddhāś ca yāvad ākirṇabahujanamanuṣyāś ca tataḥ śucinaḥ praṇītasya khādanīyabhojanīyasya pātrapūram ādāya ātmanā paribhoktuṃ?
K01vinv172u:2536: kiṃ punar aham asmin magadhakṣetre pradhānapuruṣam anvāvartayeyaṃ:
K01vinv172u:2540: ayam ajātaśatruḥ kumāraḥ pitur atyayāt paitryarājyaiśvaryādhipatye pratiṣṭhāsyati;
K01vinv172u:2543: atha devadattaḥ abhijāto hastyājāneyo bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya (A 451a)
K01vinv172u:2545: dvāreṇa praviśya apadvāreṇa pratiniṣkrāmati abhijātaḥ aśvājāneyaḥ bhikṣur api muṇḍaḥ saṅghāṭīprāvṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2546: dahro 'pīdānīṃ kumāraḥ suvarṇamekhalādhārī bhūtvā ajātaśatroḥ kumārasya utsaṅge āvartate;
K01vinv172u:2548: ajātaśatrur api enaṃ kumāram āliṅgati cumbati pariṣvajati;
K01vinv172u:2550: tad api devadatto 'bhyavaharati yathāpital lābhasatkāreṇa abhibhūtaḥ paryādattacittaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:2551: tatrājātaśatruḥ kumāro bhūyasyā mātrayā pāpakaṃ dṛṣṭigataṃ pratilabdhavān:
K01vinv172u:2552: mahardhikataro batāryo devadattaḥ śāstur antikāt* iti;
K01vinv172u:2554: paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
K01vinv172u:2555: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
K01vinv172u:2557: The gifts and honours of Ajātaśatru infatuate Devadatta and his magical powers leave him entirely
K01vinv172u:2558: atha saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣan;
K01vinv172u:2559: aśrauṣuḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya carantaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2561: rājāsya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatruḥ vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
K01vinv172u:2562: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
K01vinv172u:2563: devadattaḥ paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra (SBV II 72)
K01vinv172u:2565: śrutvā punaḥ rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtyāḥ paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs
K01vinv172u:2566: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
K01vinv172u:2567: ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ saṃbahulā bhikṣavo bhagavantam idam avocan:
K01vinv172u:2568: iha vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ prāvikṣāma;
K01vinv172u:2569: aśrauṣma vayaṃ bhadanta saṃbahulā bhikṣavo rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya caranto:
K01vinv172u:2571: rājasya māgadhaḥ ajātaśatrur vaidehīputraḥ paṃcamātrai rathaśataiḥ sārdhaṃ sāyaṃ ca prātaś ca upasthānakaro niryāti;
K01vinv172u:2572: paṃcamātrāṇi cāsya sthālīpākaśatāni bhaktābhisāre bhaktābhisāre upasaṃharati;
K01vinv172u:2573: devadatto 'pi paṃcamātrair bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaktāgra upaniṣīdati;
K01vinv172u:2574: mā yūyaṃ bhikṣavo devadattasya lābhasatkāraṃ spṛhayata;
K01vinv172u:2578: tadyathā bhikṣavo vadhāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti parābhavāya kadalī phalaṃ dadāti;
K01vinv172u:2582: tadyathā vadhāya veṇur naḍaḥ phalaṃ dadāti;
K01vinv172u:2588: yāvac ca bhikṣavo devadattasya ayam evaṃrūpo lābhasatkāraḥ utpadyate,
K01vinv172u:2589: tat kasya bhaviṣyati mohapuruṣasya dīrgharātram anarthāya duḥkhāya;
K01vinv172u:2590: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yal lābhasatkāram abhibhaviṣyāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2591: na ca na utpanno lābhasatkāraḥ cittaṃ paryādāya sthāsyati;
K01vinv172u:2593: phalaṃ vai kadalīṃ hanti phalaṃ veṇuṃ phalaṃ naḍam* /
K01vinv172u:2596: yāvad eva hy anarthāya jñāto bhavati bāliśaḥ /
K01vinv172u:2597: hanti bālasya śuklāṃsaṃ mūrdhno 'py asya nipātayat* //
K01vinv172u:2598: atha devadattasya lābhasatkārābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
K01vinv172u:2599: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
K01vinv172u:2600: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
K01vinv172u:2602: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihāram anuyuktaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:2603: sahacittotpādāt sa punar devadattas tasya ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2604: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇaḥ iti.
K01vinv172u:2605: Maudgalyāyana informs the Buddha as Devadatta is aiming at the direction of the congregation
K01vinv172u:2606: tena khalu samayena kakudo bhikṣuḥ kroḍaputro bhagavataḥ śrāvako bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryaṃ caritvā caturo brahmavihārān bhāvayitvā,
K01vinv172u:2609: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ bhārgaveṣu viharati śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve;
K01vinv172u:2610: atha kakudo brahmā devadattaṃ tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaṃ viditvā,
K01vinv172u:2611: tadyathā balavān puruṣaḥ saṃkucitaṃ vā bāhuṃ prasārayet,
K01vinv172u:2612: prasāritaṃ vā saṃkucayed evam eva kakudo brahmā brahmaloke 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya purastād;
K01vinv172u:2613: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*;
K01vinv172u:2614: yat khalu bhadanta maudgalyāyana jānīyā devadattasya lābhasatkāreṇābhibhūtasya paryādattacittasya idam evaṃrūpo pāpakam icchāgatam utpannam:
K01vinv172u:2615: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum; aho (SBV II 74)
K01vinv172u:2618: bhagavān alpotsuko viharet dṛṣṭadharmasukhavihārayogam anuyuktaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:2619: sahacittotpādāt sa punas tasyā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2620: parihīṇaś ca punar nājñāsīd ity apy ahaṃ parihīṇa iti;
K01vinv172u:2623: upasaṃkramya bhagavantam etam evārthaṃ vistareṇārocayeḥ anukampām upādāya;
K01vinv172u:2624: adhivāsayaty āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ kakudasya brahmaṇas tūṣṇīṃbhāvena;
K01vinv172u:2625: atha kakudo brahmā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvenādhivāsanāṃ viditvā āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya pādau śirasā vanditvā tatraivāntarhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2626: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanaḥ aciraprakrāntaṃ kakudaṃ brahmāṇaṃ viditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
K01vinv172u:2627: yathā samāhite citte bhārgeṣv antarhitaḥ rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
K01vinv172u:2629: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2630: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano yāvān evābhūt kakudena brahmaṇā sārdham antarākathāsamudāhāras tat sarvaṃ vistareṇārocayati;
K01vinv172u:2631: evam ukto bhagavān āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat*:
K01vinv172u:2632: na khalu maudgalyāyana devadattaḥ pūrvam eva cetasā spharitvā viditaḥ?
K01vinv172u:2633: kiṃ tataḥ paścāt kakudena brahmaṇā ārocitam?
K01vinv172u:2635: iyaṃ ca punar bhagavata āyuṣmatā mahāmaudgalyāyanena sārdham antarākathā viprasṛtā.
K01vinv172u:2636: Devadatta visits the Buddha and departs indignant
K01vinv172u:2637: atha devadattaś catubhir bhikṣubhiḥ sahāyakaiḥ kokālikena khaṇḍadravyeṇa kaṭamorakatiṣyeṇa samudradattena ca sārdhaṃ yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2638: adrākṣīd bhagavān devadattaṃ dūrād eva dṛṣṭvā ca punar āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam āmantrayate:
K01vinv172u:2642: idānīṃ eṣa mohapuruṣo mama purastād ātmanaivātmānaṃ vyākariṣyati;
K01vinv172u:2644: pādau śirasā vanditvā tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ,
K01vinv172u:2645: yathā samāhite citte veṇuvane 'ntarhito bhārgaveṣu pratyaṣṭhād śiśumāragirau bhīṣaṇikāvane mṛgadāve.
K01vinv172u:2647: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
K01vinv172u:2649: etarhi bhagavān jīrṇo vṛddho mahallakaḥ klāmyati catasraḥ parṣado 'vavaditum;
K01vinv172u:2650: aho vata bhagavān mama bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pratinisṛjet;
K01vinv172u:2653: śāriputramaudgalyāyanayos tāvad ahaṃ mohapuruṣa peśalayoḥ sabrahmacāriṇor api bhikṣusaṃghaṃ na pratinisṛjāmi;
K01vinv172u:2654: kutaḥ punas tvayi nisrakṣyāmi śave kheṭāśake?
K01vinv172u:2659: bhagavato 'ntike kopaṃ ca dveṣaṃ ca mānaṃ ca mrakṣaṃ ca āghātaṃ ca akṣāntiṃ ca apratyayaṃ ca prāviṣkārṣīt*;
K01vinv172u:2660: atha devadatto hum iti kṛtvā triḥ śiraḥ kampayitva bhagavato antikāt prakrāntaḥ.
K01vinv172u:2662: The sermon on the five Teachers
K01vinv172u:2663: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ sthito 'bhūd vyajanaṃ gṛhītvā ca bhagavantaṃ vījayamānaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2665: gacchānanda yāvanto veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātaya;
K01vinv172u:2666: evaṃ bhadanta ity āyuṣmān ānando bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya,
K01vinv172u:2667: yāvanto bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti tān sarvān upasthānaśālāyāṃ sannipātya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2668: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte asthāt*;
K01vinv172u:2671: yāvanto bhadanta bhikṣavo veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam upaniśritya viharanti,
K01vinv172u:2676: upasaṃkramya purastāt bhikṣusaṃghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:2678: paṃceme bhikṣavaḥ śāstāraḥ santaḥ saṃvidyamānā loke;
K01vinv172u:2680: 1) ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2682: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhaśīla eva san pariśuddhaṃ me śīlam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2683: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2684: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
K01vinv172u:2685: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
K01vinv172u:2687: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ śīlavanto 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
K01vinv172u:2688: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
K01vinv172u:2689: ayaṃ prathamaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
K01vinv172u:2690: 2) punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā apariśuddhajīva eva pariśuddho me ajīvaḥ akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2692: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā apariśuddhajīva eva san pariśuddho me ājīva asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2693: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2694: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
K01vinv172u:2695: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
K01vinv172u:2697: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ ājīvato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
K01vinv172u:2698: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt śīlānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
K01vinv172u:2699: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
K01vinv172u:2701: apariśuddhajñānadarśana eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam akliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2704: apariśuddhajñānadarśana eva san pariśuddhaṃ me jñānadarśanam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2705: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2706: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
K01vinv172u:2707: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
K01vinv172u:2709: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ jñānadarśanato 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
K01vinv172u:2710: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikād jñānadarśanānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
K01vinv172u:2711: ayaṃ tṛtīyaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
K01vinv172u:2712: 4) punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā asaṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭam iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2714: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā asaṃpannavyākaraṇa eva san saṃpannaṃ me vyākaraṇam asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2715: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2716: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
K01vinv172u:2717: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;
K01vinv172u:2719: ity apy enaṃ śrāvakāḥ saṃpannavyākaraṇo 'nurakṣitavyaṃ manyante;
K01vinv172u:2720: evaṃrūpaḥ śāstā śrāvakāṇām antikāt saṃpannavyākaraṇānurakṣanaṃ pratyāśaṃsati;
K01vinv172u:2721: ayaṃ caturthaḥ śāstā san sanvidyamāno loke.
K01vinv172u:2722: 5) punar aparam ihaikaḥ śāstā durākhyātadharmavinaya eva san svākhyāto me dharmavinayaḥ asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2724: ayaṃ bhagavān śāstā durākhyātadharmavinaya eva san svākhyāto me dharmavinayaḥ asaṃkliṣṭa iti pratijānīte;
K01vinv172u:2725: vayaṃ ced enaṃ pareṣām ārocayema tenāsya syād amanāpaṃ;
K01vinv172u:2726: yenāsya syād amanāpaṃ kiṃ vayaṃ tena śāstāraṃ samudācariṣyāmaḥ?
K01vinv172u:2727: eṣa bhagavān śāstā svayam eva pratijānāti;

K01vinv172u:3017: yadā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena devadattasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ,
K01vinv172u:3019: kasmāt tvayā sthavira devadattasya pāpecchasya ṛddher mārgo vyapadiṣṭaḥ?
K01vinv172u:3021: nāham āyuṣmanto jāne yathāyaṃ pāpeccha iti;
K01vinv172u:3022: yadi mayā jñātam abhaviṣyat ṛkāro 'py asya mayā na vyapadiṣṭo 'bhaviṣyat;
K01vinv172u:3027: na tvaṃ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmasi iti;
K01vinv172u:3029: apy eva nāmāyam asmābhiḥ prabodhitaḥ tasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāmet;
K01vinv172u:3034: pūrvarātrāpararātraṃ jāgarikāyogam anuyuktena viharatā prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ niśritya ṛddhir abhinirhṛtā iti;
K01vinv172u:3035: sa vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tayā akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ.
K01vinv172u:3036: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:3037: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ akṛtajñatayā ṛddheḥ parihīṇaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3040: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ akṛtajñatayā vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3042: The story of an out-caste versed in magic and of a brāhmaṇa student
K01vinv172u:3044: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca; (SBV II 87)
K01vinv172u:3045: tatra caṇḍālo vidyāmantradharo vidyāmantrakuśalaḥ gāndhārīvidyāṃ parivartya ṛddhyā gandhamādanāt parvatāt akālartukāni puṣpaphalāny ādāya rājñe
K01vinv172u:3047: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo mantrārthī mantragavaṣī śravaparampayā janapadāt vārāṇasīm anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3048: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya tasya caṇḍālasya vidyāmantradhāriṇaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3050: icchāmy aham upādhyāyasya śuśrūṣāṃ kartuṃ; kasyārthe?
K01vinv172u:3052: na vidyā kasyacid deyā martavyaṃ saha vidyayā /
K01vinv172u:3053: prayacched vidyayā vidyāṃ śuśrūṣābhir dhanena vā // (iti)
K01vinv172u:3055: upādhyāya yady evam ahaṃ śuśrūṣāṃ karomi;
K01vinv172u:3058: dvādaśabhir varṣaiḥ śuśrūṣayā dīyeta vā na vā;
K01vinv172u:3060: tata ārādhanaparamaḥ satkṛtya guruśuśrūṣāṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3061: yāvad apareṇa samayenāsau caṇḍālo madyamadākṣipto gṛham āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3070: yannv aham aṅgaṇikāyāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ datvā avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3071: dharmatā hy eṣā śauṇḍānāṃ yo balavāṃs tasya vāntir bhavati;
K01vinv172u:3075: yady ahaṃ kāyaṃ cālayeyaṃ vācaṃ vā niścārayeyaṃ sthānam etad vidyate yad upādhyāyaḥ śabdaṃ śrutvā pratibuddho na punaḥ śayyāṃ kalpayet;
K01vinv172u:3077: yāvad caṇḍālaḥ svayam eva pratibuddhaḥ paśyati taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3104: sa cātyarthaṃ vidyāmantradhārī akāmakaraṇīyaś ca brāhmaṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3106: tasya vṛttim ācchidya asmai māṇavāya dīyatām iti;
K01vinv172u:3109: tataḥ purohitena caṇḍālād vṛttim ācchidya tasmai brāhmaṇāya dattā;
K01vinv172u:3110: sa tayā akṛtajñatayā tasya vidyāyāḥ parihīṇaḥ.
K01vinv172u:3111: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yo 'sau caṇḍālaḥ eṣa evāsau daśabalakāśyapaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3112: so 'sau māṇavaḥ eṣa eva asau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3115: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3116: svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśayiṣyāmaḥ prāg eva prabhūtataram;
K01vinv172u:3119: atha bhagavān yathābhiramyaṃ rājagṛhe vihṛtya bhikṣugaṇaparivṛtaḥ bhikṣusaṃghapuraskṛtaḥ,
K01vinv172u:3120: magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran gayām anuprāptaḥ gayāyāṃ viharati; (A 457a)
K01vinv172u:3121: rājñā bimbisāreṇa bhagavataḥ parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni prāpitāni;
K01vinv172u:3123: paśya vṛddharājā śramaṇasya gautamasya kīdṛśān kārān karoti;
K01vinv172u:3125: asmākam api tvayā piṇḍakena avighātaḥ karaṇīyaḥ. (SBV II 89)
K01vinv172u:3127: devadattasyājātaśatruṇā rājñā parṇopagūḍhasya śāleḥ paṃcamātrāṇi śakaṭaśatāni pratimārgaṃ preṣitāni;
K01vinv172u:3132: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:3133: paśya bhadanta rājā ajātaśatrur apātram apātravarṣī ca iti;
K01vinv172u:3137: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣaḥ apātram apātravarṣī;
K01vinv172u:3139: The story of a mango tree
K01vinv172u:3140: (concerning a previous birth of prince Ajātaśatru)
K01vinv172u:3141: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane ṛṣīṇām āśramapadaṃ,
K01vinv172u:3146: yāvat tasminn āśramapade āmravṛkṣaḥ phalabhārāvanataśākhaḥ pakvaphalas tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:3148: yā tasmin vṛkṣe adhyuṣitā devatā sā mātsaryābhibhūtā na prayacchati;
K01vinv172u:3149: tatas te ṛṣayaḥ mūlārthinaḥ ekam ṛṣim āśramapade sthāpayitvā bhrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:3150: tatsamanantaram eva paṃca coraśatāny āśramapadam anuprāptāni;
K01vinv172u:3155: vṛkṣaṃ paraśunā mūle chitvā phalāni bhakṣayata iti;
K01vinv172u:3156: evam ukte devatayā sarvāṇi phalāni bhūmyāṃ pātitāni;
K01vinv172u:3161: dadāti vṛkṣo na phalaṃ śāntānāṃ brahmacāriṇāṃ /
K01vinv172u:3162: dadāti tu phalaṃ teṣāṃ corāṇāṃ pāpakāriṇāṃ // iti
K01vinv172u:3167: mātsaryābhibhūtayā devatayā phalāni ṛṣīṇāṃ na dattāni;
K01vinv172u:3170: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavaḥ yāsau devatā eṣa evāsav ajātaśatruḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3171: tadāpy eṣa ajātaśatruḥ devatābhūtaḥ apātram apātravarṣī ca;
K01vinv172u:3172: etarhi apy eṣa apātram apātravarṣī ca iti. (SBV II 90)
K01vinv172u:3174: atha bhagavān magadheṣu janapadeṣu cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
K01vinv172u:3175: devadatto rājagṛhanivāsino janakāyasya nityam evāparādhaṃ karoti;
K01vinv172u:3180: ādāya anyatamena bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇena rājagṛhe rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocaya yad devadatto vā,
K01vinv172u:3182: na tena buddho vā dharmo vā saṃgho vā saṃbadhyate iti;
K01vinv172u:3187: tena gatvā rājagṛhe nagararathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu brāhmaṇagṛhapatīnām ārocitaṃ,
K01vinv172u:3188: te na bhūyo bhagavata upālambhaṃ preṣayanti.
K01vinv172u:3213: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:3214: paśya bhadanta jīvakena bhagavataḥ saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātam iti;
K01vinv172u:3217: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3219: The story of a gṛhapati and his son
K01vinv172u:3224: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:3225: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:3226: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:3228: tasyās trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃṣatidivasān jātāyāḥ jātimahaṃ kṛtvā valayeti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3229: bhūyo 'py asya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ putro jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3236: yady aham asyāḥ prabhūtān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gacchāmi,
K01vinv172u:3237: sthānam etad vidyate yat parapuruṣaiḥ sārdhaṃ vikariṣyati;
K01vinv172u:3238: yannv aham asyāḥ svalpān kārṣāpaṇān datvā gaccheyam iti;
K01vinv172u:3241: grīvāyāṃ muktāhāraṃ baddhvā śmaśāne aśvakarṇasya mūle nikhanya paṇyam ādāya deśāntaraṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3245: tatas tayā pūrvikayā patnyā valayā sa ca dārakaḥ hastabalena jñātibalena ca pāyitau,
K01vinv172u:3251: putra asmin deśe amukam adhiṣṭhānaṃ tatra tiṣṭhati (A 458a)
K01vinv172u:3253: gaccha yadi kiṃcid asyojjīvanopāyas te bhaviṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:3254: sa pitaraṃ samanveṣamāṇaḥ anupūrveṇa tasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3255: sa vīthyām anvāhiṇḍamānaḥ pitrā mukhabimbakena pratyabhijñātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3265: sa tasyātyarthaṃ snehaṃ kartuṃ ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 92)
K01vinv172u:3271: yathāyam asyātyarthaṃ snehavān nūnam asyaiva putraḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3278: sthānam etad vidyate yad enaṃ praghātayiṣyanti;
K01vinv172u:3279: yadi ca kiṃcid dāsyāmi antarmārge dāyādyakāraṇād ghātayiṣyanti;
K01vinv172u:3280: yannv aham evaṃ preṣayeyam iti viditvā cīrikā likhitvā dattā:
K01vinv172u:3282: tasmin khanan vai nipuṇo 'pramatto dāyādyam ātmīyam upaiṣyasi tvaṃ //
K01vinv172u:3283: kaṇṭhe tu yat tad valayāyā deyam iti.
K01vinv172u:3286: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdhaṃ sa kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3294: kiṃ tvayā pituḥ sakāśāl labdham iti;
K01vinv172u:3305: sa tāṃ cīrikāṃ vācayitum ārabdhaḥ: grāmeti,
K01vinv172u:3316: sa evaṃ gāthārthaṃ vicārya niḥsaṃpātavelāyāṃ śmaśānaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3319: sa tasya pūrve digbhāge yugamātraṃ māpayitvā khanitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3322: sa tam ādāya āttamanāttamano gṛhaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3325: yo 'sau gṛhapatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3326: yo 'sau tasya putraḥ eṣa evāsau jīvakaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3327: tadāpy anena mama saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ vijñātaṃ.
K01vinv172u:3328: The sichness of the Buddha. The Buddha heals Devadatta
K01vinv172u:3331: na śakyam atyalpena ghṛtena cikitsāṃ kartuṃ;
K01vinv172u:3332: tena pātraṃ gṛhītvā dvātriṃśad ghṛtapalāni tulonmitāni kṛtvā bhagavate pradattāni;
K01vinv172u:3339: jīvaka kiyati mātrā ghṛtasya śramaṇena gautamena pītā?
K01vinv172u:3343: aham api dvātriṃśat palāni pibāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:3347: tvaṃ punar na śakṣyasi jarayitum iti;
K01vinv172u:3351: iti; tena dvātriṃśatpalikā mātrā balāt pītā;
K01vinv172u:3354: aparasminn eva divase jīvakena bhagavato maṇḍo dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3355: devadattena mānād bhagavān pibatīti ajīrṇe eva ghṛte maṇḍaḥ pītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3358: sa tannimittaṃ duḥkhāṃ tīvrāṃ kharāṃ kaṭukām (SBV II 94)
K01vinv172u:3360: na rātrau na divā nidrām āsādayati.
K01vinv172u:3363: tato bhagavatā gajabhujasadṛśaṃ bāhum abhiprasārya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvataṃ bhitvā caktasvastikanandyāvartena
K01vinv172u:3364: anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakaraṃ karaṃ devadattasya sthāpayitvā satyopayācanaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3365: yena satyena yathā rāhulabhadre priye ekaputrake cittam anūnānadhikaṃ tathaiva devadatte tena satyena rujā śamaṃ gacched iti;
K01vinv172u:3376: devadatto bhagavatā satyopayācanayā pragāḍhavedanābhibhūtaḥ prāṇair viyujyamānaḥ svasthīkṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3377: yaṃ śrutvā devadattapakṣyā apy atyantābhiniviṣṭā bhagavaty āścaryaṃ praveditavantaḥ:
K01vinv172u:3395: upasaṃkramya saṃśayajātaḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:3403: dvau ṛkṣau śibirājā ca vidārā jujjukena ca //
K01vinv172u:3404: The story of a Sage and of an ungrateful elephant
K01vinv172u:3406: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane nānāvidhapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannam udyānaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3412: sā bhītā trastā kalabhaṃ parityajya mūtrapurīṣam utsṛjantī niṣpalāyitā;
K01vinv172u:3413: yāvad asau ṛṣir āśramapadān niṣkramya āśramapadasāmantakena diśo vyavalokayan saṃparibhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3415: tato 'sau ṛṣiḥ kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tanmātṛsamanveṣaṇābhiniviṣṭabuddhiḥ samantato vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3416: yadā sarvāvasthaṃ na paśyati tadā tam ādāyāśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3417: sa tena putravad āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3425: sa yadā saṃjātarāgaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ tadā santarjyamāno 'py avajñāṃ karoti;
K01vinv172u:3426: yāvad apareṇa samayena ṛṣiṇā bhṛśaṃ tarjitaḥ,
K01vinv172u:3430: na saṃgatiḥ kāpuruṣeṇa bhadrika kṛtaghnasatvena sudāruṇena /
K01vinv172u:3431: cirānuyāto 'pi karoti pāpikaṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
K01vinv172u:3432: kim ādarād durjanaṃ sevase tvam annena pānena tathobhayena /
K01vinv172u:3433: avaśyam ante sa nihanti mitraṃ nāgo yathaivāśramakauśikasya // iti
K01vinv172u:3436: yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3437: yo 'sau hastināgaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3444: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ atīte 'dhvani vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ mahendrasena nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
K01vinv172u:3446: yat kiṃcit svapne paśyati sarvaṃ tat tathaiva bhavati;
K01vinv172u:3447: tasya ca rājño vijite suvarṇapārśvo nāma bodhisatvaḥ mṛgeṣūpapanno mṛgāṇām adhipatiḥ;
K01vinv172u:3450: yas taṃ paśyati sa nirīkṣamānas tatraiva tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:3452: sa lubdhakabhayād anyalokabhayāc ca bhītaś carati;
K01vinv172u:3453: dharmatā hy eṣā aciravyativṛtte lokasanniveśe tiryañco 'pi vākpravyāharaṇasamarthā bhavanti;
K01vinv172u:3457: bho mātula kasmāt tvam evaṃ bhītabhītaś carasi?
K01vinv172u:3459: bhāgineya mamedaṃ rūpaṃ sarvalokaśubhaṃ saṃprārthanīyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:3460: so 'haṃ lokabhayāl lubdhakabhayāc ca bhītabhītaś (SBV II 97)
K01vinv172u:3467: yāvad anyatamaḥ puruṣo dviṣadbhiḥ paścādbāhugāḍhabandhanabaddho navāmbupūrṇāyāṃ hemalohyāṃ hemamālinyāṃ śīghrasrotasi nadyāṃ prakṣiptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3470: bhavāmi kasya dāso 'haṃ kasya vā paricārakaḥ /
K01vinv172u:3471: yo me 'dya jīvitaṃ dadyād yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti;
K01vinv172u:3472: daivād asau mṛgādhipatiḥ salilāśayāt mṛgagaṇaparivṛto nadīsamīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3473: tataḥ puruṣavirāvaṃ śrutvā te mṛgāḥ samantād vidrutāḥ;
K01vinv172u:3474: dharmatā hy eṣā bodhisatvānāṃ yad api kāyena vinipatanti,
K01vinv172u:3476: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatiḥ kāruṇyād āmreḍitahṛdayaḥ sahasā nadīm avatartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3477: kākaś cāsya pūrvamaryādāvadhṛtamatiḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ anubaddha eva saṃrakṣaṇāya;
K01vinv172u:3478: sa taṃ puruṣaṃ kṛtoddharaṇavyavasāyaṃ viditvā evam āha:
K01vinv172u:3481: akṛtajñā hy ete manuṣyāḥ nopakāraṃ manyante iti;
K01vinv172u:3483: sa tasya vacanam avacanaṃ kṛtvā nadīm avagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ priyam ivaikaputraṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya,
K01vinv172u:3487: kathayati: vatsa anena pathā yatheṣṭaṃ gaccha iti;
K01vinv172u:3488: tato 'sau puruṣaḥ kṛtāṃjaliḥ pādayor nipatya taṃ mṛgādhipatim idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:3489: tava dāso hy ahaṃ tāta tavaiva paricārakaḥ /
K01vinv172u:3490: tvayā me jīvitaṃ dattaṃ yal lokeṣu sudurlabham // iti
K01vinv172u:3492: ma me tvam adya dāsaḥ syāḥ mā caiva paricārakaḥ /
K01vinv172u:3493: na vācyas tv aham anyebhyo hanyur māṃ carmakāraṇāt //
K01vinv172u:3494: api tu vatsa idaṃ tvayā kartavyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3495: kṛte pratyupakārāt nāhaṃ tvayā kasyacin nivedyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3496: atilobhanīyam idaṃ me śarīraṃ prārthanīyaṃ sarvalokasya iti;
K01vinv172u:3497: tatas sa puruṣa tatheti pratijñāya mṛgādhipatiṃ (SBV II 98)
K01vinv172u:3499: yāvad apareṇa samayena candraprabhā devī ratiparikhedakhinnā mahāśayane atyarthaṃ
K01vinv172u:3500: middham avakrāntā rātryāḥ paścime yāme svapnam adrākṣīd atiparamaramaṇīyaśarīraṃ
K01vinv172u:3501: mṛgādhipatiṃ siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3502: dṛṣṭvā ca punaḥ pratyakṣavat svapnadarśanasaṃjanitasaumanasyā laghu laghv eva mahāśayanād utthāya rājño niveditavatī;
K01vinv172u:3503: śrutvā rājā tasyāḥ satyasvapnāyāḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
K01vinv172u:3504: aniṣṭagatyupapannena satā kathaṃ nāma siṃhāsane niṣadya mahatyāṃ rājaparṣadi dharmo deśayitavyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3505: tataś candraprabhā devī priyamadhuracāturyakathāsamudācārayogena muhūrtaṃ rājānam upalāḍya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3506: deva kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ tasya mṛgasyānayanāya iti;
K01vinv172u:3508: ājñā dattā: bhavanto yāvanto madviṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakās tiṣṭhanti te sarve matsakāśam upaneyāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3510: devaḥ samājñāpayati madviṣayanivāsibhir mṛgalubdhakair ihāgantavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:3511: tad yuṣmābhiḥ sarvamṛgalubdhakā iha preṣayitavyāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3512: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsino mṛgalubdhakā rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ preṣitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:3515: bhavanto śrutaṃ mayā madvijite paramaramaṇīyarūpavigraho mṛgo 'stīti;
K01vinv172u:3516: sa yuṣmābhir mṛduśithilabandhanopanibaddho matsakāśam akhedita upaneyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3519: iyatā kālena devasya vijite paryaṭadbhir na kadācid evaṃvidho mṛgavaraḥ śrutapūrvaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3520: kimuta dṛṣṭaḥ tam arhati devaḥ śravaparamparayā samanveṣya amuṣmin deśe tiṣṭhatīti;
K01vinv172u:3522: evaṃ devasya vayaṃ niyatam ājñāṃ saṃpādayāmaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3524: bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata samājñāpayati devaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3526: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
K01vinv172u:3528: amātyai rājñaḥ pratiśrutya vārāṇasyāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kāritaṃ:
K01vinv172u:3529: śṛṇvantu bhavanto vārāṇasīnivāsinaḥ paurā nānādeśābhyāgatāś ca janāḥ;
K01vinv172u:3530: deva evaṃ samājñāpayati madvijite atiparamaramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir asti;
K01vinv172u:3531: yo me tasya pravṛttiṃ nivedayati tam ahaṃ mahatā satkāreṇa satkaromi;
K01vinv172u:3537: nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa kāmanidānotthena dveṣavahnitīvreṇa santāpitahṛdayaḥ saṃlakṣayti:
K01vinv172u:3540: kiṃ mayā punas tādṛśī avasthā prāpayitavyā?
K01vinv172u:3542: sa prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ rājñaḥ parṣadi sanniṣaṇṇasya rājakāryam adhitiṣṭhataḥ,
K01vinv172u:3543: anivārite rājakuladvāre nānāvicitrasurabhipuṣpāṇy ādāya dauvārikāmātyaparaṃparayā rājānaṃ saṃśrāvya parṣadam abhyavagāhya satkāravidhipūrvakeṇa rājño niveditayati:
K01vinv172u:3544: amuṣmin deśe nānātaruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite viśvastamṛgapakṣiṇi suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir anekamṛgagaṇaparivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:3545: ahaṃ taṃ devasya atiramaṇīyavigrahaṃ mṛgavaram upadarśayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:3546: tato rājā tacchravaṇasaṃjanitasaumanasyaḥ anekāmātyaśatasahasraparivṛtaḥ kutūhalajātenānyena nānādeśābhyāgatena vārāṇasīnivāsinā ca paurajānapadena
K01vinv172u:3549: yāvad asau kākaḥ bodhisatvasya kṛtāvadhiḥ diśām avalokakaḥ tasmin vanaṣaṇḍavṛkṣaśikhare niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3553: mṛgarāja mayā tvaṃ pūrvam uktaḥ akṛtajñā manuṣyāḥ,
K01vinv172u:3556: ayaṃ sa puruṣo mahatā prābhṛtenāgataḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3561: kāmaṃ svaprāṇavināśo na tu satvādhyupekṣaṇam iti viditvā rājānaṃ pratyudgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3562: tataḥ sa puruṣo nirghṛṇahṛdayas tyaktaparaloko mṛgadarśanād āvarjitamatis taṃ mṛgavaram ubhābhyāṃ pāṇibhyām upadarśayann āha:
K01vinv172u:3564: atyudīrṇaparipūrṇāni hi karmāṇi na vipākakālam apekṣante;
K01vinv172u:3565: vākpravyāharaṇakālasamanantaram eva tasya puruṣasya ubhau pāṇī pṛthivyāṃ nipatitau;
K01vinv172u:3566: tataḥ sa rājā saṃvegajātas taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭavān:
K01vinv172u:3568: iti; sa duḥkhavedanābhyāhataḥ sagadgadaṃ gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K01vinv172u:3569: nāsau coro mahārāja haraty arthaṃ nihatya yaḥ /
K01vinv172u:3570: sa tu coro mahārāja yasya nāsti kṛtajñatā // (SBV II 100)
K01vinv172u:3579: tato rājā bodhisatvasya tāṃ prabhāvamahattāṃ jñātvā amātyān āmantrayate:
K01vinv172u:3584: candanavāripariṣiktaṃ surabhidhūpaghaṭikopanibaddham ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭādāmakalāpaṃ nānāpuṣpāvakīrṇaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ,
K01vinv172u:3588: tato rājñā asāv atiramaṇīyavigraho mṛgādhipatir mahatyā vibhūtyā vārāṇasīṃ nagarīṃ praveśya siṃhāsane niṣāditaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3589: tato mahatyā rājaṛddhyā mahatā rājānubhāvena rājā sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadais parivārya niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3590: atha mṛgādhipatibodhisatvena samantāt tāṃ parṣadam avalokya rājñas tasyāś ca parṣadas tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ,
K01vinv172u:3591: yaṃ śrutvā rājñā saparivāreṇa paṃcaśikṣāpadāni gṛhītāni;
K01vinv172u:3596: yo 'sau suvarṇapārśvo mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3597: yo 'sau puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3600: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:3601: The story of a lord of monkeys and of a maker of garlands
K01vinv172u:3605: sa divā divasam eva nadīpuṣpāṇy (SBV II 101)
K01vinv172u:3606: uccinoti; yāvad apareṇa samayena nadīm uttaratā āmraphalam uhyamānam anārtavaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3613: deva īdṛśāny āmraphalāni dātum arhasi iti;
K01vinv172u:3631: tena pūrvakāmraphalānusāreṇa sambalam ādāya gacchatā parvataikadeśe sa āmravṛkṣo dṛṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3634: tataḥ sa mālākāras taṃ vṛkṣam itaś cāmutaś ca nirīkṣate samdhiroḍhuṃ;
K01vinv172u:3636: tasy tatra āmraphalāśayād bahavo divasā atikrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:3640: yathā vā tathā vā adhiruhāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:3641: sa pāṣāṇan avalambya avalambya adhiroḍhum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3643: tasmiṃś ca parvate vānarabhūto bodhisatvo vānarāṇām adhipatir babhūva;
K01vinv172u:3644: daivād asau tasmin parvate yūtham apahāya taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3646: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
K01vinv172u:3647: sa tasya hitādhānatatparatayā na śakyate kramam antareṇa uddhartum iti pāṣāṇair abhyāsaṃ kartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3648: yadāsya parividitaḥ śaknomy aham enam uddhartum iti tadā sa tena prapātāt krameṇoddhṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3649: pāṣāṇavyāyāmāt tasya ca mālākārasyoddharaṇād atīva pariśrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3657: anikṣiptotsāhaḥ sa mahātmā parahitādhānatatparaḥ pariśrānto 'pi taṃ vṛkṣam adhiruhya āmraphalāni pātayitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3670: kṣīṇapathyadano 'haṃ yady āmraphalaṃ bhakṣayan gamiṣyāmi rājñaḥ kiṃ mayā deyaṃ? (A 461b)
K01vinv172u:3671: tasmād etam eva vānaraṃ hatvā śuṇḍīvallūrakāṇi kṛtvā mārgaṃ gacchāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:3672: tenāsau nirghṛṇahṛdayena tyaktaparalokena mahatyā śilayā jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3675: ekatyās tu manuṣyāḥ kṛtam upakāraṃ na jānanti //
K01vinv172u:3677: yo 'sau markaṭādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3678: yo 'sau mālākaraḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3681: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:3682: The story of a lord of a dārukoṭaka bird and a lion
K01vinv172u:3684: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasminn agrāmake araṇyāyatane parvatagiriguhāpravaṇe puṣpaphalasamṛddhe pakṣiṣūpapanno dārukoṭako babhūva;
K01vinv172u:3685: tasminn eva ca parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgarājaḥ yatheṣṭapracāravihāratayā mṛgān praghātya praghātya bhakṣayati;
K01vinv172u:3686: tasyāpareṇa samayena māṃsaṃ bhakṣayataḥ asthi dantāntareṇa praviṣṭaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3690: daivāt sa dārukoṭako vṛkṣāntarasañcārābhyāsād yasmin pradeśe mṛgādhipatis taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3691: tena asau siṃho duḥkhavedanābhyāhato dṛṣṭaḥ; uktaś ca:
K01vinv172u:3701: tat tvayā mama kālena kālaṃ yogodvahanaṃ kartavyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3706: tathāsya cikitsāṃ karomi yathā kṛtam api na jānīte;
K01vinv172u:3709: yāvad asau mṛgādhipatiḥ sukhavāyusaṃsparśaviṣkambhitāsyo mahatyāṃ pṛthivīśilāyāṃ vāmapārśvaṃ śirasy ādhāya middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3710: tato 'sau dārukoṭakas tasya mṛgādhipates samīpam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3714: iti viditvā suparīkṣitaṃ kṛtvā dantānataravilagnam asthi pakṣanipātakrameṇa sahasā apakṛṣya mukhavivarān niṣkramya tam eva nirīkṣamāṇo vṛkṣe 'vasthitaḥ niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3715: tataḥ sa mṛgādhipatir asthiśalyāpahārasaṃjanitasaumanasyo nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya utthāya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3716: athāsau dārukoṭakaḥ taṃ mṛgādhipatiṃ vyapagataduḥkhadaurmanasyaṃ viditvā pramuditamanās tatsamīpam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3717: mātula idaṃ tad asthi tava duḥkhanimittabhūtam iti;
K01vinv172u:3718: tato 'sau mṛgādhipatiḥ paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3719: bhāgineya asyopakārasya mayā tavāvaśyaṃ pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkramethāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3720: śobhanam eva tathā bhavatu ity uktvā sa dārukoṭakaḥ prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3723: sa ca dārukoṭakaḥ śyenakasya pakṣiṇaḥ kramāntaraparibhraṣṭaḥ,
K01vinv172u:3724: mṛtam iva ātmānaṃ manyamānaḥ kṣudhāparigatahṛdayaḥ tasya mṛgādhipateḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ ārtinivedanaṃ kṛtvā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3730: daṃṣṭrāntarālasaktas tvaṃ jīvan na bahumanyase // iti
K01vinv172u:3733: naṣṭaṃ kāpuruṣe sevā akṛtajñe ca yat kṛtam // iti
K01vinv172u:3736: yo 'sau dārukoṭakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3737: yo 'sau siṃho mṛgarājaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3740: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:3741: The story of a lord of a bear and a poor man
K01vinv172u:3743: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:3745: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3747: tataḥ sa puruṣaḥ yuktaṃ vāyuktaṃ vā idam iti sthānāntarasamanveṣaṇayā vṛkṣād vṛkṣāntaraṃ gacchati;
K01vinv172u:3751: sa taṃ dṛṣṭvā santrasto niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3756: sa jātaśaṅko 'pi sādhvasān na śaknoti gantuṃ;
K01vinv172u:3757: tatas tena ṛkṣeṇa bāhubhyām upagṛhya dhāritaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3762: saptāhasyātyayād aṣṭame divase vyabhre dine vigatabalāhake deve ṛkṣeṇa caturdiśaṃ vyavalokya prabhūtāni mūlaphalāni datvā sa puruṣaḥ abhihitaḥ:
K01vinv172u:3769: api tu mayā tava pratyupakāraḥ kartavyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3772: yathā māṃ na kasyacin nivedayasi iti;
K01vinv172u:3775: sa taṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya pādayor nipatya prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3782: tvaṃ kilākālasāptāhikameghena śvāpadena vā praghātitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3787: vayasya kāmaṃ yena vā tena vā jīvikaṃ kalpayāmi,
K01vinv172u:3789: sa tena tathā tathā pratilobhito māṃsapratyaṃśadvayena yathā pratipanno mārgam upadarśayan saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3791: guhām anuprāptaḥ yatrāsau mahātmā ṛkṣas tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:3792: tato nairghṛṇyam āsthāya akṛtajñatāṃ ca kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3794: tatas tena lubdhena paraprāṇoparodhinā guhāyām agnir dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3795: atha sa mahātmā ṛkṣo dhūmavyākulīkṛtamanā aśruparyākuleṣaṇo gāthāṃ bhāṣate:
K01vinv172u:3796: kasya kiṃ vyapanītaṃ me vasatā girigahvare /
K01vinv172u:3801: tatas tair viśasyamāṃsasya bhāgān kṛtvā sa kṛtaghnapuruṣo 'bhihitaḥ:
K01vinv172u:3805: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena taṃ tathā viprakṛtaṃ dṛṣṭvā hā kaṣṭaṃ hā kaṣṭam ity uktvā svakān api pratyaṃśān parityajya prakrāntam;
K01vinv172u:3806: etad atyadbhutaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyas tasmin pradeśe sannipatitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3809: tato rājā brahmadattas tasya carma gṛhītva vismayotphullalocanaḥ (SBV II 106)
K01vinv172u:3810: etam arthaṃ bhikṣusaṃghāya nivedayāmīti taṃ saṃghārāmaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3811: carma puṣkariṇyāṃ sthāpayitvā vṛddhānte niṣaṇṇaḥ saṃghasyaitam arthaṃ vistareṇa rocayati;
K01vinv172u:3815: pūjanīyas tribhir lokaiḥ tvayāpy eṣa narottama // iti
K01vinv172u:3821: tato rājā brahmadattaḥ sāntaḥpurakumārāmātyapaurajānapadaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhāny ādāya taṃ pradeśam abhigataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3822: sarvaṃ tan māṃsam asthi kalebaraṃ ca ekadhye kārayitvā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3823: bhavantaḥ sarvagandhakāṣṭhaiś citāṃ citvā mahatā satkāreṇa dhyāpayata iti;
K01vinv172u:3824: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe mahān stūpaḥ pratiṣṭhāpitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3827: yaiś ca tatra kārāḥ kṛtāḥ te sarve mokṣaparāyaṇāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ.
K01vinv172u:3829: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3830: yo 'sāv akṛtajñaḥ puruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3833: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:3834: Another story of a bear of a poor man
K01vinv172u:3836: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇāsyāṃ nagaryām anyatamo daridrapuruṣaḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:3838: so 'pareṇa samayena kālyam evotthāya paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:3839: tatparvatapradeśe vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite nānāpuṣpaphalasamṛddhe aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ ṛkṣeṣūpapannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3840: yāvad asau kāṣṭhahārakaḥ kāṣṭhāni paryeṣamāṇaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe vyāghreṇābhidrutaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3842: vṛkṣam abhirūḍho yasminvṛkṣe sa ṛkṣo bodhisatvas tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:3845: sa ca vyāghra āhāragṛddhas taṃ vṛkṣatalaṃ naiva muñcati;
K01vinv172u:3847: ca: bho mahātmann ete manuṣyāḥ kṛṣṇaśirasaḥ akṛtajñāḥ bhavanti;
K01vinv172u:3855: tathāpy asau vyāghraḥ māṃsaśoṇitābhilāṣī tiṣṭhaty eva;
K01vinv172u:3860: sa tasyotsaṅganiṣaṇṇaḥ śramakheditapariṣrāntaś ca middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3862: bhoḥ puruṣa kiyantaṃ kālaṃ tvayātra sthātavyaṃ?
K01vinv172u:3865: iti; sa nirghṛṇahṛdayaḥ pāpakarmā tyaktaparalokaḥ saṃlakṣayati:
K01vinv172u:3870: tena mahātmanā patatābhihitaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi ity uktvā patitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3872: sa tasya saṃdhāya bhāṣitaṃ śrutvā saṃlakṣayati:
K01vinv172u:3877: hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
K01vinv172u:3880: te vidyāmantradhāriṇo bhūtacikitsakān anyāṃś ca śramaṇabrāhmaṇān suhṛtsambandhibāndhavān pṛcchati;
K01vinv172u:3883: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nātidūre āśramapade vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍite puṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne anekavihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ paṃcābhijñaḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:3884: tasya puruṣasya jñātayas taṃ puruṣan ādāya tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ pādayor nipatya kathayanti:
K01vinv172u:3889: anena durātmanā kṛtopakārī bodhisatvo vyāghrasya purastāt pātitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3890: tena mahātmanā cintitam asmai dharmaṃ deśayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:3892: tasya patato bhrāntasya daśānāṃ ślokānām ekaikam akṣaraṃ pratibhātaṃ hā nai vā te hā kiṃ cit dus se mi iti;
K01vinv172u:3894: kathayati: upādhyāya kathayasva tāvat kīdṛśas te ślokāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3895: sa ṛṣir anupūrveṇa tān ślokān kathayitum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:3896: hā kāṣṭaṃ bata loke 'smin adharmaḥ khalu dāruṇaḥ /
K01vinv172u:3897: asaty eṣu manuṣyeṣu hiṃsā mitreṣu vidyate // 1 //
K01vinv172u:3898: naivāsane na śayane nāpi caiva ca caṅkrame /
K01vinv172u:3899: na kasyāṃcid avasthāyāṃ mitradruk sukham edhate // 2 //
K01vinv172u:3900: vāṇī te karuṇārttena tatā yā caiva bhāṣitā /
K01vinv172u:3901: sā tvāṃ dahati durbuddhe khāṇḍavaṃ jvalitaṃ yathā // 3 //
K01vinv172u:3902: tena hi tvaṃ pare loke 'nubhaviṣyasi vedanām //
K01vinv172u:3904: hā heti krandamānas tvaṃ raurave bhṛśadāruṇe /
K01vinv172u:3906: kiṃ te na prakṛtaṃ karma raudrasyāśubhakarmaṇaḥ /
K01vinv172u:3910: smara ṛkṣaṃ ca vyāghraṃ ca yat pāpaṃ prakṛtaṃ tvayā // 7 //
K01vinv172u:3911: durbuddhe tvaṃ na jānīṣe yathā mitreṣu vartitum /
K01vinv172u:3912: hantāraṃ labhate hantā vairī vairāṇi paśyati // 8 //
K01vinv172u:3913: sevitas tvaṃ ciraṃ kālaṃ prāpte vyāghramahābhaye /
K01vinv172u:3914: rakṣitaś ca śayānas tvaṃ tvayāsau kiṃ na rakṣitaḥ // 9 //
K01vinv172u:3918: yo 'sau ṛkṣaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3919: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥ satvaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:3922: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:3923: The story of the king Śibi
K01vinv172u:3925: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo śibighoṣāyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ śibir nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ (SBV II 109)
K01vinv172u:3927: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgi nissaṅgaparityāgī mahati ca tyāge vartate;
K01vinv172u:3928: tasya nāsti kiṃcid adattam aparityaktaṃ yaduta śramaṇabrāhmaṇebhyaḥ kṛpaṇebhyo vaṇīpakebhyaḥ adhvagebhyaḥ yācanakebhyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3929: yadbhūyasā tu glānebhyaḥ ācaritaṃ tasya rājñaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3930: kālyam evotthāya mātāpitarāv abhivādya glānāvalokyanaṃ kṛtvā arthādhikaraṇe niṣīdati;
K01vinv172u:3932: sa sarvavaidyapratyākhyāto nirapekṣo jīvite maraṇābhimuktaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍamānaḥ śibighoṣāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3933: tasmiṃś ca samaye rājā saṃprāpte vasantakālasamaye saṃpuṣpitaphaliteṣu pādapeṣu haṃsakrauñcamayūraśukākokilajīvañjīvonnādite
K01vinv172u:3935: sa ca vyādhitas tīvrarujopatāpasaṅjanitadaurmanasyo muhuḥ śvāsoparudhhyamānatanur aśruparyākulekaṇo daṇḍapāṇiḥ śanaiḥ śanai rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3939: tataḥ śibirājā karuṇadīnavilambitair akṣarair ucyamānas tadāturavacanaṃ śrutvā kāruṇyād ākampitahṛdayaḥ tatra eva pratinivṛttaḥ amātyān āmantrayate:
K01vinv172u:3943: tato rājā taṃ puruṣaṃ śabdayitvā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:3946: deva yaḥ puruṣaḥ janmano na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvaḥ tasya rudhireṇa yavāgūṃ sādhayitvā yadi bhojyate,
K01vinv172u:3952: īdṛśena yo 'haṃ pareṣāṃ duḥkhārtānāṃ na śaknomi śāntiṃ kartum iti;
K01vinv172u:3953: evaṃ vicintya rājā svasantatiṃ pratyavekṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3957: tvaṃ mamāṃsagatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā;
K01vinv172u:3960: putra yadā tvaṃ mama kukṣigatas tadā aham api na kasyacid ruṣitapūrvā,
K01vinv172u:3968: deva na vayaṃ prākṛtapuruṣasyārthāya devasya kāye śastraṃ nipātayāmaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:3969: kuśalā bhavanti bodhisatvās teṣu teṣu śilpasthānakarmasthāneṣu;
K01vinv172u:3970: tena svayam eva paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
K01vinv172u:3976: kathaṃ nāma ekasya prākṛtasatvasyārthāya iyantaḥ satvāḥ parityajyante?
K01vinv172u:3977: iti; tato rājñā sa janakāyaḥ samāśvāsitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:3978: tad anenopāyena ṣaṇ māsān paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
K01vinv172u:3988: tadā śibinā rājñā paṃcabhir grāmavaraiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
K01vinv172u:3991: śibinā rājñā paṃcasu gātreṣu śirā muktā;
K01vinv172u:3992: svarudhireṇa glānasya iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:3994: tataḥ kutūhalajātaḥ satvā āgamya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛcchanti:
K01vinv172u:3995: bhoḥ puruṣa satyaṃ tava kila śibinā rājñā iyantaṃ kālam upasthānaṃ kṛtam?
K01vinv172u:3998: duṣṭaśoṇitaṃ pṛthivyāṃ vā choryeta anyasya vā dīyeta,
K01vinv172u:4001: yenāsya gṛhaṃ sarvaṃ ca svāpateyaṃ dagdhaṃ.
K01vinv172u:4003: yo 'sau śibī rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4004: yo 'sau kṛtaghnaḥpuruṣaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4007: punar api yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:4010: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
K01vinv172u:4011: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4014: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:4015: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāso (A 464b)
K01vinv172u:4018: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
K01vinv172u:4022: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya kalyāṇakārīti nāma iti;
K01vinv172u:4025: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:4026: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
K01vinv172u:4027: bhūyaḥ sa rājā devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4028: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ devī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:4029: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:4034: kalyāṇakārī kumāro maitryātmakaḥ kāruṇikaḥ sarvasatveṣu dayāvān dānarucir dānābhirataḥ;
K01vinv172u:4037: putra mā tvaṃ satataṃ dānam anuprayaccha;
K01vinv172u:4038: kuto 'smākam etāvad dhanajātaṃ bhaviṣyati yannv aham anvaham evaṃ dāsyāmīti;
K01vinv172u:4039: dharmatā hy eṣā dātur dānapater yad bahujanasya priyo bhavati manāpaś ca;
K01vinv172u:4041: tasyānyatareṇa bhūmyantareṇa rājñā guṇamāhātmyaṃ śrutvā duhitā dattā;
K01vinv172u:4053: yadi mahāsamudrāt samṛddhayānapātro 'bhyāgacchati bhūyasā bahujanapriyo bhavati (SBV II 112)
K01vinv172u:4054: manāpaś ca; sthānam etad vidyate yat tiṣṭhata eva pituḥ rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayati;
K01vinv172u:4059: iti viditvā pituḥ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:4061: aham api tena sārdhaṃ gacchāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:4066: yo yuṣmākam utsahate kalyāṇakāriṇā sārthavāhena sārdham aśulkena agulmena atarapaṇyena mahāsamudram avatartuṃ (A 465a)
K01vinv172u:4069: tataḥ kalyāṇakārī sārthavāhaḥ akalyāṇakāriṇā bhrātrā sārdhaṃ kṛtakutūhalamaṅgalasvastyayanaḥ
K01vinv172u:4070: anekavaṇikśataparivāraḥ śakaṭair bhārair mūṭaiḥ piṭakaiḥ uṣṭrair gobhir gardabhaiḥ
K01vinv172u:4072: so 'nupūrveṇa grāmanigamarājarāṣṭradhānīṣu paṭṭanāny avalokya samudratīram anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4073: sa paṃcabhiḥ purāṇaśatair vahanaṃ kṛtvā paṃca pauruṣeyān gṛhītvā āhārakaṃ nirhārakaṃ nāvikaṃ kaivartaṃ karṇadhāraṃ ca trir ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kṛtvā mahāsamudram avatīrṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4080: yāvat tad vahanam anuguṇena vāyunā ratnadvīpam anuprāptaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4083: yo 'sau śrūyate ratnadvīpo nāma vajravaiḍūryendranīlamarakatādīnāṃ ratnānām ākaraḥ iti tam anuprāptāḥ sma;
K01vinv172u:4089: kalyāṇakāriṇā kumāreṇa mahārhāṇi ratnāni kaṭyām upanibaddhāni;
K01vinv172u:4091: tīrasya nātidūre makareṇa matsyajātena anayena vyasanam āpāditaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4095: tasya parivartamānasya akalyāṇakāriṇā kaṭyupanibaddhāni ratnāni dṛṣṭāni;
K01vinv172u:4099: iti viditvā tena tasya gāḍhamiddhāvaṣṭabdhasya tāni ratnāny apahṛtāni;
K01vinv172u:4101: sa tam andhaṃ samudratīre chorayitvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4102: daivāt gopālakā gāś cārayantas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4104: bhoḥ puruṣa kas tvam īdṛśaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:4109: tasya pālabandhor bhāryā yauvanamadākṣepāt vīṇāsvanaṃ śrutvā taṃ prārthayituṃ pravṛttā;
K01vinv172u:4110: sa kṛtaghnaceṣṭitam anusmṛtya karṇau pidhāyāvasthito nādhivāsayati;
K01vinv172u:4111: kāmādhyavasitānāṃ nāsti kiṃcid akaraṇīyam iti tayā svāmi vigrāhitaḥ:
K01vinv172u:4112: mām ayam andhaḥ puruṣaḥ prārthayati iti; (A 465b)
K01vinv172u:4117: nāsti kiṃcid asya karaṇīyam ṛte nirvāsanād iti;
K01vinv172u:4118: sa tena gṛhān nirvāsitaḥ rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu vīṇayā jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
K01vinv172u:4121: so 'py anupūrveṇa sīmāntarasya rājño nagaram anuprāptaḥ yenāsya pūrvaṃ duhitā dattā;
K01vinv172u:4123: tasyā nānādeśanivāsino rājaputrāḥ purohitaputrāś ca varakā āgacchanti;
K01vinv172u:4125: putri yasya tvaṃ dattā sa kalyāṇakārī kumāro mahāsamudraṃ (SBV II 114)
K01vinv172u:4126: gataḥ; tatraiva ca anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4128: yasyaiva tvāṃ na dāsyāmi sa visukho bhaviṣyati;
K01vinv172u:4136: tac ca nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
K01vinv172u:4144: tataḥ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyāṃ sā rājakumārī nānālaṃkāravibhūṣitā anekakumārīparivṛttā
K01vinv172u:4145: vanadevateva kusumitavanamadhye atīva vibhrājamānā mahatā śrīsamudāyena madhye nagarasya
K01vinv172u:4147: sa kalyāṇakārī anyatamasmin pradeśe vīṇām āśrāvayaṃs tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:4149: balavad api hetubalaṃ pratyabalam apekṣata iti;
K01vinv172u:4150: tataḥ sā rājakumārī vīṇāsvanāvarjitahṛdayā vīṇāvādake kalyāṇakāriṇy ākṣiptā;
K01vinv172u:4155: kathaṃ nāma nānādeśābhyāgatān rājāmātyapurohitaputrān anyāṃś ca nagaranivāsinaḥ pradhānapuruṣān
K01vinv172u:4156: pratyākhyāya rājakumāryā evaṃrūpayauvanakalāsaṃpadyuktayā andhalakaḥ svāmī vṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:4158: deva kumāryā svayaṃvarāvatīrṇayā svāmī vṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:4163: putri saṃvidyante rājāno dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ amātyaputrāḥ purohitaputrāś (A 466a)
K01vinv172u:4167: tāta sa eva me rocate iti;
K01vinv172u:4172: vṛtaḥ iti; na te śobhanaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4181: yena satyena satyavacanena tasya kalyāṇakāriṇo rājakumārasya tava cāntike rāgaḥ samutpannaḥ,
K01vinv172u:4183: anena satyena satyavacanena tavaikam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ syād iti;
K01vinv172u:4184: satyādhiṣṭhānasamanantaram eva tasyaikaṃ cakṣuḥ yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ:
K01vinv172u:4189: kathaṃ jñāyate tvam evāsau kalyāṇakārī iti;
K01vinv172u:4191: yena satyena satyavacanena tasya mamākṣiṇī samutpāṭayato 'ntike īṣad api na praduṣṭaṃ cittaṃ me,
K01vinv172u:4192: anena satyena satyavacanena mama dvitīyam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ bhaved iti;
K01vinv172u:4193: tasya saha satyayācanayā dvitīyam akṣi yathāpaurāṇaṃ saṃvṛttaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4194: tataḥ sā rājakumārī kalyāṇakāriṇam avikalendriyam ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:4199: tatas tenāsau duhitā mahatā śrīsamudāyena pariṇītā;
K01vinv172u:4200: sa ca kalyāṇakārī mahatā balasamudāyena tannagaraṃ gatvā akalyāṇakāriṇaṃ cyāvayitvā pitṛke
K01vinv172u:4203: yo 'sau kalyāṇakārī aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4204: yo 'sau akalyṇakārī eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4207: punar apy eṣa yathā akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:4210: bhūtapūrvam anyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyām anyatamo rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ cākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:4211: sa devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4212: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kramaśaś catvāraḥ putrā jātāḥ,
K01vinv172u:4222: ekaikāṃ striyaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya tanmāṃsena kāntāramārgān nistarema iti; viśākhaḥ (A 466b)
K01vinv172u:4226: kim atra prāptakālaṃ bhāryām ādāya niṣpalāyeya iti;
K01vinv172u:4228: sāsya bhāryā annapānaviyogān mārgaśramakhedāc ca kāhalībhūtā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:4234: tena ūrumāṃsaṃ chitvā tasyā bhakṣaṇāya dattaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4235: bāhubhyāṃ ca śire muktvā rudhiraṃ pāyitā;
K01vinv172u:4236: so 'nupūrveṇa tām ādāya anyatamaṃ parvatam upasṛptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4238: tasya ca parvatasya sannikṛṣṭe nadī vahati;
K01vinv172u:4239: tasyāṃ puruṣaḥ śatruṇā hastapādavikalaḥ kṛtvā pravāhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4243: sa karuṇāmreḍitacittasantatiḥ parvatam abhiruhya samantād vyavalokayitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4245: sa laghu laghv eva parvatād avatīrya nadīm abhyavagāhya taṃ puruṣaṃ pṛṣṭham abhirohya nadīm uttīrya tīre sthāpayitvā taṃ duḥkhasantāpitahṛdayaḥ
K01vinv172u:4251: sā tasyopasthānaṃ kurvatī praṇayasaumukhyā muhur muhur upasaṃkramya vividhābhiḥ kathābhir upatiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:4252: dharmatā hy eṣā prakṛtyā mandarāgiṇo bhavanti bodhisatvāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4253: viśākhas tayā sārdhaṃ kadācit paricārayati kadācin na paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4254: bodhisatvānubhāvena ca tāni kandamūlaphalāni atīva vīryavanti;
K01vinv172u:4255: tāny asau paribhuṃjānā kleśaprābalyāt taṃ hastapādavikalaṃ prārthayitum ārabdhā;
K01vinv172u:4258: ahaṃ tāvad idānīṃ gatapratyāgataprāṇaḥ kathaṃcij jīvitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4259: yadi punar īdṛśaṃ karomi sthānam etad vidyate yad ayaṃ tava bhartā māṃ sarveṇa sarvaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayati iti;
K01vinv172u:4263: sā tena sārdham ānandasaumanasyād eva atīva saṃraktā preṣyamāṇāpi tatsakāśān na gacchati;
K01vinv172u:4270: ayaṃ tava svāmī yadi jānīte āvayoḥ saṃprayogaṃ niyataṃ tava anarthaṃ karoti,
K01vinv172u:4276: sā śiro vastreṇa veṣṭayitvā parvataśilāyāṃ niṣadyāvasthitā;
K01vinv172u:4285: tayā pāṣāṇabhedakaḥ parvataprāgbhāre dṛṣṭaḥ iti sā (A 467a)
K01vinv172u:4286: kathayati: āryaputra pūrvam apy eṣā śirorujā āsid vaidyena pāṣāṇabhedako vyapadiṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4294: ṛjuko 'sau mahātmā tasyāḥ śāṭhyaṃ na vetti;
K01vinv172u:4311: yaḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ satvaḥ taṃ rājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:4313: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv172u:4314: sāmagrīṃ prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
K01vinv172u:4315: viśākhaḥ pratyupasthitavipākatvād rājyasaṃvartanīyasya karmaṇaḥ nadīm uttīrya ekasmin pradeśe niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4318: pradeśam āgatāḥ paśyanti taṃ mahātmānaṃ rājyalakṣaṇasaṃpannaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4319: te pramuditamanasaḥ amātyānāṃ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti:
K01vinv172u:4320: samanveṣitaḥ asmābhiḥ puṇyamaheśākhyaḥ satvo yo rājyam arhati iti;
K01vinv172u:4321: tatas tair amātyair mārgaśobhāṃ nagaraśobhāṃ ca kṛtvā mahatā śrīsamudāyena nagaraṃ praveśya divasatithimuhūrtanakṣatrānupūrvyā rājye 'bhiṣiktaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4322: tasya devī nāstīti amātyāḥ purohitāḥ bhūmyantararājānaḥ anye ca dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ
K01vinv172u:4323: sārthavāhāḥ svakasvakā duhitṝn sarvālaṅkāravibhūṣitāḥ ādāya tannagaram āgatāḥ rājā pariṇeṣyatīti;
K01vinv172u:4324: sa rājā striyā vipralabdho na pratipadyate;
K01vinv172u:4328: nānādeśanivāsinaḥ pradhānapuruṣāḥ bhūmyantarāś ca rājānaḥ itastyāś ca pradhānapuruṣāḥ kanyāḥ sajjīkṛtya vyavasthitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4332: puṇyānubhāvāt satvānām upabhogā vīryavanto bhavanti saṃpadyante ca;
K01vinv172u:4333: yadā bodhisatvas tasmāt parvatāt kṛtaghnastriyā muktas tadā tasmin parvate mūlaphalāni tanūbhūtāni;
K01vinv172u:4335: tataḥ sā strī durbhikṣākālamṛtyubhayabhītā taṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhe āropya grāmāntaṃ samavasṛtā;
K01vinv172u:4338: asti caiṣa lokadharmo yā strī pativratā sā loke pūjyate;
K01vinv172u:4339: sā yatra praviśati tatra bhikṣāṃ labhate;
K01vinv172u:4340: yāvad asāv anupūrveṇa tāṃ rājadhānīm anuprāptā;
K01vinv172u:4343: kecit kutūhalajātāḥ tāṃ draṣṭuṃ bahir nirgatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4346: bhavantaḥ ayaṃ rājā sarvāḥ striyo jugupsate;
K01vinv172u:4347: na paśyatīmāṃ satīṃ pativratāṃ hastapādavikalaṃ puruṣaṃ skandhenādāya paribhramatīm iti;
K01vinv172u:4351: āhūyatāṃ sā strī paśyāmi iti; sā āhūtā,
K01vinv172u:4355: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā //
K01vinv172u:4356: pātayitvā prapāte māṃ śilodbhedasya kāraṇāt / (SBV II 119)
K01vinv172u:4357: skandhena vahase ruṇḍam idānīṃ tvaṃ pativratā // iti
K01vinv172u:4359: yo 'sau rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4360: yāsav bhāryā eṣa eva sa devadattas tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4363: punar apy yathaiṣa akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:4366: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo viśvapuryāṃ rājadhānyām viśvāmitro nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati
K01vinv172u:4367: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca praśāntakalikalahaḍimbaḍamarataskararogāpagataṃ
K01vinv172u:4370: sa ca rājā śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4371: so 'pareṇa samayena devyā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4372: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:4373: sā aṣṭānāṃ va nāvānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:4374: dārako jātaḥ abhirūpo darśanīyaḥ prāsādiko gauraḥ kanakavarṇaḥ chatrākāraśirāḥ pralambabāhur vistīrṇalalāṭaḥ saṃgatabhrūs tuṅganāsaḥ sarvāṅgapratyaṅgopetaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4375: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyate;
K01vinv172u:4379: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya viśvantara iti nāma iti;
K01vinv172u:4381: dvābhyām aṃśadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikadhātrībhyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:4382: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
K01vinv172u:4383: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttaḥ tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:4385: janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ (SBV II 120)
K01vinv172u:4386: pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe
K01vinv172u:4387: tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye
K01vinv172u:4388: muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ
K01vinv172u:4390: viśvantaraḥ kumāro śrāddho bhadraḥ kalyāṇāśayaḥ ātmahitaparahitapratipannaḥ kāruṇiko
K01vinv172u:4391: mahātmā dharmakāmaḥ prajāvatsalaḥ sarvapradaḥ sarvaparityāgī niḥsaṅgaparityāgī ca
K01vinv172u:4393: tasya pradānavistaram upaśrutya yojanaśatād api arthinaḥ abhyāgacchanti;
K01vinv172u:4399: atha kecid viprā vedavedāṅgavido viśvantaram abhigamyocuḥ;
K01vinv172u:4400: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāraḥ iti; āha ca
K01vinv172u:4401: sarveṣu khalu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ sarvado bhavān /
K01vinv172u:4402: ratham etad dvijātibhyo dānaṃ tvaṃ dātum arhasi //
K01vinv172u:4403: ity evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ laghu laghv eva tasmād rathād avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditahṛdayas tebhyo dvijātibhyas taṃ rathavaram upadarśayann
K01vinv172u:4404: yathā mayā rathas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
K01vinv172u:4405: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām // (SBV II 121)
K01vinv172u:4408: parituṣṭabhṛtyamitrasevakānuyātrikaiḥ candra iva nakṣatragaṇaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃprāpte
K01vinv172u:4411: atha kecit pratyarthikaprayuktā viprās tvaritatvaritaṃ viśvantaraṃ kumāram abhigamya ūcuḥ:
K01vinv172u:4412: jayatu bhavān kṣatriyakumāraḥ iti; āha ca
K01vinv172u:4414: dātum etaṃ gajavaram asmabhyas tvam ihārhasi // iti
K01vinv172u:4415: evam uktaś ca bodhisatvas tasmād api gajavarāl laghu laghv eva avatīrya hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditamanās tebhyas taṃ gajavaram upadarśayann uvāca
K01vinv172u:4416: yathā mayā gajas tyakto viprebhyaḥ parayā mudā /
K01vinv172u:4417: tathāhaṃ tribhavaṃ tyaktvā spṛśeyaṃ bodhim uttamām //
K01vinv172u:4419: putreṇa ca tebhyo viśvantareṇa rājyavardhano nāma gajavaraḥ pratyarthikaprayuktebhyo dattaḥ iti; (A 468b)
K01vinv172u:4420: śrutvā ca punaḥ rājñā visvāmitreṇa kopakupitena viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ āhūyoktaḥ:
K01vinv172u:4421: gaccha kumāra na te madviṣaye vastavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:4422: tato viśvantaraḥ kumāraḥ pitrā parityaktaḥ cintayāmāsa:
K01vinv172u:4423: bodhāya mayā kṛtavyavasāyena sarvalokānugrahārthaṃ baddhasannāhena gajo 'sau tyaktaḥ
K01vinv172u:4424: tad gṛhe vartamānena dānaṃ deyaṃ yathābalam /
K01vinv172u:4425: tapovanaṃ vā saṃśritya kartavyo niyamaḥ paraḥ //
K01vinv172u:4426: tad ahaṃ gṛham utsṛjya prayāsyāmi tapovanam /
K01vinv172u:4427: vaktuṃ na tūtsahe vākyaṃ na dāsyāmīti yācitaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4428: athaivaṃ kṛtamatir bodhisatvo bhāryāyā mādryāḥ sakāśam abhigamya etad vistareṇa nivedayāmāsa;
K01vinv172u:4429: tataḥ sā mādrī sahaśravaṇād eva (SBV II 122)
K01vinv172u:4431: āryaputra yady evam aham api tapovanaṃ yāsyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:4432: na śakyaṃ mayā āryaputraviyuktayā muhūrtam api prāṇān dhārayituṃ; kutaḥ
K01vinv172u:4433: gaganam iva candrahīnaṃ sasyavihīnā bhaved yathā pṛthivī /
K01vinv172u:4434: nalinīva jalavihīnā bhartṛvihīnā bhavet tathā nārī // iti
K01vinv172u:4445: tatrāpi ca mayā avaśyaṃ yathāśaktyā dānaṃ deyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4446: tatra bhavatyā na kiṃcid anutāpaḥ karaṇīyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4447: tat punar api tāvat saṃpradhāryatām iti;
K01vinv172u:4449: āryaputra yathāśaktyā aham āryaputram anuvartiṣye iti;
K01vinv172u:4451: yady evaṃ smartavyā te iyaṃ pratijñā iti;
K01vinv172u:4452: tato bodhisatvaḥ pitaram upagamya mūrdhnā ca praṇipatyovāca
K01vinv172u:4453: kṣamasva yat tāta mayāparāddhaṃ gajapradānaṃ prati pārthivendra /
K01vinv172u:4454: eṣa prayāsyāmi purād araṇyaṃ kośakṣayo mā nṛpate tavābhūt // iti
K01vinv172u:4456: putra tiṣṭha nivartyatāṃ dānān matir iti;
K01vinv172u:4459: pradānān na tv ahaṃ cittaṃ nivarteya mahīpate //
K01vinv172u:4461: tataḥ putraduhitṛkalatrasahitaḥ śokotkaṇṭhaḥ paurajānapadasahasrair anugamyamānaḥ tasmān nagarān nirjagāma;
K01vinv172u:4462: kaścit puruṣaḥ taṃ rudanaparidevitaśabdaṃ śrutvā mahājanakāyaṃ ca nagaradvāreṇa nirgacchantaṃ dṛṣṭvā anyataraṃ puruṣam uvāca:
K01vinv172u:4463: bhoḥ puruṣa kiṃkṛto 'yaṃ mahājanasya ruditaśabdaḥ iti; sa uvāca:
K01vinv172u:4468: paurāḥ sametya subhṛśaṃ karuṇaṃ rudanti // iti
K01vinv172u:4469: tato bodhisatvas tasmān nagarān nirgatān paurān yathānyāyyam abhigamyovāca:
K01vinv172u:4471: suciram api hi priyasaṃyogo bhūtvā avaśyam evānte (A 469a)
K01vinv172u:4475: sarveṣu lokeṣv avaśasya jantoḥ priyair viyogo bhavantīti matvā /
K01vinv172u:4476: kāryā bhavadbhir bhuvi sarvayatnaiḥ sthirāprakampyā ca śamāya buddhiḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4477: atha triṃśadyojanātikrāntaṃ bodhisatvam avekṣya anyatamo brāhmaṇaḥ abhigamyovāca:
K01vinv172u:4480: tad arhati bhavān anena rathavareṇa me saphalaṃ śramaṃ kartum iti;
K01vinv172u:4481: tato mādrī saṃjātāmarṣā niṣṭhurābhidhānena taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
K01vinv172u:4482: aho dvijasyāsya sudāruṇā matir vane 'pi yo 'bhyarthayate nṛpātmajam /
K01vinv172u:4483: na nāma kāruṇyam ihāsya jāyate narendraputre nṛpatiśriyā cyute // iti
K01vinv172u:4485: na khalu na khalu bhavatyā brāhmaṇaḥ paribhāṣaṇīyaḥ; kutaḥ
K01vinv172u:4486: yady ete na bhaveyur artharucayo mādri pratigrāhakāḥ
K01vinv172u:4487: bodhiṃ kaḥ samavāpnuyād bhuvi naraḥ sarvapradānād ṛte /
K01vinv172u:4489: dānādyābhir avāpnuvanti niyataṃ sarvajñatām uttamām // iti
K01vinv172u:4490: tato bodhisatvas tam apy aśvarathaṃ pareṇa harṣeṇa tasmai brāhmaṇāya datvā uvāca
K01vinv172u:4491: anena mātsaryamalapravāhinā rathapradānena mamāstv iha dvija / (SBV II 124)
K01vinv172u:4492: maharṣibhiḥ sadbhir anupravartito nirāsravo dharmamayo mahārathaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4493: tato viśvantaraḥ pramuditahṛdayas tam api rathavaraṃ brāhmaṇāya datvā kṛṣṇājināṃ kumārīṃ skandhe āropya mādrī ca jālinaṃ kumāraṃ tapovanābhimukhau
K01vinv172u:4495: tato viśvantaras tasmiṃs tapovane svahṛdayapraritoṣakaraṃ vratam āsthāya vijahāra;
K01vinv172u:4501: tadarthaṃ bālakāv etau mama tvaṃ dātum arhasi // iti
K01vinv172u:4502: evam ukto viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati muhūrtaṃ cintāparo babhūva;
K01vinv172u:4507: yathā śibiḥ śruto nityaṃ tathā tvaṃ kartum arhasi // iti
K01vinv172u:4508: evam ukto bodhisatvas taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca:
K01vinv172u:4511: kiṃ punaḥ svasutatyāge mama syān matir anyathā //
K01vinv172u:4515: mā bhūd vaktā ca me kaścit kumārau nirghṛṇo bhṛśam /
K01vinv172u:4516: bālau tyajati nātmānaṃ sādhu brāhmaṇa māṃ naya // iti
K01vinv172u:4519: bhoḥ kṣatriyakumāra naitad bhavataḥ pratirūpaṃ mahati rājavaṃśe prasūtasya sarvasyāṃ
K01vinv172u:4520: pṛthivyāṃ khyātayaśasaḥ sarvaprāṇiṣu dayānukrośapravṛttasya dānamānasatkāragandhahastinaḥ (SBV II 125)
K01vinv172u:4521: śramaṇabrāhmaṇātithigurujanapūjakasya kṛpaṇavaṇīpakānāthadaridrajanaparigrāhakasya sarvamanorathaparipūrakasya amoghadarśanasya yat mama vandhyam āgamanaṃ bhavet,
K01vinv172u:4522: mogho vā mārgaśramaḥ nirarthakaṃ vā darśanam;
K01vinv172u:4523: aphalā sā āśā cirakālāśāsito vā cetasy āśāsakaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4524: tat śighraṃ saṅkkalpaturagasya manorathasya tadvacananāstikyapratyāhatasya me nirvṛttir bhavet;
K01vinv172u:4525: tad arhati bhavān paripūrṇamanorathaṃ māṃ visarjayituṃ kutaḥ
K01vinv172u:4530: na tava sudaṃṣṭra samo 'sti dānaśaktyā // iti
K01vinv172u:4531: athaitad vacanaṃ brāhmaṇasyopaśrutya viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ imāṃ cintām āpede tanayasnehaviklavaḥ
K01vinv172u:4533: prāpsyāmy ahaṃ ca mādrī ca duḥkhaṃ putraviyogajam //
K01vinv172u:4536: kāmaṃ putraviyogārto bhuvi śokaṃ vrajāmy aham /
K01vinv172u:4537: bhagnapratijño na tv eva bhaviṣyāmi kṣatavrataḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4538: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ iṣṭasutaparityāgaṃ prati kṛtaniścaya uvāca: eṣa bho
K01vinv172u:4539: lokaṃ duḥkhamāharṇave pratibhaye majjantam ārtaṃ bhṛśam
K01vinv172u:4542: bālāv aśrujalāmbupūrṇanayanau viprāya tasmai dadau // (SBV II 126)
K01vinv172u:4545: tārayeyam ahaṃ tena lokaṃ saṃsārasāgarāt // iti
