K01vinv172u:4546: dattamātrayoś ca punas tayor bāladārakayoḥ iyaṃ ca vasumatī ṣaḍvikāraṃ cacāla;
K01vinv172u:4547: tatas tena bhūmikampena tadvanavāsinas tāpasāḥ saṃtrastāḥ anyonyam ūcuḥ
K01vinv172u:4549: jñatavyam iha suvyaktaṃ prabhāvaḥ kasya īdṛśaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4551: sa teṣām ṛṣīṇām etam arthaṃ nivedayāmāsa
K01vinv172u:4555: viśvantaras tyajati kampati yena bhūmiḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4556: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgabuddhim avagamya karuṇakaruṇaṃ rudantau viśvantarasya pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ:
K01vinv172u:4559: ambā ca tāta niṣkrāntā tvaṃ ca no dātum arhasi /
K01vinv172u:4560: yāvat tām api paśyāvas tato dāsyati nau bhavān // iti
K01vinv172u:4561: tato bodhisatvaḥ snehaviklavaḥ sāśrudurdinanayanaḥ tau bāladārakau (A 470a)
K01vinv172u:4563: na me hṛdayam asnigdhaṃ nākṛpā nāpi nairghṛṇam /
K01vinv172u:4565: apy evāhaṃ parāṃ bodhim abhigamya śivāṃ svayam /
K01vinv172u:4567: tatas tau bāladārakau pitur āśayaparityāgam avagamya karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ pādayor nipatya kṛtakarapuṭāv ūcatuḥ
K01vinv172u:4568: yady evaṃ vyavasāyas te vacanād āvayos tvayā
K01vinv172u:4569: vaktavyā jananī tāta kṣantum amba tvam arhasi // iti (SBV II 127)
K01vinv172u:4571: yan nau guror apakṛtaṃ tvayi bālabhāvāt
K01vinv172u:4572: yady apriyaṃ vacanam anyad udāhṛtaṃ vā /
K01vinv172u:4573: śuśrūṣaṇaṃ ca paripūritam eva na syāt
K01vinv172u:4575: ity uktvā pitaram abhivādya triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya guruvacanalālasau muhurmuhuḥ saṃparivartamānau nayanāmbupariplutākṣakau tasmād āśramād viniścakrāmatuḥ;
K01vinv172u:4576: tato bodhisatvas tair atikaruṇair bāladārakavacobhiḥ viklavīkṛtahṛdayo bodhau manaḥ praṇidhāya tapovanaparṇakuṭīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4577: niṣkrāntamātrayoś ca bāladārakayoḥ ayaṃ trisahasramahāsahasro lokadhātuḥ ṣaḍvikāraṃ kampitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4578: anekaiś ca devatāsahasraiḥ hāhākṛtam antarikṣaṃ babhūva
K01vinv172u:4579: aho pradānamāhātmyam aho khalv asya niścayaḥ /
K01vinv172u:4580: bālāv imau sutau tyaktvā yan na vikriyate manaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4581: tasmiṃś ca samaye mādrī mūlaphalāny ādāya āśramābhimukhī saṃprasthitā;
K01vinv172u:4582: tena ca mahatā bhūmikampena tvaritam āśramapadaṃ pratasthe;
K01vinv172u:4583: anyatamā devatā siṃharūpadhāriṇī bhūtva mārgam avarudhyāvasthitā,
K01vinv172u:4584: mā haiva mādrī bodhisattvasya sarvasatvanirmokṣaṇakṛtodyogasya dānapāramitāyāṃ vighnam utpādayiṣyatīti
K01vinv172u:4595: ity evam uktā sā siṃharūpadhāriṇī devatā tasmān mārgād apakrāntā;
K01vinv172u:4596: tato mādrī nimittāny apraśastānīti matvā muhūrtaṃ cintayāmāsa:
K01vinv172u:4598: yathā vanavāsināṃ bhūtānāṃ vikrośanaśabdo vyaktam āśramapade akuśalaṃ bhaviṣyati iti; āha ca
K01vinv172u:4599: yathā sphurati me netraṃ yathā rauti vihaṅgamaḥ /
K01vinv172u:4600: dhruvaṃ tau bālakau tyaktau yathā me matir utsukā //
K01vinv172u:4601: yathāyaṃ pṛthivīkampo vepate hṛdayaṃ ca me /
K01vinv172u:4602: vyaktau tau bālakau tyaktau yathā kāyaś ca sīdati // iti
K01vinv172u:4603: sā evam anarthaśatasahasrāṇi cintayantī āsramapadaṃ gatā;
K01vinv172u:4607: asmin pradeśe jālinaḥ kumāraḥ sahabhaginyā mṛgapotakair (A 470b)
K01vinv172u:4612: atha vā ambā na dṛśyate iti parṇakuṭīṃ praviśya śayitau bhaviṣyataḥ ity evam āśaṅkāparigatahṛdayā
K01vinv172u:4613: sutadarśanalālasā mūlaphalāny ekānte upanikṣipya bāṣpāmbupariplutekṣaṇā bhartuḥ pādayor nipatya pṛcchati:
K01vinv172u:4617: tasya tau dārakau dattau tvam anujñātum arhasi // iti
K01vinv172u:4618: athaivam uktā mādrī viṣadigdhaviddheva mṛgī bhūmau nipapāta;
K01vinv172u:4619: jalāśayoddhṛteva matsī pṛthivyām āvartanaparivartanaṃ karoti sma;
K01vinv172u:4621: naṣṭavatseva gaur bahuvidhaṃ hambhāravair vilalāpa; āha ca
K01vinv172u:4625: kāṃ gatiṃ mama gatau hi putrakau //
K01vinv172u:4629: vrajatas tasya vaśe na duḥkhitau // (SBV II 129)
K01vinv172u:4654: tato mādrī tābhyāṃ bāladārakābhyāṃ ye vṛkṣā ropitakāyapālitakās tān kisalayasaṃchannāṇ dṛṣṭvā sasaṃbhramā pariṣvajyovāca
K01vinv172u:4659: punaś ca tayor bāladārakayoḥ krīḍanakān āśramavāsino mṛgaśābakān dṛṣṭvā karuṇādīnavilambitākṣaraṃ vacanam uvāca (SBV II 130)
K01vinv172u:4664: tato yena mārgeṇa tau bāladārakau gatau taṃ mārgam anusarantī tayor bāladārakayor itaś cāmutaś ca padāny anṛjukāni dṛṣṭvā tīvraduḥkhābhyāhatā punar uvāca (A 471a)
K01vinv172u:4671: tato bodhisatvas tāṃ tathā paridevanātmikāṃ dṛṣṭvā tābhis tābhiḥ śrutibhir anityatāpratisaṃyuktābhiḥ bahuprakāram anusaṃjñāpayann uvāca
K01vinv172u:4672: na darpān na ca vidveṣān mayā tyaktaṃ sutadvayam /
K01vinv172u:4673: sarvasatvahitārthaṃ tu tyaktau tau dustyajau sutau //
K01vinv172u:4675: prāpnuvanti mahāsatvāḥ śibivad bodhim uttamām // iti
K01vinv172u:4678: dadyāṃ svān dārān vāhanaṃ cāpi vittaṃ
K01vinv172u:4679: sarvaṃ sarvebhyo dātum eṣā matir me // iti
K01vinv172u:4680: atha mādrī dhairyam ālambya cittena bodhisatvam uvāca
K01vinv172u:4681: na karomy antarāyaṃ te mā te bhūn matir anyathā /
K01vinv172u:4682: mām apīcchasi ced dātuṃ nirviśaṅkaṃ prayaccha mām //
K01vinv172u:4685: tam arthaṃ prāpnuhi kṣipraṃ tārayan hi bhavāj jagat // iti
K01vinv172u:4686: tataḥ śakro devendraḥ tad atyadbhutam atiduṣkaraṃ ca mādryā bodhisatvasya ca vyavasāyam āgamya tridaśagaṇaparivṛtaḥ upari (SBV II 131)
K01vinv172u:4687: vihāyasā tadāśramapadam upagamya udāreṇāvabhāsena tad vanam avabhāsya gaganatalastha eva bodhisatvam uvāca
K01vinv172u:4690: tvam eko niḥsaṅgas tyajasi tanayān snehajanakān
K01vinv172u:4691: dhruvaṃ kṣemaṃ śāntaṃ vimalavirajaṃ prāpsyasi padam // iti
K01vinv172u:4692: tad evaṃ protsāhya bodhisatvaṃ śakro devendraś cintayāmāsa:
K01vinv172u:4695: tato bodhisatvasakāśād apakramya brāhmaṇaveṣam āsthāya punar bodhisatvam uvāca
K01vinv172u:4699: nirlajjaś cāpi lubdhaś ca tvam iha brāhmaṇādhamaḥ /
K01vinv172u:4700: saddharmaniratāṃ yas tvaṃ mām icchasi pativratām // iti
K01vinv172u:4701: tato viśvantaro bodhisatvaḥ karuṇāparigatahṛdayo mādrīṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4703: na śocāmy aham ātmānaṃ nāpekṣā me tathātmani /
K01vinv172u:4704: yathā tvām anuśocāmi katham eko bhaviṣyasi // iti
K01vinv172u:4711: idam asmin vane dānaṃ paścimaṃ me bhaviṣyati
K01vinv172u:4713: iti viditvā mādrīpāṇau gṛhitvā taṃ brāhmaṇam uvāca
K01vinv172u:4715: mama bhāryām imām iṣṭāṃ gṛhāṇa tvaṃ dvijottama // iti
K01vinv172u:4717: ṣaḍvikārā mahī kṛtsnā cacālāmbuni naur yathā //
K01vinv172u:4718: tato mādrī bāṣpoparuddhyamānagadgadakaṇṭhā brāhmaṇavaśam āgatā patiputraduhitṛrahitā idam abhravīt
K01vinv172u:4719: kīdṛṅ mayā kṛtaṃ karma anāryaṃ pūrvajanmasu /
K01vinv172u:4720: naṣṭavatseva gaur yena viraumi vijane vane //
K01vinv172u:4721: tataḥ śakro devendro brāhmaṇaveṣam antardhāpya svaveṣeṇa sthitvā mādrīm uvāca
K01vinv172u:4722: na brāhmaṇo 'smi subhage na ca mānuṣo 'smi
K01vinv172u:4723: śakras tv ahaṃ hy asuranāśakaraḥ surendraḥ /
K01vinv172u:4725: tad brūhi kiṃ varam ihecchasi matsakāśāt // iti
K01vinv172u:4729: tathety uktvā mahendraḥ punar āśramapadaṃ praviśya bodhisatvam upajagmivān;
K01vinv172u:4730: mādrīṃ ca vāmena pāṇinā gṛhitvā bodhisatvam uvāca
K01vinv172u:4731: ahaṃ mādrīm imāṃ tubhyaṃ dadāmi paricārikām /
K01vinv172u:4732: na ca te kasyacid deyā nyāsadroho hi garhitaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4733: tato śakro devendras taṃ bāladārakaparigrahītāraṃ tathā vyāmohayāmāsa yathā anyanagaraśaṅkayā tad eva nagaram upetya tau bāladārakau vikretum
K01vinv172u:4735: etau putrasya te putrau brāhmaṇo 'smin purottame /
K01vinv172u:4736: jālinaṃ caiva kṛṣṇāṃ ca vikrīṇīte sudāruṇaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4741: yāvad anyenāmātyena rājñaḥ sakāśam upanītau (SBV II 133)
K01vinv172u:4748: tam ihānayata kṣipraṃ patnyā sārdhaṃ sulocanam // iti
K01vinv172u:4749: tataḥ śakro devendro bodhisatvam abhinamasya svabhavanam upajagāma;
K01vinv172u:4750: paścāc ca rājani viśvāmitre abhyatīte brāhmaṇāmātyapaurajānapadaiḥ sārdhaṃ tadāśramapadaṃ gatvā bodhisatvaṃ yācitvā svapuram ānīya rājye pratiṣṭhāpitavān;
K01vinv172u:4752: sa śraṃanabrāhmaṇavanīpakasuhṛtsambandhibāndhavānujīvijaneṣu anekaprakārāṇi dānāni datvā puṇyāni kṛtvā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
K01vinv172u:4758: prāpnuvanti narāḥ śuddhim asmin loke paratra ca // iti
K01vinv172u:4759: yadā viśvāmitreṇa rājñā viśvantaranimittaṃ jujjukāya brāhmaṇāya prabhūtaṃ dhanaṃ dattaṃ tadāsau vistīrṇavibhavo jātaḥ; tasya (A 472a)
K01vinv172u:4761: yā ca kācit tava śrīr asau viśvantaraṃ kumāram āgamya iti;
K01vinv172u:4768: yo 'sau viśvantaro nāma rājakumāraḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4769: yo 'sau jujjukaḥ eṣa evāsau devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:4772: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ evaṃ śikṣitavyaṃ yat kṛtajñā bhaviṣyāmaḥ kṛtavedinaḥ svalpam api kṛtaṃ na nāśyayiṣyāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4774: ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam (SBV II 134)
K01vinv172u:4777: tena khalu samayena campāyāṃ potalo nāma gṛhapatiḥ prativasati,
K01vinv172u:4778: āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo vistīrṇaviśālaparigraho vaiśravaṇadhanasamudito vaiśravaṇadhanapratispardhī;
K01vinv172u:4780: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4781: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:4782: sā upasthīyate śīte śītopakaraṇaiḥ uṣṇe uṣṇopakaraṇaiḥ vaidyaprajñaptair āhāraiḥ,
K01vinv172u:4783: nātitiktaiḥ nātyamlaiḥ nātilavaṇaiḥ nātimadhuraiḥ nātikaṭukaī nātikaṣāyaiḥ tiktāmlalavaṇamadhurakaṭukaṣāyavivarjitaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:4784: hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātrī apsarā iva nandane vane vicāriṇī maṃcān maṃcaṃ pīṭhāt pīṭham anavatarantī adharimāṃ bhūmiṃ;
K01vinv172u:4785: na cāsyāḥ kiṃcid amanojñāṃ śabdaśravaṇaṃ yāvad garbhasya paripākāya
K01vinv172u:4786: tena khalu samayena potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ kenacid eva karaṇīyena;
K01vinv172u:4787: sā cāṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt śravaṇe nakṣatre prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:4789: tasya pādatalayor adhastāt caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi suvarṇavarṇavarṇāni jātāni;
K01vinv172u:4790: yāvat potalakasya gṛhapateḥ svamanuṣyaḥ tvaritatvaritaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gataḥ,
K01vinv172u:4792: gṛhapate diṣṭyā vardhase putras te jātaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:4793: sa prītisaumanasyajātaḥ bhūyaḥ pṛcchati kiṃ kathayasi gṛhapate putras te jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4795: atha tasya puruṣasyaitad abhavat kim ayaṃ gṛhapatir bhūyo bhūyaḥ pṛcchati?
K01vinv172u:4796: mā māṃ pralāpayitukāmaḥ iti viditvā tūṣṇīm avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4799: yadi tvayā śatam api vāṅ niścāritābhaviṣyat,
K01vinv172u:4800: mayāpi tava mukhaṃ suvarṇasya pūritam abhaviṣyat iti;
K01vinv172u:4801: tataḥ potalakena gṛhapatinā tasya puruṣasya trīn vārān suvarṇena mukhaṃ (A 472b)
K01vinv172u:4802: pūritaṃ; koṣṭhāgārikasya ca sandiṣṭaṃ dārakasyāvalehikāmūlyaṃ viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭīr dehi iti
K01vinv172u:4803: potalako gṛhapatiḥ prītamanāḥ rājñaḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ deva putro me jātaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:4806: ahaṃ tasya campāyāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ saptahastikaṃ dānīyam iti;
K01vinv172u:4807: potalako gṛhapatiḥ rājānaṃ bimbisāram avalokya campām āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:4808: tato gṛhapater jñātayaḥ trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpayanti kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
K01vinv172u:4811: pitrā cāsya janmani viṃśatihiraṇyakoṭyaḥ avalehikāmūlyaṃ dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4812: tasmād bhavatu dārakasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāma;
K01vinv172u:4813: tasya śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśa iti nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4815: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:4816: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
K01vinv172u:4817: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:4818: uddhāre nyāse nikṣepe vastuparīkṣāyāṃ vastraparīkṣāyāṃ ratnaparīkṣāyāṃ dāruparīkṣāyāṃ hastiparīkṣāyāṃ aśvaparīkṣāyāṃ kumāraparīkṣāyāṃ kumārikāparīkṣāyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:4819: so 'ṣṭāsu parīkṣāsu udghāṭako vācakaḥ paṇḍitaḥ paṭupracāraḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4820: tasya puṇyamaheśākhyatāṃ śrutvā samānakulīnair bahubhir dārikā dattāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4821: tasya pitrā trīṇi vāsagṛhāṇi māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4822: trīṇi udyānāni māpitāni haimantikaṃ graiṣmikaṃ vārṣikaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4823: trīṇi antaḥpurāṇi vyavasthāpitāni jyaiṣṭhaṃ madhyaṃ kanīyasaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4824: sa upariprāsādatalagato niṣpuruṣeṇa tūryeṇa krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:4825: tasya dine dine paṃcaśatikāḥ pāko bhojanārthaṃ sādhyate
K01vinv172u:4827: seeks to take his father King Bimbisāra's life but fails in the attempt
K01vinv172u:4829: kumāra sarveṣāṃ rājñāṃ yadā śirasi palitaṃ jātaṃ bhavati,
K01vinv172u:4832: bhavataḥ pituḥ keśās tṛtīyaṃ varṇāntaraṃ gatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4833: tathāpi kāmeṣv adhyavasita eva nopaśamaṃ gacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:4838: yāvad rājā bimbisāro bhagavato ghṛtapītasya maṇḍaṃ pātukāmasya maṇḍam adhiṣṭhāya veṇuvanaṃ saṃprasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4844: The Buddha, desiring to convert Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa,
K01vinv172u:4846: who appears to him in the orb of the sun,
K01vinv172u:4847: and talks to him of the Buddha
K01vinv172u:4848: atrāntare nāsti kiṃcid buddhānāṃ bhagavatām ajñātam adṛṣṭam aviditam avijñātaṃ; tatra (A 473a)
K01vinv172u:4850: vinipātito maudgalyāyana ajātaśatruṇā akalyāṇamitropagūḍhena tathāgatasya piṇḍapātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4851: gaccha campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya sakāśāt piṇḍapātam ādāya iti;
K01vinv172u:4852: evaṃ bhadantety āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyano bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte rājagṛhe 'ntarhitaś campāyāṃ
K01vinv172u:4854: sa dine dine kālyam evotthāya ādityaṃ namasyati;
K01vinv172u:4855: āyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyayānaḥ ṛddhyā ādityamaṇḍalaṃ bhitvā avatīrṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4856: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
K01vinv172u:4857: pratyakṣam evāham ādityaṃ svena rūpeṇa paśyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:4861: syāt kiṃ nv ayaṃ dinakaro dhanadaḥ śaśāṅkaḥ
K01vinv172u:4863: āyuṣmān api mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya gāthāṃ bhāṣate (SBV II 137)
K01vinv172u:4865: nāhaṃ vaiśravaṇo cāsmi bhagavān nāsmīśvaras suvrataḥ /
K01vinv172u:4866: putraṃ mām avagaccha śāntamanaso buddhasya dīptaujasaḥ
K01vinv172u:4867: bhaikṣārthaṃ tu tavāham abhyupagataḥ piṇḍena kāryaṃ punaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:4871: meruṃ prāpya yathā hi kāṃcanagiriṃ syāt sarṣapo 'bhyāgataḥ
K01vinv172u:4872: sūryaṃ prāpya yathā bhavec ca tulitaḥ khadyotajantuḥ kṣitau /
K01vinv172u:4873: ratnāḍhyaṃ ca sametya sāgaram iha syād goṣpadaṃ saṃsṛtam
K01vinv172u:4874: buddhaṃ prāpya tathā narottamaguruṃ māṃ viddhi śāstātmajam // iti
K01vinv172u:4882: asti gṛhapatiputra śramaṇo gautamaḥ śākyaputraḥ śākyakulāt keśaśmaśrv avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ
K01vinv172u:4885: tasya buddha ity aśrutapūrvaṃ ghoṣaṃ śrutvā saromakūpāṇy āhṛṣṭāṇi;
K01vinv172u:4886: tenābhiprasannena sa eva paṃcaśatikaḥ pākaḥ āyuṣmate mahāmaudgalyāyanāya pratipāditaḥ
K01vinv172u:4887: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa fills his bowl with food of extraordinary fragrance,
K01vinv172u:4888: which Mahāmaudgalyāyana carries back to the Buddha
K01vinv172u:4889: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tasyāntikāt piṇḍapātam ādāya tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpanno yathā samāhite citte campāyām antarhito rājagṛhe pratyaṣṭhād venuvane kalandakanivāpe;
K01vinv172u:4892: rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ dvitīyaṃ sthālipākam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
K01vinv172u:4893: yāvat paśyati sarvaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena (SBV II 138)
K01vinv172u:4896: sa saṃlakṣayati nūnaṃ śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapātaḥ upanītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4897: yathedaṃ veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam;
K01vinv172u:4899: kiṃ bhadanta śakreṇa devendreṇa anyābhir devatābhir bhagavataḥ piṇḍapāta upanītaḥ?
K01vinv172u:4900: yena veṇuvanaṃ nānāvidhena surabhiṇā āhāragandhena sphuṭam iti;
K01vinv172u:4902: na mahārāja śakreṇa devendreṇa nāpy anyābhir devatābhir upanītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4903: api tu tavaiva vijite campāyāṃ potalakaputrasya dine dine paṃcaśatikaḥ sthālīpākaḥ sādhyate;
K01vinv172u:4905: tasya bhagavān varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ iti śrutvāpi tasya darśanakāmatā utpannā;
K01vinv172u:4906: bhagavāṃs tasya cetasā cittam ājñāya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:4920: asti mahārāja tvayā kadācid evaṃrūpam annapānaṃ paribhuktapūrvaṃ?
K01vinv172u:4923: rājā ca saṃvṛttaḥ nābhijānāty evaṃrūpam annapānam āsvāditapūrvaṃ;
K01vinv172u:4924: puṇyamaheśākhyo mahārāja sa satvaḥ ya īdṛśam annapānaṃ paribhuṅkte
K01vinv172u:4925: King Bimbisāra desires to see Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa
K01vinv172u:4926: atha rājā māgadhaḥ śreṇyo bimbisāraḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4948: kumāraḥ, kadācid āgata anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:4952: api tu yuṣmābhir gaṅgā tathā baddhavyā yathā pratilomā vahati;
K01vinv172u:4955: yenaivaṃ likhati iti tair amātyānām anena arthena lekho 'nupreṣitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4956: tair vācayitvā punas teṣāṃ yathābhūtaṃ sandiṣṭaṃ:
K01vinv172u:4965: tatas te saṃbhūya potalakasya gṛhapateḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:4971: yo mama bhāgas taṃ suvarṇapiṇḍair api badhnīyām iti;
K01vinv172u:4973: gṛhapate yady apy evaṃ tathāpi paścimā janatā anukampitavyā iti;
K01vinv172u:4976: yadi yuṣmākam api putrāḥ śroṇena sārdhaṃ gacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:4980: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa goes to Rājagṛha to visit Bimbisāra
K01vinv172u:4981: atha potalako gṛhapatir yena śroṇakoṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4986: putra nūnaṃ sa rājā tava pādayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi draṣṭukāmaḥ;
K01vinv172u:4987: na tvayā tasya pādau utkṣipya darśayitavyau;
K01vinv172u:4991: etaṃ rājñaḥ pādayoḥ sthāpayitvā praṇāmaṃ ca kṛtvā tasya purastāt paryaṅkaṃ badhvā niṣīda;
K01vinv172u:5006: tad anayā vibhūtyā jalamadhyena preṣitaḥ; (SBV II 140)
K01vinv172u:5008: rājñā bimbisāreṇa śrutaṃ potalakaputraḥ āgacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:5010: yāvac ca nādī gaṅgā atrāntarāt khātam asyāḥ pūrayitvā tanmadhyena naur ākṛṣṭā;
K01vinv172u:5011: rājagṛhaṃ ca tan nagaram apagatapāṣāṇaśarkarakaṭhallaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ candanavāripariṣiktaṃ
K01vinv172u:5015: tato 'sau rājñaḥ siṃhāsanasthasya muktāhāraṃ pādayor datvā,
K01vinv172u:5018: rājā tasya pādatalayoḥ suvarṇavarṇāni romāṇi dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannaḥ:
K01vinv172u:5020: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa and King Bimbisāra go together to the Bamboo grove in order to see the Buddha
K01vinv172u:5024: sa pṛcchati deva kiṃ bhagavān yānena gaccchati?
K01vinv172u:5030: deva yady evam aham api pādābhyām eva gacchāmi iti,
K01vinv172u:5049: tenāśayato vāṅ niścāritā apanayantu amanuṣyā vastrāṇi iti;
K01vinv172u:5069: ito bhikṣava ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācit potalakaputreṇa anāstīrṇāyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ pādo nyastaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5074: atha śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo yena bhagavān tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5075: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5076: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K01vinv172u:5077: yāṃ śrutvā śroṇena koṭīviṃśena viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5078: sa dṛṣṭasatya utthāya āsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā,
K01vinv172u:5079: yena bhagavāṃs tena añjaliṃ praṇamayya bhagavantam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:5080: labheyāhaṃ bhadanta svākhyāte dharmavinaya pravrajyām upasaṃpadaṃ bhikṣubhāvaṃ careyam ahaṃ bhagavato 'ntike brahmacaryam iti;
K01vinv172u:5082: na khalu gṛhaputra tathāgatā vā tathāgataśrāvakā vā ananujñātaṃ kulaputraṃ mātāpitṛbhyāṃ pravrājayanti upasaṃpādayanti vā;
K01vinv172u:5084: rājā kathayati ahaṃ bhadanta prabhuḥ sarvādhikaraṇānām;
K01vinv172u:5085: arthe mamaiva dharmatayā ayaṃ putro bhavati;
K01vinv172u:5088: tato bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā ābhāṣitaḥ ehi bhikṣo cara brahmacaryam iti;
K01vinv172u:5091: pātrakarakavyagrahastaḥ saptāhāvaropitakeśaśmasruḥ varṣaśatopasaṃpannasya bhikṣor īryāpathenāvasthitaḥ; āha cātra
K01vinv172u:5099: ekāntaghaṭake śāsane kiṃ viśeṣam adhigamiṣyati iti (SBV II 142)
K01vinv172u:5100: sa tair avasphaṇḍito yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5102: kataro bhadanta ānanda bhagavatā ekāntaghaṭakasya bhikṣoḥ yogānukūlas samādhir uktaḥ
K01vinv172u:5103: āyuṣman śroṇa bhagavatoktaṃ caṅkramata avigatasamādhiś cirasthitiko bhaviṣyatīti
K01vinv172u:5104: tena śītavanaṃ śmaśānaṃ gatvā caṅkramo 'dhiṣṭhitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5105: tatrāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ rājagṛhe viharati śītavane śmaśāne yuktaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5106: sātatye naipakye saṃbodhipakṣikeṣu dharmeṣu bhāvanāyogam anuyukto bhavati
K01vinv172u:5107: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa gives himself to severe penances. The example of the lute
K01vinv172u:5108: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇakoṭīviṃśasya ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi;
K01vinv172u:5109: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
K01vinv172u:5111: atha ca punar me nānupādāyāsravebhyaś cittaṃ vimucyate;
K01vinv172u:5112: saṃvidyante ca me jñātiṣu vipulā bhogāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5113: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuṅjīya;
K01vinv172u:5116: atha bhagavān āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya cetasā cittam ājñāya anyatamaṃ bhikṣum āmantrayate:
K01vinv172u:5119: upasaṃkramya śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam evaṃ vada śāstā tvāṃ śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
K01vinv172u:5120: evaṃ bhadantety sa bhikṣur bhagavataḥ pratiśrutya yanāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5121: upasaṃkramya āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:5122: śāstā tvām āyuṣman śroṇa āmantrayate iti;
K01vinv172u:5123: evam āyuṣman ity āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśas tasya bhikṣoḥ pratiśrutya yena bhagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5124: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāṇte sthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5125: āyuṣmantaṃ śroṇaṃ koṭīviṃśaṃ bhagavān idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:5126: na te śroṇa ekākino rahogatasya pratisaṃlīnasya evaṃ cetasi cetaḥparitarka udapādi?
K01vinv172u:5127: yāvantaḥ khalu bhagavataḥ śrāvakāḥ ārabdhavīryā viharanti;
K01vinv172u:5129: atha ca punar me nānupādāya āsravebhyaḥ cittaṃ vimucyate;
K01vinv172u:5132: yannv ahaṃ niṣadya kāmāṃś ca paribhuñjīya;
K01vinv172u:5135: atha āyuṣmataḥ śroṇasya koṭīviṃśasya etad abhavat:
K01vinv172u:5137: iti viditvā bhītas trastas saṃvignaḥ āhṛṣṭaromakūpo bhagavantam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:5139: tena hi śroṇa tvām eva pṛcchāmi;
K01vinv172u:5142: kuśalas tvam abhūḥ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane;
K01vinv172u:5143: tathyam ahaṃ bhadanta kuśalo 'bhūvaṃ pūrvam āgārikaḥ san vīṇāyāṃ tantrīsvane:
K01vinv172u:5145: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atyātatā bhavanti,
K01vinv172u:5148: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
K01vinv172u:5150: yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ atiślathā bhavanti api nu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā bhavati?
K01vinv172u:5151: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
K01vinv172u:5153: atha punar yasmin samaye vīṇāyās tantryaḥ nātyātatā bhavanti nātiślathāḥ saha guṇeṣu pratiṣṭhāpitāḥ,
K01vinv172u:5154: nanu tasmin samaye vīṇā valgusvarā vā bhavati?
K01vinv172u:5155: manojñasvarā vā svaravatī vā karmaṇyā vā?
K01vinv172u:5157: evam eva śroṇa atyārabdhaṃ vīryam atyauddhatyāya saṃvartate;
K01vinv172u:5163: anena tvaṃ śroṇa vihāreṇa viharan nacirād eva āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā,
K01vinv172u:5168: Śroṇakoṭīviṃśa follows the advice of the Buddha,
K01vinv172u:5169: and in a short time becomes an arhat
K01vinv172u:5170: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandya anumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5171: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśo bhagavatā anena vīṇopamena avavādenāvavāditaḥ eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramattaḥ ātāpī prahitātmā vyāhārṣīt;
K01vinv172u:5172: eko vyapakṛṣṭaḥ apramatta ātāpī prahitātmā viharan,
K01vinv172u:5173: yadarthaṃ kulaputrāḥ keśaśmaśrūṇy avatārya kāṣāyāṇi vastrāṇy (SBV II 144)
K01vinv172u:5174: ācchādya samyag eva śraddhayā agārād anagārikāṃ pravrajanti,
K01vinv172u:5175: tad anuttaraṃ brahmacaryaparyavasānaṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtvā upasaṃpadya pravedayate:
K01vinv172u:5180: ājñātavān sa āyuṣmān arhan babhūva suvimuktacittaḥ
K01vinv172u:5181: athāyuṣmataḥ śroṇāsya koṭīviṃśasya arhatvaprāptasya vimuktiprītisukhasaṃvedinaḥ etad abhavat:
K01vinv172u:5182: ayaṃ me kālo bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkramituṃ,
K01vinv172u:5184: athāyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ sāyāhne oratisaṃlayanād vyutthāya yena hagavāṃś tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5185: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte nyaṣīdat;
K01vinv172u:5186: ekāntaniṣaṇṇa āyuṣmān śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ bhagavantam idam avocat
K01vinv172u:5188: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati arhan kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ
K01vinv172u:5189: anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ sa tasmin samaye
K01vinv172u:5192: trṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃ moṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
K01vinv172u:5193: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ śraddhāmātrakaṃ,
K01vinv172u:5194: bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya naiṣkramyam adhimukta iti;
K01vinv172u:5195: na khalv evaṃ draṣṭavyaṃ kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya naiṣkramyam adhimukto bhavati;
K01vinv172u:5196: syāt khalu ihaikatyasya evaṃ śīlamātrakaṃ bata ayam āyuṣmān niśritya avyābādhyam adhimukta iti;
K01vinv172u:5198: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya avyābādhyam adhimukto bhavati;
K01vinv172u:5199: syāt khalu bhadanta ihaikatyasya evaṃ lābhasatkāraślokamātrakaṃ (SBV II 145)
K01vinv172u:5200: bata ayam āyuṣmān parimṛgayamāṇāḥ prāvivekyam adhimukta iti;
K01vinv172u:5202: kṣayād bhadanta rāgasya kṣayād dveṣasya kṣayān mohasya tṛṣṇākṣayam upādānakṣayam asaṃmoṣaṃ ca cetasā adhimukto bhavati;
K01vinv172u:5204: kṣīṇāsravaḥ kṛtakṛtyaḥ kṛtakaraṇīyaḥ apahṛtabhāraḥ anuprāptasvakāryaḥ parikṣīṇabhavasaṃyojanaḥ samyagājñāsuvimuktacittaḥ tasmin samaye imāni ṣaṭ sthānāny adhimukto bhavati;
K01vinv172u:5205: yo 'sau bhadanta bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
K01vinv172u:5206: tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:5207: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtya upasaṃpadya pravedayate;
K01vinv172u:5212: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:5213: tadyathā dahraḥ kumārako bālo mandaḥ uttānaśāyī tasmin samaye dahraiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati dahraiś cendriyaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:5215: indriyāṇāṃ paripākāt sa tasmin samaye vṛddhaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati vṛddhaiś cendriyaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:5216: evam eva yo 'sau bhikṣur bhavati śaikṣa asaṃprāptamānasaḥ sa uttaraṃ yogakṣemaṃ nirvāṇam abhiprārthayamānarūpo bahulaṃ viharati;
K01vinv172u:5217: sa tasmin samaye śaikṣaiḥ samanvāgato bhavatiṃ śaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:5218: so 'pareṇa samayena āsravāṇāṃ kṣayād anāsravāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ dṛṣṭa eva dharme svayam abhijñayā sākṣātkṛtva upasaṃpadya pravedayate;
K01vinv172u:5223: sa tasmin samaye aśaikṣaiḥ śīlaiḥ samanvāgato bhavati aśaikṣaiś cendriyaiḥ;
K01vinv172u:5224: tasya cet bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ cetovimuktiṃ prajñāvimuktiṃ paryādadate;
K01vinv172u:5228: tasya ced bhṛśā api śrotavijñeyāḥ śabdāḥ ghrāṇavijñeyāḥ gandhāḥ jihvāvijñeyā rasāḥ
K01vinv172u:5229: kāyavijñeyāni spraṣṭavyāni manovijñeyā dharmāḥ manasa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti nāsya tāṃ
K01vinv172u:5234: tadyathā nagarasya vā nigamasya vā nātidūre mahāśailaḥ parvataḥ syāt,
K01vinv172u:5236: tasya cet pūrvasyā diśo bhṛśo vāyuvega āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
K01vinv172u:5239: saced dakṣiṇasyāḥ paścimāyāḥ uttarasyā diśo vāyuvegaḥ āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
K01vinv172u:5242: yatas tato vā bhṛśo vāyuvega āgacchen nainaṃ calayet,
K01vinv172u:5245: evam eva tasya bhṛśāny api cakṣurvijñeyāni rūpāṇi cakṣuṣa ābhāḥ samāgacchanti;
K01vinv172u:5247: sthitam evāsya tac cittaṃ bhavati adhyātma aviparītaṃ suvimuktaṃ subhāvitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5250: idam uktvā arhann athāparam etad uvāca sthaviraḥ
K01vinv172u:5256: kṛteṣu karaṇīyeṣu karaṇiyaṃ na vidyate // (SBV II 147)
K01vinv172u:5257: yathāpi parvataḥ śailo vāyunā na prakampate /
K01vinv172u:5258: evaṃ rūpāṇi śabdāś ca sparśā gandhā atho rasāḥ //
K01vinv172u:5259: dharmā iṣṭā aniṣṭaś ca pravepanti tāyinaḥ /
K01vinv172u:5260: sthitaṃ cittam aneyasya vyayaṃ cāsyānupaśyati // iti
K01vinv172u:5261: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:5262: kiṃ bhadanta āyuṣmatā śroṇena karma kṛtam yasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5264: paṃcaśatikaś cāsya dine dine sthālipāka upasthāpyate;
K01vinv172u:5265: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādo nyastaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5267: bhagavataś ca śāsane praviśya sarvakleśaprahāṇās arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtam iti
K01vinv172u:5269: śroṇenaiva bhikṣavaḥ koṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv172u:5270: śroṇakoṭīviṃśena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
K01vinv172u:5271: na bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante,
K01vinv172u:5275: upātteṣv eva skandhadhātvāyataneṣu karmāṇi kṛtāni vipacyante śubhāny aśubhāni ca;
K01vinv172u:5276: na praṇaśyanti karmāṇy api kalpaśatair api /
K01vinv172u:5277: sāmagrīm prāpya kālaṃ ca phalanti khalu dehinām //
K01vinv172u:5280: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ ekanavate kalpe vipaśyī nāma samyaksaṃbuddho loka udapādi,
K01vinv172u:5281: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
K01vinv172u:5282: sa dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran bandhumatīrājadhānīm anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5283: tena khalu samayena bandhumatyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ saṃbahulā goṣṭhikāḥ prativasanti;
K01vinv172u:5284: taiḥ śrutaṃ vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dvāṣaṣṭibhikṣusahasraparivāraḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran ihānuprāptaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5285: śrutvā ca punaḥ sarve saṃbhūya yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5286: upasaṃkramya vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5287: ekāntaniṣaṇṇān sambahulān goṣṭhikān vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ dharmyayā kathayā saṃdarśayati samādāpayati samuttejayati saṃpraharṣayati;
K01vinv172u:5290: atha sambahulā goṣṭhikāḥ utthāyāsanād ekāṃsam uttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā yena vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhas tenāñjaliṃ praṇamayya vipaśyinaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham idam avocan:
K01vinv172u:5291: adhivāsayatv asmākaṃ bhagavān traimāsīṃ cīvarapiṇḍapātaśayanāsanaglānapratyayabhaiṣajyapariṣkāraiḥ sārdhaṃ saṃghena iti /
K01vinv172u:5292: adhivāsayati vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ saṃbahulānāṃ goṣṭhikānāṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvena
K01vinv172u:5293: atha saṃbahulā goṣṭhikā vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya tūṣṇīṃbhāvena adhivāsanāṃ viditvā
K01vinv172u:5294: bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavato pādau śirasā vanditvā uttahāyāsanāt prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5295: te saṃsthāgāre sannipatya sañjalpaṃ kartum ārabdhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5296: katham asmābhir bhavanto bhagavān bhojayitavyaḥ kiṃ saṃbhūya āhosvid ekaikena iti;
K01vinv172u:5298: yadi dine dine saṃbhūya bhojayitavyo 'sau asmākaṃ kṛṣikarmāntāḥ samucchetsyanti;
K01vinv172u:5299: tad yadi bhavatām abhirucitaṃ vāreṇa vāraṃ bhojayāmaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5300: te vāreṇa vāraṃ gaṇādhīnaṃ bhojayitum ārabdhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5309: putra yady evam apaścimaṃ divasaṃ gṛhāṇa;
K01vinv172u:5311: gaṇasantakāc ca kiṃcid utsadanadharmakaṃ bhaviṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:5321: tataḥ paṃcaśatikaṃ pākaṃ sādhayitvā mahatā satkāreṇa vipaśyī samyaksaṃbuddho bhojitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5322: pādayoś ca praṇipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtam anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogo jāyeya;
K01vinv172u:5323: mā kadācid anāstīrṇe pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpayeyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5324: yādṛśāni ca vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi pādatalayor jātāni,
K01vinv172u:5330: yo 'sau goṣṭhiko brāhmaṇadārakaḥ eṣa evāsau śroṇaḥ koṭīviṃśaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:5331: yad anena vipaśyinaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya kārān kṛtvā praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ,
K01vinv172u:5332: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5333: pādayoś cāsya suvarṇavarṇāni caturaṅgulamātrāṇi romāṇi jātāni;
K01vinv172u:5334: ita ekanavataṃ kalpam upādāya na kadācid anāstīrne pṛthivīpradeśe pādau sthāpitau;
K01vinv172u:5336: mama ca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇād arhatvaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5337: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5340: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam*
K01vinv172u:5341: Rājagṛha's people begins tu murmur against Ajātaśatru and Devadatta
K01vinv172u:5342: yadā ajātaśatruṇā devadattākalyāṇamitropagūḍhena rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājagṛhanivāsinaḥ paurāḥ avadhyātum ārabdhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5343: tatra kecid rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣante ayaṃ pituḥ śatrutve vyākṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5344: kasmān na jātamātra eva praghātitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5352: na bhavanto rājño doṣaḥ nāpi devadattasya;
K01vinv172u:5355: no tu lokadhātvantaraṃ nītvā avasthāpitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5358: api tu saṃghasya yenāsya utkṣepanīyaṃ karma na kṛtam iti;
K01vinv172u:5359: tatra yena rājñaḥ akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate tena (SBV II 150)
K01vinv172u:5360: na rājā ārtīyate karmāṇy etāni mayā pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu kṛtāni upacitāni iti;
K01vinv172u:5361: yena tu bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣyate,
K01vinv172u:5363: madīyena durnītena loko bhagavataḥ saṃghasya ca akarṇaṃ bhāṣate iti
K01vinv172u:5364: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ /
K01vinv172u:5369: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anyair aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5371: The story of Kūla and Upakūla
K01vinv172u:5372: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta and Ajātaśatru)
K01vinv172u:5373: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati,
K01vinv172u:5374: ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:5375: tasya dvau kukkurau kūlaś ca upakūlaś ca;
K01vinv172u:5377: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājño brahmadattasya saṃgrāmaḥ pratyupasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5385: bhavanto yady evaṃ parityaktā mayā kukkurāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5388: yāvad anyatamo jānapadaḥ kukkuraḥ janapadād vārāṇasīṃ gacchati;
K01vinv172u:5389: tena te niṣpalāyamānā dṛṣṭāḥ; pṛṣṭāś ca:
K01vinv172u:5390: bhavantaḥ kimartham evaṃ yūyaṃ santrastāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5393: kimarthaṃ rājā yuṣmābhir na vijñaptaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5395: kaḥ śaknoti rājānaṃ vijñapayitum anya praghātitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5399: ahaṃ yuṣmākam arthe rājānaṃ vijñapayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:5401: tatas tena saṃpātavelāyāṃ śravaṇopavicāre sthitvā rājā gāthayā vijñaptaḥ
K01vinv172u:5405: aghātyaghāto na hi deva yuktaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:5407: tena prabhātāyaṃ rajanyām amātyānām ājñā dattā:
K01vinv172u:5408: bhavanto yenāhaṃ rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ tasya samanveṣaṇaṃ kuruta iti;
K01vinv172u:5410: samanveṣatat bhavantaḥ kena devo rātrau gāthayā vijñaptaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5413: bhavantaḥ parīkṣāṃ kuruta kiṃ kūlopakūlābhyāṃ bhakṣitam āhosvit anyaiḥ kukkuraiḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5415: bhavanto devenaivājñā dattā kukkurāṇāṃ parīkṣāṃ kuruteti;
K01vinv172u:5416: tat katham eṣāṃ parīkṣā kartavyā iti;
K01vinv172u:5418: kim atra parīkṣitavyaṃ keśāṇḍukaṃ datvā chardāpayitavyau;
K01vinv172u:5424: yau kūlopakūlau etāv eva devadattājātaśatrū tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:5425: tadāpi etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5426: etarhy api etābhyām aparāddham anye doṣeṇa liptāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5427: punar api yathā devadattaḥ akṛtajña akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:5428: The story of a hunter and an ungrateful man
K01vinv172u:5430: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājyaṃ kārayati;
K01vinv172u:5432: paraśum ābhaṅgīm ādāya kāṣṭhārthī vanaṃ gataḥ;
K01vinv172u:5446: yāvat daivān mṛgalubdhako mṛgān paryeṣamāṇas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5447: sa taṃ kūpaṃ nirīkṣitum ārabdhaḥ; (SBV II 152)
K01vinv172u:5450: tatas tena mṛgalubdhakena jñātvā pūrvataraṃ siṃha uddhṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5455: kṛtaghnā hy eta bhavanti ity uktvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5456: yāvat tena mṛgalubdhakena sarve anupūrveṇa uddhṛtāḥ;
K01vinv172u:5457: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃhena mṛgo jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5458: sa ca mṛgalubdhakas taṃ pradeśam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5459: siṃhena taṃ parijñāya sa mṛgaḥ pādayor nipatya dattaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5460: apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ udyānabhūmiṃ nirgataḥ sārdham antaḥpureṇa;
K01vinv172u:5461: sa tatrodyāne sukham anubhūya middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5462: antaḥpurajano viśvastavihārī udyāne caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati niṣīdati middham avakrāmati;
K01vinv172u:5465: yāvad anyatamā antaḥpurikā alaṃkāram avamucya pārśve sthāpayitvā middham avakrāntā;
K01vinv172u:5466: tat śyenakenāpahṛtya tasmai lubdhakāya kṛtajñatayā dattaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5467: rājā brahmadatto nidrāklamaṃ prativinodya laghu laghv eva vārāṇasīṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5472: deva udyāne me alaṃkāraḥ apahṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5477: sa kṛṣṇaśiraskaḥ tasya mṛgalubdhakasya kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
K01vinv172u:5478: tena tasya gṛham upasaṃkrāmatā upāṃśunā vijñātam asyālaṃkāro 'stīti;
K01vinv172u:5480: tato rājñā paramakopakupitena mṛgalubdhako rājapuruṣair āhvāyya uktaḥ:
K01vinv172u:5481: bhoḥ puruṣa tvayā udyānād alaṃkāro 'pahṛtaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5482: tatas tena santrastena yathāvṛttaṃ samākhyāya asāv alaṃkāro rājñe samarpitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5483: tathāpy asau puruṣaḥ cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5485: tena kṛṣṇaśiraskena pāpakāriṇā asmākaṃ kalyāṇamitro rājñā cārake badhvā sthāpitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5488: daśāmi; tvayā ebhir mantrapadair ebhiś ca oṣadhaiḥ cikitsitavyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5489: evaṃ sa rājā abhiprasanno niyataṃ tvāṃ muñcati;
K01vinv172u:5494: lubdhakena gatvā mantraiś cauṣadhaiś ca cikitsitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5499: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:5500: yo 'sau kṛtaghnapuruṣaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:5503: punar api yathā akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī tac chrūyatāṃ.
K01vinv172u:5511: yāvad asau nakulas taṃ mūṣikam abhidravitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5523: tayor arthāya āśayena āhāraṃ paryeṣitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5528: priyasenaḥ saṃlakṣayati kṛcchrasaṅkaṭasaṃbādhaprāpto 'py eṣas tasya badhāya parākramati;
K01vinv172u:5529: prāg eva yady asau vinā āhāreṇa āgacchati;
K01vinv172u:5533: yadi gaṅgadattaḥ vinā āhāreṇāgacchati sa eva mayā bhakṣayitavya iti;
K01vinv172u:5534: gaṅgadattena āhāraṃ paryeṣamāṇena na kiṃcid āsāditaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5535: sa saṃlakṣayati niyatam asau māṃ bhakṣayati:
K01vinv172u:5542: yo 'sau gaṅgadattaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:5543: yo 'sau nandanāmā nakulaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:5545: etarhy apy eṣa akṛtajñaḥ akṛtavedī (SBV II 154)
K01vinv172u:5547: bhuṅkṣva likhir naṭaḥ kākaḥ cakraḥ kumbhīracandanam /
K01vinv172u:5548: kāyaḥ kavir maṇir vaṇṭaḥ kanyātha dhanapālakaḥ //
K01vinv172u:5549: King Bimbisāra makes exceeding grants to Ajātaśatru
K01vinv172u:5550: yadā ajātaśatruṇā rājño bimbisārasya kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ tadā rājñā upālabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:5551: kumāra kimarthaṃ tvayā mama kanakaḥ kṣiptaḥ sa kathayati:
K01vinv172u:5552: deva roṣāt; devasya bhogāḥ saṃvidyante; mama na (A 480b)
K01vinv172u:5555: putra yady evaṃ gaccha campā sādhāraṇā tava bhavatu iti;
K01vinv172u:5556: sa hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramudito devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati:
K01vinv172u:5557: ārya mayā campā sādhāraṇā labdhā iti;
K01vinv172u:5559: kumāra dṛṣṭaṃ te parākramasya phalam ārya dṛṣṭaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5569: tad arhati devaḥ kumārasya nivāraṇaṃ kartum iti;
K01vinv172u:5575: yady evaṃ rājagṛham ekaṃ tyaktvā magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhāṇa iti;
K01vinv172u:5576: magadhaviṣayaṃ gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gatvā kathayati: ārya mayā (SBV II 155)
K01vinv172u:5577: rājagṛham ekaṃ muktvā sarvo magadhaviṣayo labdhaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:5585: sa rājñā āhūyoktaḥ kumāra kimarthaṃ magadhaviṣayaṃ nāśayasi iti;
K01vinv172u:5586: sa kathayati deva prabhūto janakāyo na puṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:5588: kumāra yady evaṃ kośam ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
K01vinv172u:5589: sa rājagṛham api gṛhītvā devadattasya sakāśaṃ gataḥ kathayati:
K01vinv172u:5597: rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ anyaś ca magadhanivāsī campeyaś ca sarva eva santrastāḥ yathā ajātaśatrur na paśyati tathā dūtasaṃpreṣaṇena rājānaṃ vijñapayitum ārabdhāḥ:
K01vinv172u:5604: tena samutpannamanyunā ajātaśatrur āhūya priyamadhuravaconukūlatayā śiras parāmṛśyoktaḥ:
K01vinv172u:5613: yady evam antaḥpuram ekaṃ muktvā sarvaṃ tavaiva bhavatu iti;
K01vinv172u:5614: tathāpy asau duṣṭaprakṛtiḥ pāpasahāyaś ca nāśayaty eva,
K01vinv172u:5619: Ajātaśatru casts his father in prison,
K01vinv172u:5621: sa evam ukte ruṣitaḥ amātyānāṃ kathayati:
K01vinv172u:5622: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate,
K01vinv172u:5633: ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ iti nāsya kaścit parivādaṃ mantrayati; rājā (A 481a)
K01vinv172u:5639: deva jananī te sthālīpākaṃ praveśayati iti;

K01vinv172u:5789: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka utpadyante hīnadīnānukampakāḥ prāntaśayanāsanabhaktāḥ ekadakṣiṇīyā lokasya;

K01vinv172u:5797: asamanvāhṛtyārhatāṃ pratyekabuddhānām eva jñānadarśanaṃ na pravartate;

K01vinv172u:5805: bhoḥ pravrajita kiṃ tava pādau kṣureṇa likhitau?
K01vinv172u:5808: tenāsau dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpitaḥ ihaiva jighatsaya kālaṃ kuruṣva iti;
K01vinv172u:5811: yady ahaṃ dvāram avamucya gamiṣyāmi bhūyasyā mātrayā kṣato bhaviṣyati iti;

K01vinv172u:5825: sa upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya jvalanatapanavarṣaṇavidyotanaprāṭihāryāṇi kartum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:5827: sa mūlanikṛtta iva drumaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati;
K01vinv172u:5831: tena tasya pādayor nipatya praṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:5832: yan mayā evaṃvidhe sadbhūtadakṣiṇīye apakāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
K01vinv172u:5834: yat tu kāraḥ anenāhaṃ kuśalamūlena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jāyeya;

K01vinv172u:5842: tasya karmaṇo vipākena āḍhye mahādhane mahābhoge kule jātaḥ;

K01vinv172u:5932: Devadatta has himself gilt by gold

K01vinv172u:5971: sa kākas tasyāḥ purastāt suvarṇakholānimittaṃ madhuramadhuraṃ virauti;
K01vinv172u:5972: tatas tayā tasya sauvarṇā kholā dattā;
K01vinv172u:5973: sa tayā pinaddhayā itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramati;

K01vinv172u:6033: Devadatta calls a skilled master-mechanic and makes him construct a catapult in front of the Buddha's residence

K01vinv172u:6038: idānīm ahaṃ śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ jīvitād vyaparopayāmi;
K01vinv172u:6039: na tvayā samanveṣṭavyaṃ kena praghātitaḥ kutra praghātitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6044: āhūyoktaḥ: bhoḥ ācārya śakṣyasi tvam īdṛśaṃ yantraṃ kartuṃ yaḥ paṃcabhiḥ puruṣaśataiḥ āmreḍyate?
K01vinv172u:6055: uktāni ca; yadi śramaṇo gautamo yantreṇa na praghātyate,

K01vinv172u:6079: teṣāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhagavatā sopānaṃ nirmitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6083: bhūyasyā mātrayā cittam abhiprasādya sopānena avatīrya,
K01vinv172u:6085: bhagavān api tadvinayanāpekṣayaiva gṛdhrakūṭe parvate caṅkramyamāṇo 'vasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6086: tatas te bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā purastān niṣaṇṇā dharmaśravaṇāya:
K01vinv172u:6087: bhagavatā teṣām āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñatvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā,
K01vinv172u:6088: yāṃ śrutvā tair viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6090: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā;
K01vinv172u:6091: na rājñā neṣṭena svakanabandhuvargeṇa na pūrvapretair,
K01vinv172u:6101: anādikālopacitaṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa bhitvā srotaāpattiphalaṃ sākṣātkṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6106: upāsakāṃ ca asmān bhagavān dhārayatu adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṃ prāṇopetān,
K01vinv172u:6109: ity uktvā bhagavato 'ntikāt paṃca śikṣāpadāni grahitum ārabdhāḥ
K01vinv172u:6110: Devadatta perceives that the workmen and the mechanic too ran away,
K01vinv172u:6111: and manages himself to hurl a stone from the catapult at the Buddha
K01vinv172u:6117: na patatīti kṛtvā svayam eva tāny anyāni paṃca manuṣyaśatāny ādāya gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam (SBV II 168)
K01vinv172u:6120: dṛṣṭvā ca bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃjātāmarṣo 'nyatomukho gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6122: svayam eva paṃcaśataparivāro yantram āmreḍayitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6124: mayaiva etāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv172u:6125: mayaiva etāni karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
K01vinv172u:6126: iti viditvā tāni paṃca manuṣyaśatāni idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:6127: bhavanto devadattas tīvraparyavasthānāvasthito gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam abhirūḍhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6132: The yakṣa Kumbhīra sacrifices his life in trying to arrest the stone,
K01vinv172u:6133: but a fragment strikes the Buddha on the foot
K01vinv172u:6135: devadatto bhagavato vadhāya parākramati iti viditvā yena kumbhīrayakṣas tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6137: devadatto gṛdhrakūṭād yantreṇa bhagavataḥ śilāṃ kṣeptum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6139: tad ahaṃ yatnam āsthāya antarīkṣe etāṃ śilāṃ vajreṇa cūrṇayāmi;
K01vinv172u:6141: kadācic cūrṇitāyāḥ khaṇḍaḥ bhagavata upariṣṭān nipated ti;
K01vinv172u:6145: devadattena paṃcaśataparivāreṇa yantram āmreḍya bhagavataḥ śilā kṣiptā;
K01vinv172u:6147: ardhaṃ bhagavataḥ sthāne patitukāmaṃ kumbhīrayakṣeṇa gṛhṇatā na sugṛhītaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6149: bhagavatā utplutya pāṣāṇaśarkarayā pādaḥ kṣataḥ kṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6154: yatra sthitau na prasaheta karma // iti
K01vinv172u:6156: kālaṃ kṛtvā praṇīteṣu trayastriṃśeṣu deveṣu upapannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6157: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K01vinv172u:6158: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇā iti sa paśyati:
K01vinv172u:6162: atha yakṣapūrviṇo devaputrasya etad abhavan na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāso bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyaṃ (A 485a)
K01vinv172u:6163: yan nv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti
K01vinv172u:6164: atha sa yakṣapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātras
K01vinv172u:6165: tām eva rātriṃ divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ
K01vinv172u:6166: pūrayitvā sarvaṃ gṛdhrakūṭaṃ parvatam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair
K01vinv172u:6168: tato bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasaṃprativedhikī
K01vinv172u:6169: dharmadeśanā kṛtā yāṃ śrutvā yakṣapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ
K01vinv172u:6172: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6174: na rājñā na devatābhir na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam;
K01vinv172u:6176: laṃghitā asthiparvatāḥ pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi;
K01vinv172u:6194: atha yakṣapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ saṃpannasasya iva kārṣakaḥ śūra
K01vinv172u:6195: iva vijitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv172u:6200: kiṃ bhagavan imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraḥ catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhagavān āha:
K01vinv172u:6201: na bhikṣavo brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ na śakro devānām indraḥ nāpi catvāro lokapālā mām darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6202: api tu devadattena madvadhāyodyuktena yā gṛddhrakūṭaparvatād yantreṇa śilā kṣiptā sā antarīkṣe eva vajrapāṇinā vajreṇa cūrṇitā;
K01vinv172u:6203: tasyā ardhaṃ mamopari patamānaṃ kumbhīrayakṣeṇa durgṛhītaṃ kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6204: sa tena praghātito mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ;
K01vinv172u:6206: upapannaḥ; sa imāṃ rātriṃ matsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6209: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇām ekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6212: tasmāt tarhi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇāni karmāṇy apāsya vyatimiśrāṇi ca ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogāḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam*
K01vinv172u:6213: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:6214: paśya bhadanta kumbhīreṇa yakṣeṇa bhagavataḥ arthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6216: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani anena mamārthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6219: (concerning a previous birth of yakṣa Kumbhīra)
K01vinv172u:6220: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca kṣemaṃ ca subhikṣaṃ ca ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ
K01vinv172u:6221: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ nātidūre anyatarasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvihaganikūjite ṛṣiḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:6223: tasya cāśramapadasya sāmantakena mṛgalubdhako mṛgān praghātya praghātya jīvikāṃ kalpayati;
K01vinv172u:6224: sa tasya ṛṣeḥ kālena kālam upasaṃkrāmati;
K01vinv172u:6225: tasyāsau ṛṣiḥ śrāntasya mūlaphalair upasaṃhāraṃ karoti;
K01vinv172u:6231: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā brahmadattaḥ kālyam evotthāya mṛgavadhāya nirgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:6232: tena mṛgaḥ śaraparamparayā tāḍitaḥ utpatitaḥ taya ṛṣer āśramapadaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6233: tatrāpi rājñā nārācena marmaṇi tāḍitaḥ kālagataḥ;
K01vinv172u:6235: kalirājas tvaṃ durācāro yena me śaraṇopagato mṛgaḥ praghātitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6236: evam ukte sa rājā dveṣaparyavasthānaniviṣṭabuddhir amātyānāṃ kathayati:
K01vinv172u:6237: bhavanto yo rājānaṃ kṣatriyaṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ paribhāṣate tasya ko daṇḍaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6241: yady evaṃ parityakto me ayam ṛṣiḥ;
K01vinv172u:6243: daivāt sa lubdhakas tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:6245: mama jīvataḥ katham ṛṣiḥ praghātyate iti;
K01vinv172u:6250: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6251: yo 'sau lubdhakaḥ eṣa eva sa kumbhīrayakṣaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6253: etarhy apy anena mamārthāya ātmā parityaktaḥ iti
K01vinv172u:6254: Jīvaka prescribes a very rare substance called gośīrṣacandana in order to stop the hemorrhage at the foot of the Buddha
K01vinv172u:6258: jīvako vaidyarājo bhagavato rujāvalokakaḥ trikālam upasaṃkrāmati;
K01vinv172u:6259: rājagṛhanivāsī śrāddho janakāyaḥ nānādeśabhyāgatāś ca samyagdarśanasaṃpannāḥ dhaninaḥ śreṣṭhinaḥ sārthavāhāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6261: jīvaka idam atra bhaiṣajyaṃ śobhanam iti;
K01vinv172u:6271: tena khalu samayena goṣīrṣacandanasya prāptir eva samucchinnā;
K01vinv172u:6272: yāvad anyatamena vaṇijā gośīrṣacandanam ātyayikaṃ sthāpitam:
K01vinv172u:6273: ayaṃ rājā ajātaśatruś caṇḍo rabhasaḥ karkaśaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6274: yady asya daivād gośīrṣacandanena prayojanaṃ bhavati (SBV II 172)
K01vinv172u:6276: yasmād ahaṃ kālānukālaṃ gośīrṣacandanavikrayaṃ kṛtavān iti;
K01vinv172u:6277: tena śrutaṃ yathā jīvakena vaidyarājena bhagavato rujāpraśamanaṃ gośīrṣacandanam upadiṣṭam iti;
K01vinv172u:6280: yady ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ pradāsyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad anarthaṃ kariṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:6285: yannv ahaṃ bhagavato gośīrṣacandanaṃ prayaccheyam iti;
K01vinv172u:6286: sa gośīrṣacandanam ādāya bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:6287: bhagavann upalabdhaṃ mayā bhagavato gośīrṣacandanena prayojanam iti;
K01vinv172u:6288: idaṃ tat pratigṛhṇātu bhagavān anukampām upādāya iti;
K01vinv172u:6290: pratigṛhṇīṣva ānanda asya mahātmanaḥ sakāśād gośīrṣacandanam iti;
K01vinv172u:6292: tato 'sau vaṇik prītiprāmodyajātaḥ bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntaḥ
K01vinv172u:6294: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavantaḥ smitaṃ prāviṣkurvanti tasmin samaye nīlapītalohitāvadātāḥ arciṣaḥ mukhān niścarya kāścid adhastād
K01vinv172u:6296: yā adhastād gacchanti tāḥ sañjīvaṃ kālasūtraṃ saṅghātaṃ rauravaṃ mahārauravaṃ tāpanaṃ
K01vinv172u:6297: pratāpanam avīcim arbudaṃ nirarbudam aṭaṭaṃ hahavaṃ huhuvam utpalaṃ padmaṃ mahāpadmaṃ
K01vinv172u:6298: narakaṃ gatvā ye uṣṇanarakās teṣu śītībhūtvā nipatanti;
K01vinv172u:6302: kiṃ nu vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ āhosvid anyatropapannāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6305: na haiva vayaṃ bhavantaḥ itaś cyutāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6308: asya anubhāvena asmākaṃ kāraṇāviśeṣāḥ pratiprasrabdhāḥ iti;

K01vinv172u:6317: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //

K01vinv172u:6320: atha tā arciṣas trisahasramahāsahasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti;

K01vinv172u:6360: sa eṣa ānanda vaṇik tena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca candano nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati;

K01vinv172u:6363: and Jīvaka prescribes the milk of a young woman
K01vinv172u:6368: bhikṣavo na jānate kīdṛśaṃ kanyākṣīram iti;
K01vinv172u:6374: tasyā yat kṣīraṃ tat kanyākṣīram ity ucyate iti;

K01vinv172u:6378: te catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ janakāyasya ca paryeṣamāṇasya yais tair upāyaiḥ vighnaṃ kurvanti;
K01vinv172u:6379: yāvad rājagṛhe anyatamā prathamaprasavā kanyā svalpakṣīrā svakam api puraṃ kṣīreṇa na santarpayati;
