K01vinv172u:6423: abṛhān atapān sudṛśān sudarśanān akaniṣṭhān devān gatvā anityaṃ duḥkhaṃ śūnyam anātmā ity udghoṣayanti;
K01vinv172u:6426: dhunīta mṛtyunaḥ sainyaṃ naḍāgāram iva kuñjaraḥ //
K01vinv172u:6427: yo hy asmin dharmavinaye apramattaś cariṣyati /
K01vinv172u:6429: atha tā arciṣas trisahasramahāsahasraṃ lokadhātum anvāhiṇḍya bhagavantam eva pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchanti;
K01vinv172u:6430: tad yadi bhagavān atītaṃ karma vyākartukāmo bhavati,
K01vinv172u:6438: balacakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati vāme karatale antardhīyante;
K01vinv172u:6439: cakravartirājyaṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati dakṣiṇe karatale antardhīyante;
K01vinv172u:6443: anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhiṃ vyākartukāmo bhavati uṣṇīṣe antardhīyante
K01vinv172u:6444: atha tā arciṣo bhagavantaṃ triḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya bhagavata ūrṇāyām antarhitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6462: taṃ śrotuṃ samabhilaṣanti te janaughāḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:6465: yayā mamāntike cittam abhiprasādyakṣīraṃ dattaṃ dṛṣṭā bhadanta;
K01vinv172u:6466: eṣā sā ānanda dārikā anena kuśalamūlena cittotpādena deyadharmaparityāgena ca kṣīraprado nāma pratyekabuddho bhaviṣyati;
K01vinv172u:6467: ayam asyā deyadharmo yo mamāntike cittaprasādaḥ iti
K01vinv172u:6471: nānādeśanivāsino bhikṣavaḥ abhyāgatāḥ bhagavata evaṃvidham ābādhaṃ (SBV II 174)
K01vinv172u:6476: samaṃ te bhagavaṃś cittaṃ putreṣv api ariṣv api /
K01vinv172u:6477: anena satyavākyena tiṣṭha kṣataja mā srava // iti
K01vinv172u:6479: bhikṣavaḥ pramuditamanasaḥ saṃvṛttāḥ bhikṣuṇyaḥ upāsakāḥ upāsikyaḥ bhūyasā sarva
K01vinv172u:6480: eva rājagṛhanivāsī janakāyaḥ sthāpayitvā devadattājātaśatrū kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāṃś ca;
K01vinv172u:6481: bhagavān jānann eva yo yathā cikitsāṃ karoti,
K01vinv172u:6484: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:6485: paśya bhadanta bhagavatā āyuṣmatā daśabalakāśyapena satyopayācanayā sravad rudhiraṃ vidhāritam iti;
K01vinv172u:6487: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani aham anena viṣakṛtena paryākulīkṛto nirviṣīkṛtaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6491: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasya karvaṭakasya nātidūre udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6492: tatra ṛṣiḥ prativasati phalamūlāmbubhakṣaḥ ajinavalkalavāsāḥ vidyāmantradhārī ca;
K01vinv172u:6495: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:6496: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ kālāntareṇa patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:6497: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:6499: tasya trīṇi saptakāny ekaviṃśatidivasān vistareṇa jātasya jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6502: sthito śayito vā kuśalaṃ cittam atikuśalaṃ ca karma karoti;
K01vinv172u:6503: tasya janakāyena dharmakāma iti saṃjñā kṛtā;
K01vinv172u:6504: sa kiṃkuśalagaveṣitayā karvaṭakān niṣkramya kālānukālaṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāmati;
K01vinv172u:6511: sa mātāpitṛbhyāṃ tasya ṛṣeḥ sakāśam upanītaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6512: maharṣe upasthāyakas te viṣakṛtena prāṇair viyujyate;
K01vinv172u:6515: samaṃ te dāraka cittaṃ mitreṣv api ripuṣv api /
K01vinv172u:6516: anena satyavākyena nirviṣo bhava dāraka // iti
K01vinv172u:6518: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6519: yo 'sau ṛṣiḥ eṣa eva sa daśabalakāśyapaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6521: etarhy apy aham anena satyopayācanena svasthīkṛtaḥ
K01vinv172u:6524: vyarthaṃ mayā śramaṇasya gautamasya śilā kṣiptā;
K01vinv172u:6527: sa vṛkṣamūlaṃ gatvā cintāparaḥ kṛtakena paryaṅkaṃ badhvā avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6533: kiṃ bhavanto yadvā tadvā asamīkṣya kathayanti nanu paśyata devadattam asmin vṛkṣamūle;
K01vinv172u:6536: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:6537: paśya bhadanta amī kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattāḥ ātmanā alajjinaḥ alajjino devadattasya varṇaṃ bhāṣante iti;
K01vinv172u:6539: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani ete alajjina alajjino varṇam abhāṣanta;
K01vinv172u:6541: The story of a jackal and a crow
K01vinv172u:6542: (concerning a previous birth of Devadatta, etc.)
K01vinv172u:6543: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo rājagṛhīyakair manuṣyaiḥ rājñā ca kenacit kāraṇena kriyākāraṃ kṛtvā dve śmaśāne vyavasthāpite,
K01vinv172u:6544: ekasmin pradeśe puruṣāś chorayitavyāḥ ekasmin striyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6546: sa na ekasmin śmaśāne avakāśaṃ labhate,
K01vinv172u:6547: na dvitīye; rājagṛhasyānyatamasmin pradeśe udyānaṃ mūlakandapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6550: tasmiṃś ca pradeśe trikaṇṭakedārairaṇḍavṛkṣāś ca santi;
K01vinv172u:6558: sa tasya gāthayā varṇaṃ bhāṣitum ārabdhaḥ:
K01vinv172u:6559: siṃhasya te yathā grīvā ṛṣabhasya yathā kaṭiḥ /
K01vinv172u:6560: mṛgarāja namas tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
K01vinv172u:6563: avabhāsya diśaḥ sarvāḥ bhrājate ratnapiṇḍavat // iti
K01vinv172u:6566: mṛharāja nams tubhyaṃ bhuktaśeṣaṃ labhemahi // iti
K01vinv172u:6569: ākrandacāriṇāṃ śreṣṭha ehi bhuṅkṣva yathāsukhaṃ // iti
K01vinv172u:6570: so 'vatīrṇaḥ sṛgālena saha kuṇapaṃ bhakṣayan tena ṛṣiṇā dṛṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6573: vṛkṣādhamasya cchāyāyāṃ bhuñjate kuṇapaṃ saha // iti
K01vinv172u:6576: yadi siṃho myūraś ca bhuñjate varajāṅgalam /
K01vinv172u:6579: pakṣiṇām adhamaḥ kākaḥ jambukaś ca catuṣpadām /
K01vinv172u:6580: eraṇḍaś cāpi vṛkṣāṇāṃ mauṣyānāṃ ca paṇḍakaḥ /
K01vinv172u:6582: tataḥ kāko bhūyasyā mātrayā saṃjātāmarṣo ṛṣer agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya vyavalokayitum ārabdho na paśyati kiṃcit;
K01vinv172u:6584: yāvad asau ṛṣir agniśaraṇaṃ praviśya paśyati kamaṇḍaluṃ bhagnaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6588: na rocyās tādṛśāḥ kecid alajināḥ krūrāśayāḥ /
K01vinv172u:6590: avarṇārho na varṇārhaḥ na vācyaṃ khalu sarvathā /
K01vinv172u:6591: kiṃcin matimatā nityaṃ tūṣṇīṃbhāvaḥ sukhāvahaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:6592: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau ṛṣir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6593: sṛgālo devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena,
K01vinv172u:6594: kākaḥ kokālikaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6595: tadāpy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇam abhāṣātām;
K01vinv172u:6596: etarhy apy etāv alajjinau alajjinor varṇaṃ bhāṣete
K01vinv172u:6597: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:6598: kutra bhadanta bhagavato devadattasya ca tatprathamato vairūkṣyam utpannam iti;
K01vinv172u:6600: The story of the two birds Dharma and Adharma
K01vinv172u:6601: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:6602: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau jīvajīvakau ekena kāyena samudratīre prativasataḥ dharmaś cādharmaś ca;
K01vinv172u:6632: yāvad apareṇa samayena dharmo middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6639: yatra yatra janmani tava vadhakaḥ syāṃ pratyarthikaḥ pratyamitraḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6642: tatra tatra janmani tava maitryupasaṃhāraṃ kuryām iti
K01vinv172u:6644: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau dharmaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6645: yo 'sāv adharmaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6651: The story of Sūryanemi the poet
K01vinv172u:6652: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:6653: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ sarjaraso nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:6654: tena bhūmyantarasya rājñaḥ sakāśād dārikā labdhā;
K01vinv172u:6655: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:6656: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ sā dārikā kālāntareṇa āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:6657: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt sūryodaye prasūtā; dārako (SBV II 179)
K01vinv172u:6659: tasya jātau jātimahaṃ kṛtvā nāmadheyaṃ vyavasthāpyte kiṃ bhavatu dārakasya nāma iti;
K01vinv172u:6665: dvābhyām aṃsadhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ kṣīradhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ maladhātrībhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ krīḍanikābhyāṃ dhātrībhyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:6666: so 'ṣṭābhir dhātrībhir unnīyate vardhyate kṣīreṇa dadhnā navanītena sarpiṣā sarpirmaṇḍena anyaiś cottaptottaptair upakaraṇaviśeṣair āśu vardhate hradastham iva paṅkajam;
K01vinv172u:6667: sa yadā mahān saṃvṛttas tadā lipyām upanyastaḥ saṅkhyāyāṃ gaṇanāyāṃ mudrāyāṃ;
K01vinv172u:6668: yāni rājñāṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ mūrdhābhiṣiktānāṃ janapadaiśvaryasthāmavīryam anuprāptānāṃ
K01vinv172u:6669: mahāntaṃ pṛthivīmaṇḍalam abhinirjitya adhyāvasatāṃ pṛthag bhavanti śilpasthānakarmasthānāni
K01vinv172u:6670: tadyathā hastigrīvāyām aśvapṛṣṭhe rathe tsarau dhanuṣi apayāne niryāṇe aṃkuśagrahe
K01vinv172u:6671: pāśagrahe tomaragrahe chedye bhedye vedhye muṣṭibandhe pādabandhe śikhābandhe dūravedhe
K01vinv172u:6672: śabdavedhe marmavedhe akṣūṇavedhe dṛḍhaprahāritāyāṃ pañcasu sthāneṣu kṛtāvī saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6677: yāvad apareṇa samayena rājā sarjarasaḥ dharmayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:6678: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ dharmā āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:6681: sa rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya svayam eva paṭṭe badhvā rājyaiśvaryādhipatyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:6691: ayam amātyo goniṣādaḥ mayā praṇītair bhogaiḥ saṃvibhaktaḥ,
K01vinv172u:6699: tvayā matpriyatayā tathā anuṣṭheyaṃ yathā dharmā sūryaneminā jīvitān na vyaparopyate (SBV II 180)
K01vinv172u:6701: deva tad api na śakyaṃ te kartum;
K01vinv172u:6703: tathā kariṣye yathā na praghātyate iti
K01vinv172u:6715: tad yadi dārakaṃ janayiṣyati sa eva jīvitād vyaparopyate iti;
K01vinv172u:6720: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:6724: sa jātamātra eva kaivartīṃ dhanena pralobhya parivartitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6730: sa dārakaḥ kaivartyā āpāyitaḥ poṣitaḥ saṃvardhitaḥ mahān saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6733: tasya kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ iti saṃjñā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:6741: putrābhilāṣiṇī ākāṃkṣaty eva darśanaṃ nāvatiṣṭhate iti;
K01vinv172u:6742: tasyā goniṣādena avaśyanirbandhaṃ jñātvā upāyasaṃvidhānena matsyāṃ kṛtvā praveśitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6744: eṣa kaviḥ kaivartadārako rājānaṃ jīvitād vyaparopya,
K01vinv172u:6745: svayam eva paṭṭāṃ badhvā rājyaṃ kārayiṣyati iti;
K01vinv172u:6750: sa itaś cāmutaś ca niṣpalāyamāno vṛddhayuvatyā gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6752: tato haridratailena gātrāṇi mrakṣayitvā maṃce āropya mṛta iti kṛtvā niṣkāsitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6755: tasmin pradeśe anyatamaḥ puruṣaḥ puṣpaphalāni paryeṣate;
K01vinv172u:6758: tair asau puruṣaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ: bho (SBV II 181)
K01vinv172u:6759: puruṣa na tvayā īdṛśaḥ pramāṇena varṇena ca anena pathā gacchan kaścin manuṣyo dṛṣṭaḥ?
K01vinv172u:6766: rajakena vastravaraṇḍena veṣṭayitvā gardabhe āropya karvaṭakān niṣkāsitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6780: na mayā kadācid evaṃrūpā upānahā kṛtapūrvā;
K01vinv172u:6785: yat pṛṣṭhaṃ tad iha mamāgrataḥ kuruṣva // iti
K01vinv172u:6789: sa tena upānahau prāvṛtya upacchidreṇa niṣpalāyitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6793: rājñā śravaparamparayā śrutaṃ yathā asau nāgair nāgabhavanaṃ praveśitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:6797: taiḥ sarve viṣayanivāsinaḥ āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ upanītāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6801: evaṃ deveti sarve āhituṇḍikāḥ rājñaḥ pratiśrutya tannāgabhavanaṃ gatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6802: anyatarasyāṃ cāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma yakṣo māṃsarudhirabhakṣaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6803: tasya bhayāt śvāpadā api tam aṭavīṃ parityajanti;
K01vinv172u:6804: kim uta manuṣyāḥ sā piṅgalāṭavīti prakāśā (SBV II 182)
K01vinv172u:6805: saṃvṛttā; āhituṇḍikena sa nāgas tathā mantrabalādhānād upadruto yathā (A 491a)
K01vinv172u:6806: santrastaḥ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ chorito na śaktas tām atikrāmayituṃ;
K01vinv172u:6808: na śobhanam asmābhiḥ kṛtaṃ yad asau piṅgalāṭavīṃ nātikrāmitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6820: yady apy evaṃ tathāpi samanveṣyatām iti;
K01vinv172u:6821: sa piṅgalāṭavyām itaś cāmutaś ca paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6822: piṅgalaś ca yakṣaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe kukkuraiḥ parivṛtas tiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:6823: tenāsau kukkuraiś ca dūrata eva dṛṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6831: bhoḥ puruṣa na tvayā śrutaṃ piṅgalāṭavyāṃ piṅgalo nāma amanuṣyakaḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:6832: yas tatra praviśati sa taṃ praghātayati iti;
K01vinv172u:6843: sa vṛkṣāt śanair avatīrya prakrāntaḥ tena tenānvāhiṇḍan;
K01vinv172u:6847: tasya ca ṛṣer anyatamasmin parvate udyānaṃ mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpannaṃ vividhataruṣaṇḍamaṇḍitaṃ nānāvihaganikūjitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6848: so 'nupūrveṇa śravaparamparayā tasya riṣeḥ sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6853: sa patann anyatamena puruṣeṇa śikhāyāṃ gṛhītāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6857: mṛto 'yaṃ; gacchāmaḥ iti te śikhām ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ kathayanti: (SBV II 183)
K01vinv172u:6867: yadi mayā na samanvāhṛto 'bhaviyat prāṇair viyuktaḥ abhaviṣyad iti;
K01vinv172u:6869: īdṛśīṃ vidyāṃ jānīte yayā puruṣaḥ strī bhavati strī puruṣo bhavati;
K01vinv172u:6870: sa tena tāṃ vidyāṃ grāhitaḥ; uktaś ca:
K01vinv172u:6874: vidyayā abhinirmāya vārāṇasīṃ gatvā rājakīye udyāne sthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6877: tair laghu laghv eva gatvā sūryanemino rājñaḥ samākhyātaṃ:
K01vinv172u:6881: rājā sūryanemis tayā sārdham atīva saṃraktaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6882: tatas tayā avasaraṃ jñātvā rahasi sthito jīvitād vyaparopitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6883: punaś ca vidyāṃ parivartya puruṣaḥ saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6884: tataḥ svayam eva paṭṭaṃ badhvā goniṣādasyāmātyasya nivedya rājye pratiṣṭhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6886: nāsau hato yaya śiro na chinnaṃ
K01vinv172u:6890: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sūryanemī rājā sarjarasya rājñaḥ putraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6891: yo 'sau kaviḥ kaivartadārakaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6894: bhūyo 'pi yathaiṣa mama vairānubaddhas tac chrūyatām
K01vinv172u:6895: The story of the two jewellers
K01vinv172u:6896: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and of Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:6897: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake dvau maṇikārau prativasataḥ;
K01vinv172u:6899: tena khalu samayena anyatamaḥ parikṣīṇavibhavo vaṇik;
K01vinv172u:6900: sa maṇibhājanam ādāya taṃ karvaṭakam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6901: tato mārgaśramaṃ prativinodya ekasya maṇikārasya sakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ kathayati:
K01vinv172u:6906: yady api ahaṃ bhogebhyaḥ paribhraṣṭaḥ na tu prajñayā;
K01vinv172u:6926: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau maṇikāraḥ yena maṇibhājanasya svalpaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6927: yo 'sau dvitīyo maṇikāraḥ yena puṣkalaṃ mūlyaṃ kṛtam aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6929: punar api yathā vayoḥ vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6931: The story of the elder son of a gṛhapati
K01vinv172u:6932: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:6933: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake gṛhapatiḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:6935: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:6938: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:6945: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:6953: tasya bahavaḥ putrā duhitaraś ca jātāḥ;
K01vinv172u:6955: āryaputra eṣa dārakas tava ko bhavati?
K01vinv172u:6961: eṣāṃ cāsya ca tulyo gṛhabhogo deyaḥ;
K01vinv172u:6966: kāmān khalu pratisevamānasya nāsti kiṃcit pāpakaṃ karma akaraṇīyam iti sa puṣpaphalavyājena aṭavīṃ nītvā praghātitaḥ; (SBV II 185)
K01vinv172u:6967: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jyeṣṭho gṛhapatiputraḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6968: yo 'sau kanīyān aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:6971: yathā punar apy āvayor vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ;
K01vinv172u:6973: The story of a girl and an astrologer
K01vinv172u:6974: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:6975: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin karvaṭake brāhmaṇaḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:6977: sa tayā sārdhaṃ krīḍati ramate paricārayati;
K01vinv172u:6978: tasya krīḍato ramamāṇasya paricārayataḥ patnī āpannasatvā saṃvṛttā;
K01vinv172u:6979: sā aṣṭānāṃ vā navānāṃ vā māsānām atyayāt prasūtā;
K01vinv172u:6982: yo mamādya gṛhaṃ brāhmaṇo bhikṣārthī praviśati,
K01vinv172u:6984: yāvad anyatamo māṇavaḥ bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
K01vinv172u:6993: yāvad anyatamo māṇavo bhikṣārthī tasya gṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ:
K01vinv172u:7006: tvaṃ punaḥ kimarthaṃ nakṣatraṃ na paśyati?
K01vinv172u:7008: nakṣatraṃ bhadrakaṃ sarvaṃ sarve kalyāṇakā dināḥ /
K01vinv172u:7011: artho hy arthasya nakṣatraṃ kiṃ kāryaṃ jyotibhiḥ punaḥ //
K01vinv172u:7013: tenānyena māṇavena śrutaṃ sā brāḥmaṇakanyā anena māṇavena pratīṣṭā iti;
K01vinv172u:7015: kathayati: māṇavakaḥ sā kanyā kimarthaṃ tvayā pratīṣṭā?
K01vinv172u:7020: mama tu śobhanaṃ nakṣatram iti; sa ruṣitaḥ
K01vinv172u:7021: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrvamāṇavaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7022: yo 'sau paścimako māṇavaḥ aham eva sa tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7024: etrhy apy asya mamāntike vairūkṣyam utpannaṃ
K01vinv172u:7025: The very ferocious elephant of Ājātaśatru,
K01vinv172u:7027: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
K01vinv172u:7028: tena khalu samayena yo 'sau rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ dhanapālako nāma duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
K01vinv172u:7030: deva dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ karoti;
K01vinv172u:7031: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
K01vinv172u:7032: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
K01vinv172u:7039: bhavanto rājagṛhanivāsinā janakāyena abhihito 'smi dhanapālako duṣṭanāgaḥ pratidinam āvāsān niṣkrāmyamāṇo rathyāvīthīcatvaraśṛṅgāṭakeṣu mahājanavipraghātaṃ
K01vinv172u:7040: tad arhati devaḥ hastidamakānām ājñāṃ dātuṃ yathā na pratidinaṃ niṣkāsayanti;
K01vinv172u:7041: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitum iti;
K01vinv172u:7043: śvo niṣkrāmyate iti ca ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayitavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:7044: hastidamakāḥ rājñaḥ ajātaśatroḥ pratiśrutya pādayor nipatya prakrāntāḥ (SBV II 187)
K01vinv172u:7045: Devadatta's attempt to kill the Buddha by means of the elephant Dhanapālaka
K01vinv172u:7046: rājagṛhe cānyataro gṛhapatiḥ āḍhyo mahādhano mahābhogaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7047: tena buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7048: devadattena śrutaṃ yathā amukena gṛhapatinā buddhapramuko bhikṣusaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktenopanimantritaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7049: tena hastidamakasya śatasahasro muktāhāro dattaḥ; uktaś ca:
K01vinv172u:7050: amukena gṛhapatinā śramaṇo gautamaḥ saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ śvo 'ntargṛhe bhaktena upanimantritaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7051: tat tvayā dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7054: kiṃtu yathā vā tathā vā devam avalokaya iti;
K01vinv172u:7055: tato devadatto yena rājā ajātaśatrus tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7057: śaktas tvaṃ māṃ buddhatve na pratiṣṭhāpayitum; (A 493a)
K01vinv172u:7058: api tu tvaṃ pitaraṃ jīvitād vyaparopya rājye pratiṣṭhapitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7059: aham api śramaṇaṃ gautamaṃ praghātya sarvajñatvaṃ karomi;
K01vinv172u:7065: yady adāntadamakāḥ syuḥ aham eva tāvad anena dāntaḥ syām iti;
K01vinv172u:7066: sa taṃ yathā vā tathā vā avalokya hastidamakānāṃ sakāśam upasaṃkramya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:7068: tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvo dhanapālako hastināgaḥ utsraṣṭavyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7072: tad yuṣmābhiḥ śvaḥ sarvaprayatnena ātmarakṣā kartavyā iti;
K01vinv172u:7077: kathaṃ mayā buddhapramukho bhikṣusaṃghaḥ bhojayitavyaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7081: sa śuci praṇītaṃ khādanīyabhojanīyaṃ sādhayitvā kālyam evotthāya bhagavataḥ sakāśaṃ gataḥ:
K01vinv172u:7082: bhagavan rājagṛhe ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ śvo dhanapālako hastināgo mucyate;
K01vinv172u:7091: tato 'sau gṛhapatir āttamanāttamanāḥ svagṛhaṃ gataḥ; annapānaṃ (SBV II 188)
K01vinv172u:7092: samanvāhṛtya āsanādi prajñapya bhagavantam udīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7093: atha bhagavān pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ praviṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7095: adrākṣīd dhanapālako hastināgo bhagavantaṃ dūrād eva;
K01vinv172u:7096: dṛṣṭvā ca punar bhrūkuṭiṃ kṛtvā nādaṃ ca muktvā yena bhagavāṃs tena sabalam ājavena prādhāvat
K01vinv172u:7097: atha devadattaḥ ajātaśatrusahīyaḥ apariprāsādam abhiruhya avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7099: tato devadattaḥ bhagavantaṃ dṛṣṭvā hṛṣṭatuṣṭapramuditaḥ uccair gāthām uvāca
K01vinv172u:7101: saśrāvakaś śākyasuta tvam adya na bhaviṣyasi // iti
K01vinv172u:7104: pravādaṃ tvaṃ pravadasi daśabalabalinaṃ mām agaṇayitvā;
K01vinv172u:7105: paśyedānīṃ tu balaṃ daśabalabalinaḥ adbhutasya iti;
K01vinv172u:7106: tato bhagavatā dakṣiṇe karatale paṃca siṃhāḥ kesariṇaḥ paṭṭadhāriṇo nirmitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7107: sa teṣāṃ gandhaṃ ghrātvā mūtrapuriṣam utsṛjan niṣpalāyitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7108: bhagavatā sarvā diśaḥ ādīptāḥ pradīptāḥ saṃprajvalitāḥ ekajvālībhūtā adhimuktāḥ sthāpayitvā (A 493b)
K01vinv172u:7109: svakam eva pādamūlaṃ śāntaṃ śītībhūtam adhiṣṭhitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7110: tato dhanapālako hastināgaḥ itaś cāmutaś ca pradhāvan sarvam ādiptaṃ paśyati;
K01vinv172u:7112: dhanapālakaprakopaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve bhikṣavo niṣpalāyitāḥ sthāpayitvā āyuṣmantam ānandaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7113: tato dhanapālako vigatamadavego mandagatipracāratayā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7114: sa bhagavatā cakrasvastikanandyāvartena anekapuṇyaśatanirjātena bhītānām āśvāsanakareṇa kareṇa śirasi parāmṛṣṭaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7119: bhadrā hi nāga gatir bhavati // iti+
K01vinv172u:7120: The elephant Dhanapālaka follows submissively the Buddha,
K01vinv172u:7121: dies of grief and is reborn in the heaven of the four great kings
K01vinv172u:7122: tvaṃ tāvad bhadramukha pūrvakeṇa duścaritena pratyavarāyāṃ tiryagyonāv utpannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7123: sa tvam etarhi paraprāṇaharaḥ paraprāṇoparodhena parituṣyasi;
K01vinv172u:7124: itaś cyutasya te kā gatir bhaviṣyasi?
K01vinv172u:7125: kā upapattiḥ ko 'bhisaṃparāyaḥ iti hi bhadramukha sarvasaṃskārā anityāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7128: mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya adyaiva tiryagyoniṃ virāgayiṣyasi;
K01vinv172u:7129: ity uktvā yena tasya gṛhapater niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7135: bhagavatā tad gṛhaṃ sphaṭikamayaṃ nirmitaṃ yatrānāvṛtaṃ buddhabimbaṃ paśyati;
K01vinv172u:7136: sa bhagavnataṃ dṛṣṭvā na bhaṅktum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7137: bhagavān saśrāvakasaṃghaḥ bhuktvā dakṣiṇādeśanāṃ kṛtvā prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7142: taṃ hastinam āgamya sīmāntarā rājānaḥ māṃ nābhidravanti;
K01vinv172u:7146: yadā bhagavān nirgato bhavati tadā bhavadbhir dhanapālaḥ hastināgo dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayitavyaḥ yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ na nirgacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:7147: amātyai api hastidamakānām ājñā dattā dhanapālakaṃ hastināgaṃ dvāraṃ badhvā sthāpayata yathā bhagavataḥ pṛṣṭhato na nirgacchati iti;
K01vinv172u:7148: sa bhagavantam apaśyan pādena śuṇḍām avaṣṭabhya kālagataḥ;
K01vinv172u:7150: dharmatā khalu devaputrasya vā devakanyāyā vā aciropapannasya trīṇi cittāny utpadyante:
K01vinv172u:7151: kutaś cyutaḥ kutropapannaḥ kena karmaṇā iti;
K01vinv172u:7156: na mama pratirūpaṃ syād yad ahaṃ paryuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāya upasaṃkrameyaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7157: yannv aham aparyuṣitaparivāsa eva bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrameyam iti; atha (A 494a)
K01vinv172u:7158: nāgapūrvī devaputraś calavimalakuṇḍaladharo hārārdhahāravibhūṣitagātraḥ tām eva rātriṃ
K01vinv172u:7159: divyānām utpalapadmakumudapuṇḍarīkamāndārakāṇāṃ puṣpāṇām utsaṃgaṃ pūrayitvā sarvaṃ
K01vinv172u:7160: veṇuvanaṃ kalandakanivāpam udāreṇāvabhāsenāvabhāsya bhagavataṃ puṣpair avakīrya bhagavataḥ
K01vinv172u:7162: tataḥ asya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṃ dhātuṃ prakṛtiṃ ca jñātvā tādṛśī dharmadeśanā kṛtā
K01vinv172u:7163: yāṃ śrutvā nāgapūrviṇā devaputreṇa viṃśatiśikharasamudgataṃ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṃ jñānavajreṇa
K01vinv172u:7166: idam asmākaṃ bhadanta na mātrā kṛtaṃ na pitrā kṛtaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7169: na pūrvapretair na śramaṇabrāhmaṇaiḥ yad bhagavatā asmākaṃ kṛtam;
K01vinv172u:7171: laṃghitā asthiparvatāḥ pihitāny apāyadvārāṇi vivṛtāni svargamokṣadvārāṇi;
K01vinv172u:7189: atha nāgapūrvī devaputro vaṇig iva labdhalābhaḥ sasyasaṃpanna iva kārṣakaḥ śūra iva
K01vinv172u:7190: jitasaṃgrāmaḥ sarvarogaparimukta ivāturo yayā vibhūtyā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāntaḥ
K01vinv172u:7195: kiṃ bhagavan imāṃ rātriṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāya brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ śakro devendraḥ catvāro lokapālā upasaṃkrāntāḥ bhagavān āha:
K01vinv172u:7196: na bhikṣavo brahmā sabhāṃpatiḥ na śakro devānām indraḥ nāpi catvāro lokapālāḥ māṃ darśanāyopasaṃkrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7197: api tu yuṣmābhir bhikṣavaḥ sa dhanapālo hastināgaḥ,
K01vinv172u:7198: tāvac caṇḍaḥ tāvad rabhaso yas tathāgatasya vadhāya parākrāntaḥ dṛṣṭo bhadanta:
K01vinv172u:7199: mayā vinītaḥ sa mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ cāturmahārājijeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7203: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7206: kiṃ karma kṛtaṃ yena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ satyadarśanaṃ ca kṛtam iti;
K01vinv172u:7208: dhanapālakenaiva hi bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny avaśyabhāvīni;
K01vinv172u:7209: dhanapālena karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni ko 'nyaḥ pratyanubhaviṣyati?
K01vinv172u:7213: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ asminn eva bhadrake kalpe viṃśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṃ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi,
K01vinv172u:7214: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
K01vinv172u:7215: sa vārāṇasīṃ nagarīm upaniśritya viharati ṛṣivadane mṛgadāve;
K01vinv172u:7216: tasya ca śāsane pravrajita āsīd vaiyāpṛtyakarah;
K01vinv172u:7219: yat tatrānena saṃghasya upasthānaṃ kṛtaṃ tasya karmaṇo vipākena annapānasya lābhī saṃvṛttaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7220: yan mamāntike cittam abhiprasādya kālagataḥ tena cāturmahārājikeṣu deveṣūpapannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7221: yat kāśyape samyaksaṃbuddhe pravrajitena paṭhitaṃ svādhyāyitaṃ skandhakauśalaṃ dhātukauśalaṃ
K01vinv172u:7222: āyatanakauśalaṃ pratītyasamutpādakauśalaṃ sthānāsthānakauśalaṃ ca kṛtaṃ tena devabhūtena
K01vinv172u:7224: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ karmaṇāṃ pūrvavad yāvad ekāntaśukleṣv eva karmasv ābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
K01vinv172u:7230: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7231: paśya bhadanta bhagavān paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ parityaktaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7238: The story of the king Dhṛtarāṣṭra,
K01vinv172u:7239: and his faithful captain Pūrṇamukha, etc.
K01vinv172u:7240: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
K01vinv172u:7241: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'navatapte mahāsarasi dhṛtarāṣṭro nāma haṃsādhipatir babhūva;
K01vinv172u:7242: tasya dvau putrau pūrṇaś ca pūrṇamukhaś ca;
K01vinv172u:7250: te haṃsāḥ pratidinam āgamya dhṛtarāṣṭrasya haṃsādhipater nivedayanti;
K01vinv172u:7253: yady aham enaṃ yauvarājye pratiṣṭhāpayāmi mamātyayād eṣa haṃsayūthaṃ nāśayiṣyati;
K01vinv172u:7255: tena pūrṇaḥ pūrṇamukhaś ca ubhāv apy uktau;
K01vinv172u:7256: yaḥ utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni cāvalokya agrato matsakāsam āgacchati tam ahaṃ haṃsādhipatiṃ sthāpayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:7258: tāv itaś cāmutaś ca utsān sarāṃsi taḍāgāni ca avalokayantāv (A 495a)
K01vinv172u:7260: tena khalu samayena vārāṇasyāṃ brahmadatto nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:7261: tena vārāṇasyām udyānasya nātidūre brahmāvatī nāma puṣkariṇī saraḥprativiśiṣṭatarākhyā;
K01vinv172u:7263: tīre samantāc caturṣv api pārśveṣu anekāni puṣpaphalavṛkṣasahasrāṇi ropitāni;
K01vinv172u:7265: tasyās tāṃ vibhūtiṃ dṛṣṭvā pūrṇo haṃsaḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ avatīrya yatheṣṭagatipracāratayā krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7271: tena laghu laghv eva gatvā rājyaṃ pratīṣṭaṃ:
K01vinv172u:7272: tataḥ paṃcaśataparivāraḥ vārāṇasīm āgamya brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya krīḍitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7273: taṃ tathā pramodavihāriṇaṃ dṛṣṭvā janakāyaḥ saṃśayam āpannaḥ:
K01vinv172u:7275: brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm alaṃkṛtya sarvajalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya lokasya spṛhām utpādayati;
K01vinv172u:7277: śrutvā sarva eva vārāṇasīnivāsī janakāyaḥ samantād brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīṃ parivārya,
K01vinv172u:7278: tasya visrabdhavihāratāṃ rūpaśobhāṃ ca nirīkṣamāṇaḥ avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7281: sa brahmāvatīṃ puṣkariṇīm avatīrya anekahaṃsaśataparivāraḥ sarvān jalacarān pakṣiṇo rūpaśobhayā abhibhūya (SBV II 194)
K01vinv172u:7282: lokasya spṛhām utpādayan visrabdhavihāratayā tiṣṭhati iti;
K01vinv172u:7284: bhavantaḥ yady evam āhūyantāṃ śākunikāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7287: bhavantaḥ śrūyate brahmāvatyāṃ puṣkariṇyām atiparamadarśanīyavigraho haṃsādhipatiḥ kuto 'py āgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:7288: sa yuṣmābhir eka akṣataḥ pāśair badhvā matsakāśam āneyaḥ; iti;
K01vinv172u:7292: acikitsya ādāya haṃsayūthaṃ gacchata śīghraṃ hy anavataptam // iti
K01vinv172u:7296: śākunikās te dṛṣṭvā paraṃ vismayam āpannāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7299: te taṃ haṃsādhipatim ādāya rājñaḥ sakāśaṃ gatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7312: na ca yuṣmābhiḥ kenacid api etau praghātyau iti;
K01vinv172u:7317: gacchata bhavanto vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryāṃ ghaṇṭāvaghoṣaṇaṃ kārayata deva evaṃ samājñāpayati,
K01vinv172u:7318: na kenacid madviṣayanivāsinā jalacarāḥ pakṣiṇo ghātayitavyāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7320: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pūrṇamukho haṃsādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7321: yā sā tasya patnī sa evāsāv ānandaḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7323: etāny eva tāni ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
K01vinv172u:7328: bhūyo 'pi bhikṣavaḥ yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ,
K01vinv172u:7329: ānandena bhikṣuṇā na parityakta tac chrūyatām (SBV II 195)
K01vinv172u:7332: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
K01vinv172u:7333: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo vārāṇasyāṃ nagaryām aṭṭo nāma rājā rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca sphītaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:7334: tasya paṃcāmātyaśatāni yeṣām anubhāvāt prātisīmaiḥ koṭṭarājabhir nābhibhūyate;
K01vinv172u:7335: yāvad dakṣiṇāpathāt karadaṇḍī nāma sahasrayodhī abhyāgataḥ;
K01vinv172u:7339: tad arhati devo 'sya parigrahaṃ kartum iti;
K01vinv172u:7342: yāvad apareṇa samayena aṭṭasya rājñaḥ bhūmyantarā rājānaḥ upacittabalasādhanāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7343: te caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭaṃ rājānam abhigatāḥ yuddhāya;
K01vinv172u:7344: aṭṭo 'pi rājā caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
K01vinv172u:7345: aṭṭena rājñā bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ jītāḥ bhītaḥ bhagnāḥ parājitāḥ parāpṛṣṭhīkṛtāḥ svaksvakān viṣayān gatāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7346: taiḥ punar api sannipatya aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃcāmātyaśatāni upaskāreṇa bhagnāni:
K01vinv172u:7350: tato bhūmyantarā rājanaḥ punar api caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyam aṭṭam rājānam abhigatā yauddhāya;
K01vinv172u:7351: aṭṭo 'pi nāma caturaṅgabalakāyaṃ sannāhya hastikāyam aśvakāyaṃ rathakāyaṃ pattikāyaṃ bhūmyantarān rājñaḥ pratyabhiniryāto yuddhāya;
K01vinv172u:7352: aṭṭasya rājñaḥ paṃca amātyaśatāni yuddhe vartamāne pratinivartya karaṇḍdinā sahasrayodhena sārdhaṃ yoddhum ārabdhāni (A 496a)
K01vinv172u:7356: mitraṃ te karadaṇḍī tu tvām eko na prahāsyati // iti
K01vinv172u:7358: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sāv aṭṭo nāma rājā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7359: yā 'sau karadaṇḍī sahasrayodhaḥ ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7360: yāni tāni paṃca amātyaśatāni etāny eva tāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
K01vinv172u:7367: The story of a lion and his jackal-friend
K01vinv172u:7368: (concerning a previous birth of Ānanda, etc.)
K01vinv172u:7369: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin parvataikadeśe siṃho mṛgapatir babhūva;
K01vinv172u:7370: tasya paṃca sṛgālaśatāni vighasakhādakāni nityānubaddhāni parvatam upaniśritya tiṣṭhanti;
K01vinv172u:7371: siṃhaḥ prāṇino ghātayitvā varamāṃsāni vararudhirāṇi ca pītvā nirapekṣaḥ prakrāmati;
K01vinv172u:7373: yāvad apareṇa samayena siṃho mṛgarājaḥ rātrau prāṇinaḥ samanveṣamānaḥ kūpe patitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7377: ko 'sāv upāyaḥ syād yenemaṃ samuddhareyam iti;
K01vinv172u:7378: sa itaś cāmutaś ca kūpasāmantakena paryaṭitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7382: tatas tad udapānaṃ palvalāt salilena pūrṇaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7385: kartavyāni ca mitrāṇi durbalāni balāny api /
K01vinv172u:7386: paśya siṃhaḥ sṛgālena jīrṇakūpāt samuddhṛtaḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:7387: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sīmhaḥ aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7388: sṛgāla ānando bhikṣuḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7389: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca sṛgālaśatāni etāny eva paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
K01vinv172u:7391: ānandena na parityaktaḥ; etarhy apy (SBV II 197)
K01vinv172u:7393: bhūyo 'pi yathā aham ebhiḥ parityaktaḥ tac chrūyatām
K01vinv172u:7394: The story of a Mṛgī and Mṛgādhipati
K01vinv172u:7395: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ aniyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe paṃcānāṃ mṛgaśatānāṃ mṛgādhipatir babhūva;
K01vinv172u:7396: yāvad anyatamena lubdhakena mṛgāṇāṃ vadhāya prabhūtāḥ kūṭapāśāḥ lepāś ca vyavasthāpitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7397: sa ca mṛgādhipatiḥ visrabdhavihāratayā paṃcaśataparivāro mṛgadāve paribhramati;
K01vinv172u:7399: taṃ baddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mṛgā niṣpalāyitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7403: taṃ tathā calantaṃ dṛṣṭvā sā mṛgī gāthāṃ bhāṣate
K01vinv172u:7407: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
K01vinv172u:7408: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti
K01vinv172u:7409: tato 'sau lubdhakaḥ dhanurbāṇapāṇiḥ kāṣāyavastravasitaḥ taṃ pradeśam upasaṃkrāmati;
K01vinv172u:7410: adrākṣīt sā mṛgī taṃ lubdhakaṃ vadhāyodyataṃ mṛgādhipatim upasaṃkrāntaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7411: dṛṣṭvā ca punas tvaritatvaritā gāthāṃ bhāṣate
K01vinv172u:7413: āgato hy eṣa lubdho 'sau pāśo yenaiṣa āhṛtaḥ //iti
K01vinv172u:7415: kiṃ karomi na śaknomi bhinadmy āśu mahīm imāṃ /
K01vinv172u:7416: dṛḍhāni carmapāśāni pādau karṣanti me bhṛśam // iti (SBV II 198)
K01vinv172u:7417: tataḥ sā mṛgī śūnyahṛdayā taṃ mṛgalubdhakam imāṃ gāthāṃ tatsamīpe bhāṣate
K01vinv172u:7419: pūrvaṃ ghātaya māṃ tāvat tataḥ paścān mṛgādhipatam // iti
K01vinv172u:7423: svāmi iti; sa taṃ gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
K01vinv172u:7424: nāhaṃ tvā ghatāyiṣyāmi na haniṣye mṛgādhipam /
K01vinv172u:7425: saṃgamaṃ te kariṣyāmi priyeṇa patinā saha // iti
K01vinv172u:7427: yathāhaṃ ludha modāmi priyeṇa patinā saha /
K01vinv172u:7428: evaṃ tvaṃ lubdha modasva saha sarvaiḥ svabāndhavaiḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:7429: tatas tena lubdhena bhūyasyā mātrayā vismayajātena mṛgo muktaḥ
K01vinv172u:7430: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau mṛgādhipatir aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7431: yā sā mṛgī ānandaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7432: yāni tāni ekonāni paṃca mṛgaśatāni etāny eva ekonāni paṃca bhikṣuśatāni;
K01vinv172u:7437: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7438: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ pūtiḥ pūtinā lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7441: yathā atīte 'py adhvany eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ;
K01vinv172u:7443: The story of a jackal competing with an elephant
K01vinv172u:7445: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin paravataikadeśe mahat padmasaraḥ;
K01vinv172u:7448: yāvad apareṇa samayena hastī tasmāt padmasarasaḥ pānīyaṃ pītvā uttiṣṭhati;
K01vinv172u:7451: yuddhaṃ vā anuprayaccha mārgaṃ vā iti;
K01vinv172u:7455: śuṇḍayā vā dantena vā aśucinā vā nāśayiṣyāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:7459: na tvā padbhyāṃ haniṣyāmi na dantābhyāṃ na śuṇḍayā /
K01vinv172u:7460: pūtinā tvāṃ haniṣyāmi pūtir hanyeta pūtinā // iti
K01vinv172u:7466: vacanamātreṇaiva eṣa bhagno mayā yena tvaritatvaritaṃ niṣpalāyitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7468: hastinā samīpaṃ gataṃ jñātvā tasyopari mahatā vegena purīṣaṃ muktaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7470: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau sṛgālaḥ eṣa eva sa devadattaḥ tena kālena tena samayena tadāpy eṣa pūtinā pūtir hataḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7471: etarhy apy eṣa pūtinā pūtir lābhasatkāreṇa hataḥ
K01vinv172u:7473: seemingly because of an error of the scribe himself.]
K01vinv172u:7474: punar api bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7475: paśya bhadanta devadattaḥ dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7478: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7480: The story of Āgneya, the cat
K01vinv172u:7482: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe mūṣikāṇāṃ yūthapatiḥ paṃcaśataparivāro 'vatiṣṭhate;
K01vinv172u:7489: pūrvam ahaṃ taruṇāvasthāyāṃ śaktaḥ parākrameṇa mūṣikān grahītum;
K01vinv172u:7491: kiṃ tu upāyasaṃvidhānena bhakṣayāmi iti; sa śanair (SBV II 200)
K01vinv172u:7494: sa muṣikavivarasya nātidūre kṛtakena tapas tapyati;
K01vinv172u:7495: sa mūṣikair bhramadbhir dṛṣṭaḥ śānteneryāpathena avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7503: te taṃ pratidinaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya vivaraṃ praviśanti;
K01vinv172u:7516: yāvat tenāsau dṛṣṭaḥ paścimaṃ mūṣikaṃ bhakṣayan;
K01vinv172u:7517: sa tam upasaṃkramya dūreṇa gatvā gāthayā pratyabhāṣata
K01vinv172u:7520: nāyaṃ śikhī dharmaśikhī arthahetor ayaṃ śikhī /
K01vinv172u:7521: svasti te 'gneya bhavatu parihīyanti mūṣakāḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:7522: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau tena kālena tena samayena āgneyo biḍālaḥ devadattaḥ saḥ;
K01vinv172u:7524: etarhy apy anena dharmamukhikayā loko vyaṃsitaḥ
K01vinv172u:7525: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7526: paśya bhadanta ye bhagavato dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7527: ye devadattaḥ dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7530: yathā atīte 'py adhvany ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntārād uttīrṇāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7531: ye dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7533: The story of a bull that got entangled other bulls into trouble by bad counsels
K01vinv172u:7534: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:7535: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo dvau sārthavāhau paṃcabhiḥ śakaṭaśataiḥ sārdham anuvyaharamāṇau kāntāramārgaṃ pratipannau;
K01vinv172u:7536: tavyoḥ kāntāramārgapratipannayoḥ kadācid balīvardānāṃ parītto yavaso bhavati;
K01vinv172u:7539: tato 'sau sārthaḥ saha balīvardaiḥ atīva pariśrāntaḥ kṛcchreṇa kāntāmārgaṃ pratipannaḥ paśyati anyatarasmin pradeśe haritaśādvalaṃ salilasaṃpannaṃ ca snātāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7541: tatas te balīvardāḥ parīttena pānyena yavasena ca parikhinnāḥ,
K01vinv172u:7542: paryāptaṃ yavasaṃ pānīyaṃ ca pītvā viśrāntāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7543: teṣāṃ yaḥ pradhāno balīvardaḥ sa tān prabodhayati:
K01vinv172u:7544: bhavanto vayaṃ parīttena yavasena parīttena ca pānīyena parikheditāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7546: yadi bhavatām abhipretam ihaiva haṭhaṃ kṛtvā tiṣṭhāmaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7551: evam ukte pradhānabalīvardo ruṣitaḥ svayūthyān kathayati:
K01vinv172u:7553: dṛṣṭam ebhir yuṣmābhir na voḍhavyam iti;
K01vinv172u:7556: sārthikā prabhūtān prahārān datvā pratodayaṣṭibhir ātāḍya ātāḍya rudhireṇa pragharatā śakaṭe yojitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7560: mithyā hi coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
K01vinv172u:7562: samyak ca coditāḥ paśya balīvardena gā imāḥ /
K01vinv172u:7563: te vai nistīrṇakāntārāḥ jalaṃ śītaṃ pibanti hi //
K01vinv172u:7564: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau pradhāno balīvardaḥ yena te samyag eva coditāḥ ahaṃ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena; yena tu (SBV II 202)
K01vinv172u:7565: balīvardā viprasthāpitāḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7566: tadāpi yair mama vacanaṃ śrutaṃ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ kāntāramārgaṃ nistīrṇāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7567: yair devadattasya vacanaṃ śrutaṃ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7568: etarhy api ye mama dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te svastikṣemābhyāṃ saṃsārakāntāramārgād uttīrṇāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7569: ye devadattasya dṛṣṭyanumatam āpannāḥ te anayena vyasanam āpannāḥ
K01vinv172u:7570: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7571: paśya bhadanta devadatto mūrkho murkhaparivāraḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7574: yathā atīte 'py adhvani devadatto mūrkho mūrkhaparivāraḥ;
K01vinv172u:7576: The story of the leader of the monkeys
K01vinv172u:7578: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin araṇyāyatane markaṭayūthapatiḥ prativasati;
K01vinv172u:7594: tasyāpy aparo lagna ity evaṃ sarve lagnāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7602: yeṣām iha hi mūrkāṇāṃ mūrkho bhavati nāyakaḥ /
K01vinv172u:7603: sarve te nidhanaṃ yānti candroddhārā iva vānarāḥ // iti
K01vinv172u:7604: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau markaṭayūthapatiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7607: The five causes of the division of the congregation
K01vinv172u:7610: tathāgatasya saṃbhṛtasaṃbhārāṇi karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni labdhasaṃbhārāṇi pariṇatapratyayāny oghavat pratyupasthitāny (A 498b)
K01vinv172u:7615: bāhye pṛthivīdhātau vipacyante pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām;
K01vinv172u:7619: yāvat buddho loke utpadyate lokas tāvat tanmukho 'vatiṣṭhate buddhaḥ kila mārṣā loka utpanna iti;
K01vinv172u:7622: aham eva śāstā iti tasya vaktavyaṃ:
K01vinv172u:7623: yadā bhagavān jīvati tiṣṭhati dhriyate yāpayati tadā tvaṃ kva āsīḥ?
K01vinv172u:7624: arbude anutpanne saṃgho na bhidyate dṛṣṭyarbude vā śīlārbude vā śrāvakayuge anirdiṣṭe saṃgho na bhidyate;
K01vinv172u:7625: tat kasya hetoḥ saṃgho bhinnaḥ avaśyaṃ śrāvakayugaṃ pratisandhatte;
K01vinv172u:7627: tat kasya hetoḥ antaḥsīmni saṃgho bhidyate na bahiḥsīmni
K01vinv172u:7630: mama nirarbude bhikṣusaṃghe arbudam utpannaṃ śīlārbudaṃ dṛṣṭyarbudaṃ ca;
K01vinv172u:7636: yadi tāvat śaikṣāśaikṣaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ rājagṛhaṃ gamiṣyāmi na śakṣyati devadattaḥ saṃghabhedaṃ kartuṃ;
K01vinv172u:7637: yannv ahaṃ pṛthagjanakalyāṇakaiḥ pudgalaiḥ sārdhaṃ gaccheyam;
K01vinv172u:7638: iti viditvā āyuṣmatā rāhulena upasthāyakena paṃcabhir bhikṣuśataiḥ sārdhaṃ yathābhiramyaṃ śrāvastyāṃ vihṛtya yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7639: anupūrveṇa cārikāṃ caran rājagṛham anuprāptaḥ iti (SBV II 204)
K01vinv172u:7641: division of the congregation and new rules imparted by Devadatta
K01vinv172u:7642: buddho bhagavān rājagṛhe varṣā upagato veṇuvane kalandakanivāpe;
K01vinv172u:7646: icchāmy ahaṃ bhikṣavaḥ imāṃ traimāsīṃ pratisaṃlātuṃ;
K01vinv172u:7647: na me kenacid bhikṣuṇā upasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7649: bhikṣusaṃghena kriyākāraḥ kṛtaḥ na kenacid asmākam imāṃ traimāsīṃ bhagavantaṃ darśanāyopasaṃkramitavyaṃ sthāpayitvā piṇḍapātanirhārakaṃ;
K01vinv172u:7651: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau dakṣiṇāgiriṣu varṣā upagatau;
K01vinv172u:7653: sa trayāṇāṃ va dvikānāṃ vā māsānām atyayād bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
K01vinv172u:7654: śramaṇa āyuṣmanto gautama evaṃ śrāvakāṇāṃ dharmaṃ deśayati;
K01vinv172u:7655: āraṇyakatvena bhikṣuḥ śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
K01vinv172u:7657: traicīvarikatvena ābhyavakāśikatvena śudhyati mucyati niryāti sukhaduḥkhaṃ vyatikrāmati sukhaduḥkhavyatikramaṃ cānuprāpnoti;
K01vinv172u:7658: yasya cāyuṣmantaḥ imāni paṃca vratapadāni na rocante na kṣamante na saṃprakhyānti sa śramaṇasya gautamasya ārād bhavatu durād bhavatu;
K01vinv172u:7664: tena tāni devadattasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanubaddhāni dṛṣṭāni;
K01vinv172u:7666: āyuṣmantaḥ kimarthaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddham apahāya asya pāpecchasya pṛṣṭhataḥ pṛṣṭhataḥ samanugacchata?
K01vinv172u:7668: āyuṣman rāhula evaṃvidhe durbhikṣe kṛcchre kāntāre bhagavān adarśano vyavasthitaḥ; vayaṃ (SBV II 205)
K01vinv172u:7670: yadi devadattena traimāsīṃ bhikṣusaṃgho na pratipādito 'bhaviṣyat,
K01vinv172u:7688: trisahasramahāsahasre lokadhātau dharmacakraṃ viṣṭhitaṃ na satvasantāne vartate
K01vinv172u:7689: Śāriputra and Maudgalyāyana visit the Buddha and promise to him to restore the congregation
K01vinv172u:7697: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau trayāṇāṃ vārṣikāṇāṃ māsānām atyayāt kṛtacīvarau niṣṭhitacīvarau samādāya pātracīvaraṃ yena rājagṛhaṃ tena cārikāṃ prakrāntau;
K01vinv172u:7699: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
K01vinv172u:7700: tena khalu samayena āyuṣmān rāhulo dvare tiṣṭhate;
K01vinv172u:7701: athāyuṣmān rāhulaḥ āyuṣmantaṃ śāriputram idam avocad upādyāya devadattena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti; (SBV II 206)
K01vinv172u:7707: praviśya bahagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekānte niṣaṇṇau;
K01vinv172u:7710: gachāmo vayaṃ bhadanta tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ sandhātum iti
K01vinv172u:7711: The sermon on the four merituous men
K01vinv172u:7714: bahu sa puṇyaṃ prasūyate apramāṇam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte,
K01vinv172u:7715: tadyathā śatachinnaṃ vālaṃ yaḥ koṭyā koṭiṃ pratisandadhyāt;
K01vinv172u:7716: evam eva sa bahu puṇyaṃ prasūyate aprameyam asaṃkhyeyaṃ yas tathāgatasya bhinnaṃ śrāvakasaṃghaṃ pratisandhatte
K01vinv172u:7717: catvāra ime śāriputramaudgalyāyanau brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavanti;
K01vinv172u:7719: yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe tathāgatasya śārīraṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K01vinv172u:7720: ayaṃ prathamaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
K01vinv172u:7722: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ apratiṣṭhitapūrve pṛthivīpradeśe caturdiśasya bhikṣusaṃghasya vihāraṃ pratiṣṭhāpayati;
K01vinv172u:7723: ayaṃ dvitīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
K01vinv172u:7725: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ tathāgataśrāvakasaṃghaṃ bhinnaṃ sandhatte;
K01vinv172u:7726: ayaṃ tritīyaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
K01vinv172u:7728: punar aparaṃ yaḥ pudgalaḥ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
K01vinv172u:7729: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
K01vinv172u:7730: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ maitrīsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena (SBV II 207)
K01vinv172u:7731: mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya viharati;
K01vinv172u:7732: evaṃ karuṇāmuditaupekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena adhimucya spharitvā upasaṃpadya
K01vinv172u:7733: tathā dvitīyāṃ tathā tṛtīyāṃ tathā caturthīm;
K01vinv172u:7734: ity ūrdhvam adhaḥ tiryak sarvaśaḥ sarvam imaṃ lokaṃ upekṣāsahagatena cittena avaireṇa
K01vinv172u:7735: asapatnena avyābādhena vipulena mahadgatena apramāṇena subhāvitena ekāṃ diśam adhimucya
K01vinv172u:7737: ayaṃ caturthaḥ pudgalaḥ brāhmaṃ puṇyaṃ prasavati;
K01vinv172u:7739: Śāriputra and Mahāmaudgalyāyana visit Devadatta and exhort the misguided monks to return to the true doctrine
K01vinv172u:7740: āthāyuṣmantau śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhagavato bhāṣitam abhinandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato 'ntikāt prakrāntau;
K01vinv172u:7741: tena khalu samayena devadatto dakṣiṇāgiriṣu buddhalīlayā anudharmaṃ deśayati;
K01vinv172u:7750: tau saṃlakṣayataḥ eṣa evāsmākaṃ doṣo yad asmābhir asya saṃghabhede sāhāyyaṃ kalpitam;
K01vinv172u:7753: balavān eṣa niyatam asmān hanti iti;
K01vinv172u:7757: tatra devadattaḥ āyuṣmantam śāriputram āmantrayate pratibhātu te śāriputra bhikṣūṇāṃ dharmyāṃ kathāṃ kathayituṃ;
K01vinv172u:7761: atha devadattaś caturguṇam uttarāsaṅgaṃ prajñapya dakṣiṇena pārśvena śayyāṃ kalpayitvā middham avakrāntaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7764: tatra āyuṣmān śāriputro bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
K01vinv172u:7766: uttānakaḥ kāyena krathamānena middham avakrāntaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7767: athāyuṣmān śāriputraḥ āyuṣmantaṃ mahāmaudgalyāyanam idam avocat:
K01vinv172u:7769: athāyuṣmān mahāmaudgalyāyanas tadrūpaṃ samādhiṃ samāpannaḥ yathā samāhite citte pūrvasyāṃ
K01vinv172u:7770: diśy upari vihāyasam abhyudgamya caturvidham īryāpathaṃ kalpayati caṃkramyate tiṣṭhati
K01vinv172u:7773: tejodhātusamāpannasya āyuṣmato mahāmaudgalyāyanasya vividhāny arciṃṣi kāyān niścaranti nīlāni pītāni lohitāny avadātāni māñjiṣṭhāni sphaṭikavarṇāni;
K01vinv172u:7775: adhaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati uparimāt kāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
K01vinv172u:7776: uparimaḥ kāyaḥ prajvalati addhaḥkāyāt śītalā vāridhārā syandate;
K01vinv172u:7777: yathā pūrvasyāṃ diśi evaṃ dakṣiṇasyāṃ paścimāyām uttarasyāṃ diśi;
K01vinv172u:7778: iti caturdiśaṃ caturvidhaṃ ṛddhiprātihāryaṃ vidarśya tān ṛddhyabhisaṃskārān pratiprasrabhya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7779: āyuṣmantā ca mahāmaudgalyāyanena te bhikṣavaḥ saṃvejitāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7780: tata āyuṣmatā śāriputreṇa teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ tathāvidho dharmo deśitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7781: yaṃ śrutvā devadatte nirapekṣāḥ saṃvṛttāḥ; uktāś ca:
K01vinv172u:7782: yeṣāṃ vaḥ āyuṣmantaḥ śāstā priyaḥ te uttiṣṭhantu;
K01vinv172u:7784: Many misled monks are led back to the Buddha and readmitted into the order without a word of reproach
K01vinv172u:7791: yadi devadattasa apaśyataḥ parṣadaṃ neṣyāmi sthānam etad vidyate yad uṣṇaṃ rudhiraṃ chardayitvā kālaṃ kariṣyati;
K01vinv172u:7794: devadatto 'pi tīvreṇa paryavasthānena akṣiṇī saṃparimārjan pradhāvitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7797: devadattaḥ kokālikakhaṇḍadravyakaṭamorakatiṣyasamudradattaiḥ sārdhaṃ samantatas tāṃ gartāṃ paribhramitum ārabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7801: atha ca punar anayena vyasanam āpatsyāmi;
K01vinv172u:7803: āyuṣmantāv api śāriputramaudgalyāyanau bhikṣusaṃgham ādāya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrāntau;
K01vinv172u:7804: atha te bhikṣavaḥ ālekhajātāḥ madgubhūtāḥ srastaskandhā adhomukhā bhagavatsakāśam upasaṃkrāmanti:
K01vinv172u:7805: kathaṃ vā vayaṃ bhagavantam aprameyaguṇasamanvāgatam apahāya pāpecchaṃ devadattaṃ saṃsṛtāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7806: atha bhagavān teṣāṃ bhikṣūṇāṃ cetasā cittam ājñāya bhikṣūn āmantrayate sma:
K01vinv172u:7809: kadācit karhicid āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
K01vinv172u:7810: kadācit karhicit tathāgatā arhantaḥ samyaksaṃbuddhā loka utpadyante;
K01vinv172u:7811: kadācit karhicit tathāgatapraveditasya dharmavinayasya loke dharmadeśanā prajñāyate;
K01vinv172u:7812: tad idaṃ bhikṣavaḥ sudurlabhaṃ sudurlabhaṃ yaduta āryāyatane pratyājātiḥ,
K01vinv172u:7813: indriyair avikalatā ajaḍatā aneḍamūkatā ahastasaṃvācikatā pratibalatā subhāṣitadurbhāṣitānāṃ dharmāṇām artham ājñātuṃ;
K01vinv172u:7814: ahaṃ caitarhi śāstā loka utpannaḥ tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddhaḥ vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devamanuṣyāṇāṃ buddho bhagavān;
K01vinv172u:7815: dharmaś ca deśyate aupaśamikaḥ pārinirvāṇikaḥ saṃbodhigāmī saugatapratisaṃveditaḥ yaduta asmin sati idaṃ bhavati;
K01vinv172u:7818: saṃskārapratyayaṃ vijñānaṃ vijñānapratyayaṃ nāmarūpaṃ nāmarūpapratyayaṃ ṣaḍāyatanaṃ
K01vinv172u:7819: ṣaḍāyatanapratyayaḥ sparśaḥ sparśapratyayā vedanā vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā tṛṣṇāpratyaym
K01vinv172u:7820: upādānaṃ upādānapratyayo bhavaḥ bhavapratyayā jātiḥ jātipratyayāḥ jarāmaraṇaśokaparidevaduḥkhadaurmanasyopāyāsāḥ saṃbhavanti;
K01vinv172u:7821: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati;
K01vinv172u:7824: yaduta avidyānirodhāt saṃskāranirodhaḥ saṃskāranirodhād vijñānanirodho vijñānanirodhān
K01vinv172u:7827: tṛṣṇānirodhaḥ tṛṣṇānirodhād upādānanirodhaḥ upādānanirodhād bhavanirodho bhavanirodhāj
K01vinv172u:7829: evam asya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya nirodho bhavati;
K01vinv172u:7831: bhikṣavaḥ ātmārthaṃ samanupaśyadbhiḥ parārthaṃ cobhayārthaṃ ca idaṃ pratisaṃśikṣitavyaṃ:
K01vinv172u:7832: kaccin naḥ pravrajya amoghā bhaviṣyanti kriyāḥ saphalāḥ sukhodayāḥ sukhavipākāḥ;
K01vinv172u:7834: teṣāṃ te kārāḥ kṛtāḥ atyarthaṃ mahāphalā bhaviṣyanti mahānuśaṃsāḥ mahādyutayaḥ mahāvistārāḥ
K01vinv172u:7836: yadā te bhikṣavo bhagavatā svāgatavādena supravrajitavādena samudācaritāḥ tadā teṣāṃ
K01vinv172u:7837: yat tad abhūn madgutvaṃ kaukṛtyam ālekhaḥ vilekhaḥ vipratisāraḥ tat sarveṇa sarvaṃ prativigataṃ;
K01vinv172u:7838: tato 'nye bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:7839: kiṃ bhadanta bhagavatā karma kṛtaṃ yasya karmaṇo vipākena bhagavataḥ śrāvakasaṃgho bhinnaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7841: tathāgatenaiva bhikṣavaḥ pūrvam anyāsu jātiṣu karmāṇi kṛtāny upacitāni pūrvavad yāvat phalanti khalu dehinām
K01vinv172u:7842: The story of a ṛṣi living in the country
K01vinv172u:7843: (concerning a previous birth of the Buddha and Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:7844: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasminn āśramapade mūlapuṣpaphalasalilasaṃpanne nānāvṛkṣopaśobhite anekapakṣigaṇaniṣevite ṛṣiḥ prativasati paṃcānām ṛṣiśatānāṃ pramukhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7845: yāvad anyaḥ ṛṣiḥ janapadacārikāṃ caran tadāśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7846: sa tena ṛṣiṇā na samyak pratimānitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7848: ayaṃ pāpecchaḥ ṛṣir na kiṃcid api jānīte;
K01vinv172u:7851: ahaṃ yuṣmān paṃcasv abhijñāsu pratiṣṭhāpayāmi iti;
K01vinv172u:7852: tena bhidyamānās te tasya ṛṣer avavādena avatiṣṭhante;
K01vinv172u:7854: anena pāpakāriṇā mamaite ṛṣayo bhinnāḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7859: nāvatiṣṭhate iti sa ṛṣir durmanāḥ upāyasaṃvidhānena avasthitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7860: asati buddhānām utpāde pratyekabuddhā loka (SBV II 211)
K01vinv172u:7862: atha anyatamaḥ pratyekabuddho janapadacārikāṃ caran tasya ṛṣer āśramapadam anuprāptaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7865: tena tasmai kārān kṛtvā mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtaṃ:
K01vinv172u:7866: yan mamānena pāparṣiṇā parṣadbhedaḥ kṛtaḥ aham asya sarvajñeyavaśiprāptasyāpi parṣadbhedaṃ kuryām iti
K01vinv172u:7867: kiṃ manyadhve bhikṣavo yo 'sau jānapadaḥ ṛṣiḥ yena tasya ṛṣeḥ parṣad bhinnā aham eva saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7868: yo 'sau naivāsikaḥ ṛṣiḥ devadattaḥ saḥ tena kālena tena samayena;
K01vinv172u:7869: yan mayā asya parṣad bhinnā tasya karmaṇo vipākena anena mithyāpraṇidhānaṃ kṛtvā saṃgho mama bhinnaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7870: iti hi bhikṣavaḥ ekāntakṛṣṇānāṃ pūrvavad ity evaṃ vo bhikṣavaḥ śikṣitavyam
K01vinv172u:7873: paśya bhadanta devadattena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā iti;
K01vinv172u:7876: yathā atīte 'py adhvany anena sabāhyān abhyantarīkṛtya abhyantarāṃś ca bāhyīkṛtya parṣad hāritā;
K01vinv172u:7881: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavaḥ anyatamasmin pradeśe sṛgālaḥ prāṇī prativasati;
K01vinv172u:7887: sa tasmin patitaḥ pārśvena pārśvaṃ luṭhitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7888: sa bhūyasyā mātrayā śarīraṃ jugupsamānaḥ pānīye patitaḥ;
K01vinv172u:7895: ahaṃ śatadrunāmā śakreṇa devendreṇa catuṣpadānāṃ rājye abhiṣiktaḥ iti;
K01vinv172u:7901: ko 'sāv asmat prativiśiṣṭo yaś catuṣpadānāṃ rājā bhaviṣyati?
K01vinv172u:7908: gaccha catuṣpadādhipatiṃ nirīkṣasva kim asau kenacic catuṣpadena dṛṣṭo na vā iti;
K01vinv172u:7912: sa śrutvā siṃhayūthaparivṛtaḥ tasya sakāśam abhigataḥ;
K01vinv172u:7933: sa gataḥ; tena teṣāṃ sṛgālānāṃ niveditaṃ:
K01vinv172u:7938: yady evaṃ vayam enaṃ jñāsyāmaḥ sṛgālo vā na vā iti;
K01vinv172u:7939: dharmatā hy eṣā sṛgālānāṃ yaḥ sṛgālaśabdaṃ śrutvā na vāśate,
K01vinv172u:7953: sa evaṃ nidhanaṃ yāti hastinā kroṣṭuko yathā // iti

K01vinv172u:9483: athāyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanāv akaraṇīyā hy ete iti viditvā prakrāntau;
K01vinv172u:9485: atha pūraṇaḥ kāśyapa āyuṣmantoḥ śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanayoḥ pādayor nipatya kathayati:
K01vinv172u:9486: ārya śāriputra mayā mithyādharmadeśanayā mahājanakāyo vipralabdhaḥ;
K01vinv172u:9487: tasya me karmaṇo vipākena jihvāyāṃ paṃca halaśatāni vahanti;
K01vinv172u:9488: yathā yathā ca śrāvakā stūpakārān kurvanti tathā tathā tīvrataravedanāṃ vedayāmi;
K01vinv172u:9489: tad arhasi madīyām avasthāṃ teṣāṃ nivedya nivārayituṃ:
K01vinv172u:9491: tatheti pratijñāya āyuṣmantau śāriputramahāmaudgalyāyanau narakacārikāṃ (MSV IV 240)
K01vinv172u:9493: tābhyāṃ bhagavato bhikṣūṇāṃ janakāsya devadattakokālikapūraṇaprabhṛtīnāṃ narakopapannānām avasthā vistareṇa samākhyātā
K01vinv172u:9494: bhikṣavaḥ saṃśayajātāḥ sarvasaṃśayacchettāraṃ buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ papracchuḥ:
K01vinv172u:9495: paśya bhadanta devadatto bhagavato vacanam avacanīkṛtyāvīcau mahānarake (A 519b)
K01vinv172u:9497: na bhikṣava etarhi yathā atīte 'py adhvani eṣa mama vacanam avacanīkṛtya anayena vyasanam āpannaḥ;
K01vinv172u:9499: The story of the bull and the ass
K01vinv172u:9500: (concerning a previous life of the Buddha and Devadatta)
K01vinv172u:9501: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'niyatarāśyavasthito bodhisatvo goṣūpapanno vṛṣo babhūva;
K01vinv172u:9502: sa rātrau nagarān nirgamya rājakīye māṣakṣetre carati;
K01vinv172u:9504: yāvat tasya sakāśaṃ gardabhaḥ upasamkramya kathayati:

K01vinv172u:9510: aham api mātula tvayā sārdhaṃ carāmīti;

K01vinv172u:9516: gardabhas tāvat tūṣṇīm avasthito yāvad āśito jātaḥ;
K01vinv172u:9520: tiṣṭha tāvan uhūrtaṃ yāvad ahaṃ nirgacchāmīti;
K01vinv172u:9526: bhavantaḥ anena gardabhena sarvam idaṃ rājakīyaṃ māṣakṣetraṃ bhakṣitaṃ;
K01vinv172u:9528: taiḥ karṇau cchitvā ulūkhalaṃ ca grīvāyāṃ baddhvā muktaḥ;

K01vinv172u:9545: The story of the bull and the jackal

K01vinv172u:9599: bhūtapūrvaṃ bhikṣavo 'nyatamasyāṃ rājadhānyāṃ rājā caitiko nāma rājyaṃ kārayati ṛddhaṃ ca yāvad ākīrṇabahujanamanuṣyaṃ ca;
